sourceString: Hence, the flow chart of Zhou et al. should be updated, as they classified the person without clinical symptoms as “low risk”.
targetString: म्हणून, Zhou et al. याचा फ्लोचार्ट अद्यतनित करावा, कारण ते चिकित्सालयीन लक्षणाशिवाय व्यक्तीला "कमी जोखीम" म्हणून वर्गीकृत करत आहेत.
en-mt: Therefore, Zhou et al. This flowchart should be updated, as they are classifying individuals as "low risk" without clinical symptoms.

sourceString: The score system also needs to be verified in further clinical practice and studies.
targetString: पुढील चिकित्सालयीन प्रॅक्टिस आणि अभ्यासामध्ये गुणसंख्या सिस्टमची देखील पडताळणी करण्याची गरज आहे.
en-mt: The scoring system also needs to be validated in further clinical practice and studies.

sourceString: To conclude, we hope more direct evidence coming up and call for readers to provide their comments.
targetString: समाप्त करण्यासाठी, आम्हाला आशा आहे की अधिक थेट पुरावे वाचकांसाठी त्यांच्या टिप्पण्या देण्यासाठी येतील.
en-mt: To conclude, we hope that more direct evidence will be forthcoming for readers to provide their comments.

sourceString: For the diagnosis of “suspected case” and “confirmed case”, we suggest to trace and obey the newest guidelines of their home countries.
targetString: “संशयित केस” आणि “पुष्टी केलेल्या केस” यांच्या निदानासाठी, आम्ही त्याच्या मायदेशाच्या नवीनतम मार्गदर्शक सूचनांचा मागोवा आणि पालन करावे.
en-mt: For the diagnosis of “suspected cases” and “confirmed cases”, we should track and follow the latest guidelines of his home country.

sourceString: Our team will also timely update our guideline to offer help.
targetString: मदत देऊ करण्यासाठी आमचा संघ देखील वेळेवर आमची मार्गदर्शक तत्वे अद्यतनित करेल.
en-mt: Our team will also update our guidelines on time to offer assistance.

sourceString: Bangladesh reports five new deaths due to COVID-19, a daily highest
targetString: बांग्लादेशाने कोविड-१९ मुळे पाच नवीन मृत्यु कळवले, एका दिवसातील सर्वाधिक
en-mt: Bangladesh reports five new deaths from Covid-19, the highest in a day

sourceString: Yesterday, Bangladesh has confirmed five new deaths due to COVID-19 on the day.
targetString: काल, बांग्लादेशाने एका दिवसामध्ये कोविड-१९ मुळे पाच नवीन मृत्युची पुष्टी केली.
en-mt: Yesterday, Bangladesh confirmed five new deaths due to Covid-19 in one day.

sourceString: This is the highest number of fatalities in a day due to the virus.
targetString: ह्या विषाणू मुळे दिवसभरामध्ये झालेले सर्वाधिक मृत्यु आहेत.
en-mt: This virus has caused the highest number of deaths in a day.

sourceString: As of yesterday, Bangladesh's Institute of Epidemiology, Disease Control and Research (IEDCR) reported the number of recorded infected cases included 114 active cases and 33 recovered cases who were staying home.
targetString: कालपर्यंत, बांग्लादेशाच्या इन्स्टिट्यूट ऑफ इपिडेमिऑलॉजी, डिसीज कंट्रोल अॅण्ड रिसर्च (IEDCR) ने कळवल्याप्रमाणे नोंदवण्यात आलेल्या संसर्गित केसेसमध्ये 114 सक्रिय केसेस आणि 33 बऱ्या झालेल्या केसेस आहेत ज्या घरी राहत आहेत.
en-mt: As of yesterday, Bangladesh's Institute of Epidemiology, Disease Control and Research (IEDCR) reported 114 active cases and 33 recovered cases who are staying at home.

sourceString: A total of 17 deaths have been recorded.
targetString: एकूण 17 मृत्युना नोंदवण्यात आलेले आहे.
en-mt: A total of 17 deaths have been reported.

sourceString: In an online news briefing, the director of IEDCR, Dr Meerjady Sabrina Flora, said the fatalities included four males and one female.
targetString: एक ऑनलाइन संक्षिप्त माहिती देताना, IEDCR चे संचालक,डॉ, मीरजादे सबरिना फ्लोरा, म्हणाले की मृत्यु पडलेल्या मध्ये चार पुरूष आणि एक स्त्रीचा समावेश आहे.
en-mt: In an online briefing, the Director of IEDCR, Dr Mirzadeh Sabrina Flora, said the dead included four men and one woman.

sourceString: According to Dr Meerjady, two cases were aged above 60, two between 51 and 60, and one 41-50 years old.
targetString: डॉ. मीरजादे यांच्या नुसार, दोन केसेस या 60 वर्षावरील, दोन 51 ते 60 मधील, आणि एक 41-50 वर्षे वयाच्या मधील होत्या.
en-mt: Dr. According to Mirzadeh, two cases were above 60 years, two between 51-60, and one between 41-50 years of age.

sourceString: She also said two of the victims were from Dhaka.
targetString: त्या हे देखील म्हणाल्या की बळीपैकी दोन जण हे ढाक्यातील होते.
en-mt: She also said that two of the victims were from Dhaka.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) declared COVID-19 a pandemic on March 11.
targetString: ११ मार्च ला जागतिक आरोग्य संघटना (WHO) ने कोविड-१९ ला साथरोग म्हणून जाहीर केले.
en-mt: On March 11, the World Health Organization (WHO) declared Kovid-19 as a pandemic.

sourceString: A hospital official told Anadolu Agency, a local news outlet, that one of the deceased was Jalal Saifur Rahman, a director of Bengali Anti-Corruption Commission, who was cared for at the Kuwait Maitree Hospital.
targetString: रूग्णालयाच्या अधिकाऱ्यांनी एका स्थानिक बातमी आऊटलेट,  अॅडोलु एजन्सीला, सांगितले की, मृत्युमुखी पडलेल्यापैकी एक जण हे जलाल सैफूर रहमान, बंगाली भ्रष्टाचार विरोधी आयोगाचे संचालक, ज्यांच्यावर कुवेत मैत्री रूग्णालयात उपचार केले जात होते.
en-mt: Hospital officials told a local news outlet, Adolu Agency, that one of the dead was Jalal Saifur Rahman, director of the Bengali Anti-Corruption Commission, who was being treated at Maitri Hospital in Kuwait.

sourceString: On Saturday, in an online video announcement, Bangladeshi Road Transport and Bridges Minister Obaidul Quader said public transport would be shut down for longer than initially planned, until this coming Saturday.
targetString: शनिवारी, एक ऑनलाइन व्हिडीओ घोषणेमध्ये, बांग्लादेशी रस्ता वाहतूक आणि पूल मंत्री ओबैदुल क्वादर म्हणाले की सार्वजनिक वाहतूक ही आरंभी नियोजन करण्यात आलेल्यापेक्षा अधिक काळासाठी, या येणाऱ्या शनिवारपर्यंत बंद राहील.
en-mt: On Saturday, in an online video announcement, Bangladeshi Road Transport and Bridges Minister Obaidul Quader said public transport would remain closed for longer than initially planned, until this coming Saturday.

sourceString: This public transport shutdown had initially started on March 26 and was planned to end on Saturday, April 4.
targetString: ही सार्वजनिक वाहतूक बंद हा 26 मार्चला सुरूवातीला सुरू होणार होता आणि शनिवार 4, एप्रिलला समाप्त करण्याची योजना होती.
en-mt: The public transport shutdown was originally scheduled to begin on March 26 and end on Saturday, April 4.

sourceString: Transport of essential goods -- medical, fuel and food -- was still allowed.
targetString: जीवनावश्य वस्तूंची-- वैद्यकीय, इंधन आणि अऩ्न-- यांच्या वाहतूकीला अद्याप मान्यता आहे.
en-mt: Transportation of essential goods -- medical, fuel and food -- is still permitted.

sourceString: The first recorded incidents of COVID-19 infection in Bangladesh were on March 8, in two people who returned from Italy and also the wife of one of them.
targetString: ८ मार्चला बांग्लादेशामध्ये पहिली नोंदवलेली कोविड-१९ च्या संसर्गाची घटना, ज्यामध्ये इटलीवरून परतलेले दोन लोक आणि त्याच्यांपैकी एकाची पत्नी देखील होती.
en-mt: Bangladesh reported its first case of Covid-19 infection on March 8, involving two people who had returned from Italy and the wife of one of them.

sourceString: As of March 19, these three had already recovered.
targetString: 19 मार्चला, हे तिघेही आधीच बरे झालेले होते.
en-mt: On March 19, all three had already recovered.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 surpasses one million infections worldwide
targetString: सार्स-सीओव्ही-२ ने जगभरात एक दशलक्ष संसर्गाला ओलांडले आहे
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 has surpassed one million infections worldwide

sourceString: On Thursday, the total number of cases of the SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus infections surpassed one million worldwide, Johns Hopkins University data indicated.
targetString: गुरूवारी, सार्स-सीओव्ही-२ कोरोनाविषाणू संसर्गाच्या जगभरातील एकूण केसेसच्या संख्येने एक दशलक्ष संख्येला ओलांडले आहे, असे जॉन हाफकिन्स युनिर्व्हसिटी डेटाने दर्शवले आहे.
en-mt: On Thursday, the total number of worldwide cases of the SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus infection crossed the one million mark, Johns Hopkins University data showed.

sourceString: At least 52 thousand deaths were linked to COVID-19, the disease caused by the coronavirus.
targetString: कमीत कमी ५२ हजार मृत्यु हे COVID-१९, कोरोनाविषाणूद्वारे कारणीभूत होणारा आजाराशी, जोडले गेले.
en-mt: At least 52,000 deaths have been linked to COVID-19, the disease caused by the coronavirus.

sourceString: The milestone came the same day Malawi confirmed its first coronavirus infections and Zambia had its first coronavirus-related death.
targetString: हा मैलाचा दगड त्याच दिवशी आला जेव्हा मलावी ने त्याच्या पहिल्या कोरोनाविषाणूच्या संसर्गाची आणि झाम्बियाने त्यांच्या कोरोनाविषाणू-शी संबंधित मृत्युची पुष्टी केली.
en-mt: The milestone came on the same day that Malawi confirmed its first coronavirus infection and Zambia confirmed its coronavirus-related death.

sourceString: North Korea claimed, as of Thursday, it was one of the few countries remaining free of coronavirus infections.
targetString: उत्तर कोरियाने, गुरूवारी दावा केला की, तो कोरोनाविषाणूच्या संसर्गापासून मुक्त राहिलेल्या काही देशापैकी एक देश आहे.
en-mt: North Korea, on Thursday, claimed that it is one of the few countries that has remained free of the coronavirus infection.

sourceString: By yesterday, the World Health Organization reported 1,051,635 confirmed cases, including 79,332 cases in the twenty four hours preceding 10 a.m. Central European Time (0800 UTC) on April 4.
targetString: कालपर्यंत, जागतिक आरोग्य संघटनेने, 4 एप्रिलला सेंट्रल युरोपियन टाईम (0800 UTC) च्या सकाळी 10.00 वाजण्याची पूर्वीच्या 24 तासामधील 79,332 केसेसच्या समावेशासह, 1,051,635 केसेसची पुष्टी केली.
en-mt: As of yesterday, the World Health Organization had confirmed 1,051,635 cases, including 79,332 cases in the previous 24 hours as of 10.00 a.m. Central European Time (0800 UTC) on April 4.

sourceString: In the United States, over 244 thousand coronavirus cases were recorded, linking to at least 5,900 deaths.
targetString: युनायटेड स्टेटमध्ये, २४४ हजारपेक्षा जास्त कोरोनाविषाणू केसेस नोंदवण्यात आल्यास, ज्यापैकी ५,९०० मृत्युना जोडल्या गेल्या.
en-mt: In the United States, more than 244 thousand coronavirus cases have been reported, of which 5,900 deaths have been added.

sourceString: CBS News reported, citing Johns Hopkins University data, there were over 1,000 US deaths on Wednesday caused by coronavirus infections.
targetString: CBS न्यूज ने, जॉन हाफकिन्स युनिव्हर्सिटी डेटाला उद्धृत करत, कळविले की, कोरोनाविषाणूचा संसर्ग झाल्याने बुधवारी यु.एस. मध्ये 1,000 पेक्षा जास्त मृत्यु झाले.
en-mt: CBS News, citing Johns Hopkins University data, reported that the number of new cases of coronavirus in the U.S. increased on Wednesday. More than 1,000 died in

sourceString: Around the world, countries announced stricter measures to inhibit the disease from spreading.
targetString: जगभरामध्ये, आजाराला पसरण्यापासून रोखण्यासाठी कडक उपाययोजनांची घोषणा केली आहे.
en-mt: Around the world, strict measures have been announced to prevent the spread of the disease.

sourceString: On Thursday, Sergei Sobyanin, the mayor of Moscow, extended the city lockdown to May 1.
targetString: गुरूवारी, सेर्गेई सोबयानिन, मॉस्कोचे मेयर, यांनी लॉकडाऊनला १ मे पर्यंत पुढे ढकलले.
en-mt: On Thursday, Sergei Sobyanin, the mayor of Moscow, extended the lockdown until May 1.

sourceString: Nationally, President Vladimir Putin declared Russians would continue to be paid without going to work until April 30.
targetString: राष्ट्रीय स्तरावर अध्यक्ष व्लादिमीर पुतीन यांनी एप्रिल 30 पर्यंत रशियनना कामावर न जाता देखील पगार मिळणे सुरू राहील असे जाहीर केले.
en-mt: At the national level, President Vladimir Putin announced that until April 30, Russians would continue to be paid even without going to work.

sourceString: The parliament of Portugal voted to extend the national state of emergency by 15 days; the vote passed with 215 votes in favor, ten abstentions, and one vote against.
targetString: पोर्तुगालच्या संसदेने राष्ट्रीय आणिबाणीच्या स्थितीला 15 दिवसांनी पुढे वाढविले, ठराव 215 मतांनी पास झाला, दहा अऩुपस्थित, आणि एक मत त्याच्या विरोधात होते.
en-mt: Portugal's parliament extended the state of national emergency by 15 days, with the resolution passed by 215 votes, with ten abstentions, and one vote against.

sourceString: Saudi Arabia extended curfews in the holy cities of Mecca and Medina to last the entire day; previously, the curfew was only in effect between 3 p.m. and 6 a.m.
targetString: सौदी अरेबियाने पवित्र शहरे मक्का आणि मदिना मध्ये संपूर्ण दिवसाची संचारबंदी लागू केलेली आहे: पूर्वी, संचारबंदी ही फक्त दुपारी 3 ते सकाळी 6 वाजेपर्यंत होती.
en-mt: Saudi Arabia has imposed an all-day curfew in the holy cities of Mecca and Medina: previously, the curfew was only from 3pm to 6am.

sourceString: Thailand planned to implement a curfew between 10 p.m. and 4 a.m.
targetString: थायलंडने रात्री 10 ते सकाळी 4 पर्यंत संचारबंदी लागू करण्याचे योजले आहे.
en-mt: Thailand plans to impose curfew from 10pm to 4am.

sourceString: The governor of Ohio, Mike DeWine, announced the state had extended its stay-at-home order until May 1.
targetString: ओहिओचे गर्व्हनर, माईक डेवाइन. यांनी त्यांच्या घरीच-रहा आदेशाला १ मे पर्यंत वाढवलेले आहे.
en-mt: Governor of Ohio, Mike DeWine. has extended his stay-at-home order till May 1.

sourceString: Stores in Australia lower toilet paper limits per transaction
targetString: ऑस्ट्रेलियातील स्टोअर्सनी प्रति व्यवहार टॉयलेट पेपरच्या मर्यादेमध्ये कमी केली.
en-mt: Stores in Australia cut back on toilet paper limits per transaction.

sourceString: On Sunday and Saturday evening, Australian store chains Woolworths and Coles lowered their purchase restrictions on toilet paper to two and one package per transaction in all stores on national level, respectively.
targetString: रविवारी आणि शनिवारी संध्याकाळी. ऑस्ट्रेलियन स्टोअर श्रृंखला Woolworths आणि Coles यांनी त्याच्या टॉयलेट पेपरच्या खरेदीवरील प्रतिबंधने अनुक्रमे दोन वर आणि प्रति व्यवहार एक पॅकेजएवढी राष्ट्रीय स्तरावर कमी केली.
en-mt: Sunday and Saturday evenings. Australian store chains Woolworths and Coles cut their toilet paper purchase restrictions nationally to two and one package per transaction respectively.

sourceString: ALDI also introduced a one-pack limit, on Monday.
targetString: ALDI ने देखील, सोमवारी एक-पॅक मर्यादा आरंभली.
en-mt: ALDI, too, instituted a one-pack limit on Monday.

sourceString: These limitations were posted as messages on the checkouts, and on the chains' Facebook pages.
targetString: या मर्यादा चेकआऊटवर आणि चेनच्या Facebook पृष्ठावर संदेश म्हणून पोस्ट करण्यात आलेले आहेत.
en-mt: These limits are posted as messages at checkout and on the chain's Facebook page.

sourceString: Buyers were reportedly stocking up due to fears of COVID-19 in case people need to self-isolate.
targetString: जर लोकांना स्वयं-आयसोलेशन करण्याची गरज पडल्यास खरेदीदार हे COVID-19 च्या भितीने साठा करत आहेत पुन्हा पुन्हा साठा करत आहेत.
en-mt: Shoppers are stocking up again amid fears of COVID-19 in case people need to self-isolate.

sourceString: On Wednesday, Woolworths also limited toilet paper purchases for home delivery to one pack per order.
targetString: बुधवारी, Woolworths ने देखील होम डिलीव्हरीसाठी प्रत्येक खरेदीला प्रति ऑर्डर एक पॅक एवढे मर्यादीत केले.
en-mt: On Wednesday, Woolworths also limited purchases to one pack per order for home delivery.

sourceString: These changes followed the previous four-pack per transaction restriction introduced by Woolworths and Coles on March 4 and 5 respectively.
targetString: अऩुक्रमे 4 आणि 5 मार्चला Woolworths आणि Coles यांनी सादर केलेल्या मागील प्रति व्यवहार चार-पॅक प्रतिबंधनानंतर हे बदल आलेले आहेत.
en-mt: The changes follow previous four-pack per transaction bans introduced by Woolworths and Coles on March 4 and 5 respectively.

sourceString: Coles, in its March 8 media release, reported that with the four-pack restriction in place, "many stores are still selling out within an hour of delivery", and called the demand "unprecedented", while ALDI, in a Facebook post on Tuesday, called it "unexpected".
targetString: Coles, ने त्यांच्या 8 मार्चच्या प्रकटनामध्ये, चार-पॅकचे प्रतिबंधन असेल अहवाल दिला आहे, "अनेक स्टोअर डिलीव्हरीच्या एका तासाच्या आत विकून टाकत आहेत", आणि म्हणाले की मागणी "अविश्वसनीय आहे", तर ALDI ने, मंगळवारी त्यांच्या Facebook पोस्टवर, त्याला "अनपेक्षित" असे म्हटले.
en-mt: Coles, in its March 8 disclosure, reported that the four-pack would be banned, with "many stores selling out within an hour of delivery", and said demand was "unbelievable", while ALDI, in a Facebook post on Tuesday, called it "unexpected". " said.

sourceString: Sales went up in a "sharp increase" last week, according to a Woolworths spokesperson.
targetString: Woolworths च्या प्रवक्त्याच्या नुसार मागील आठवड्य़ामध्ये विक्री मध्ये "मोठी वाढ " झाली.
en-mt: According to a Woolworths spokesman, there was a "significant increase" in sales last week.

sourceString: Costco's store in Canberra also limited the allowed amount to two packs last week.
targetString: कॅनबेरामधील Costco's store ने देखील मागच्या आठवड्यात प्रमाण हे दोन पॅक एवढे मर्यादीत केले.
en-mt: Costco's store in Canberra also limited quantities to two packs last week.

sourceString: To further alleviate the shortage, Coles ordered bigger packages from suppliers and increased delivery frequency, Woolworths ordered extra stock, while ALDI made stocks for a planned Wednesday special available early.
targetString: तुटवड्याला आणखी कमी करण्यास, Coles ने पुरवठादारांकडून मोठ्या पॅकेजची ऑर्डर दिली आणि वितरण वारंवारचा वाढवली. Woolworths ने अतिरिक्त साठ्याची ऑर्डर दिली, तर ALDI ने नियोजित बुधवारासाठी लवकर उपलब्धता करून दिली.
en-mt: To further reduce shortages, Coles ordered larger packages from suppliers and increased delivery frequency. Woolworths ordered extra stock, while ALDI made availability earlier than planned for Wednesday.

sourceString: Russell Zimmerman, executive director of the Australian Retailers Association, said that retailers try to raise stock, but local council restrictions on the timing of truck-deliveries make it hard.
targetString: ऑस्ट्रेलियन रिटेलर असोशिएशनचे कार्यकारी संचालक, रस्सेल झिम्मेरमॅऩ, म्हणाले की रिटेलरनी साठा वाढवण्याचा प्रयत्न केला, मात्र स्थानिक कौन्सिलच्या ट्रक-पुरवठ्याच्या वेळेच्या प्रतिबंधनामुळे ते अवघड होऊन बसले आहे.
en-mt: The executive director of the Australian Retailers Association, Russell Zimmerman, said retailers had tried to increase stock, but local councils' truck-delivery time restrictions had made it difficult.

sourceString: He expects rising production costs, as suppliers try to meet demand, and fewer specials.
targetString: उत्पादन खर्चामधील वाढीची त्यांनी अपेक्षा केली आहे, कारण पुरवठादारांना मागणीला, आणि कमी प्रमाणात स्पेशल ला पूर्ण करावयाचे आहे.
en-mt: They expect an increase in production costs, as suppliers have to meet demand, and fewer specials.

sourceString: On Tuesday, ALDI announced that following the early release of stock, some stores can't run the Wednesday special.
targetString: मंगळवारी, ADLI ने जाहीर केले की साठाच्या लवकर पाठवणीमुळे, काही स्टोअर बुधवार स्पेशल चालवू शकत नाहीत.
en-mt: On Tuesday, ADLI announced that due to early stock shipments, some stores may not be running the Wednesday special.

sourceString: In a News.com.au report, Dr Gary Mortimer, retail expert from Queensland University of Technology, said the stores fill the stock every night.
targetString: News.com.au च्या अहवालात, डॉ. गॅरी मोर्टिमर, क्विन्सलॅऩ्ड युनिर्व्हसिटी ऑफ टेक्नॉलॉजी मधील रिटेलर तज्ञ म्हणाले की, स्टोअर दररोज रात्री साठा भरत आहेत.
en-mt: In a report by News.com.au, Dr. Gary Mortimer, a retailer expert at Queensland University of Technology, said stores were restocking every night.

sourceString: He remarked toilet paper is a bulky item, leading to low quantity of stocks in numbers, and, when sold out, leaves vast shelf spaces empty, hardening the feeling of a shortage.
targetString: त्यांनी शेरा मारला की टॉयलेट पेपर हा मोठा आयटेम आहे, जो संख्येमध्ये साठ्याच्या कमी प्रमाणाकडे नेतो, आणि, जेव्हा विकला जातो तेव्हा मोठ्या प्रमाणातील शेल्फच्या जागेला रिकामा करतो.
en-mt: They commented that toilet paper is a bulky item, which leads to low inventory levels, and, when sold, frees up a large amount of shelf space.

sourceString: Coles and Woolworths have a view [that] if there was plenty of stuff on the shelf, if product like toilet rolls and sanitiser could be [bought] and are there in quantities, you would probably minimise the panic said Russell Zimmerman per ABC News.
targetString: Coles आणि Woolworths दृश्य दाखवले [की] जर सेल्फवर असंख्य वस्तू असतील, जसे की टॉयलेट रोल्स आणि सॅनिटायझरसारख्या [आणल्या] आणि त्या तिथे अधिक संख्येत असतील तर तुम्ही घबराहटीला संभाव्यता कमी कराल, असे ABC News नुसार रस्सेल झिम्मेरमॅन म्हणाले.
en-mt: The Coles and Woolworths scene showed [that] if you have a lot of items on the shelves, like toilet rolls and sanitizer [bring] them in greater numbers, you reduce the likelihood of panic, said Russell Zimmerman, according to ABC News.

sourceString: Recycled toilet paper producer Who Gives a Crap said on last Wednesday they'd run out of stock.
targetString: रिसायकल टॉयलेट पेपर उत्पादक Who Gives a Crap म्हणाले की त्याच्याकडील साठा समाप्त झालेला आहे.
en-mt: Recycled toilet paper manufacturer Who Gives a Crap said it had run out of stock.

sourceString: Kimberly-Clark, which makes Kleenex Toilet Tissue, and Solaris Paper which makes Sorbent, emphasized they were working 24/7 to maintain the supply, according to the News.com.au report.
targetString: News.com.au च्या अहवालानुसार Kimberly-Clark, जे Kleenex Toilet Tissue तयार करतात, आणि Solaris Paper जे Sorbent तयार करतात, यांनी भर दिला की ते पुरवठा सुरळीत राखण्यासाठी ते 24/7 काम करत आहेत.
en-mt: News.com.au reports that Kimberly-Clark, which makes Kleenex Toilet Tissue, and Solaris Paper, which makes Sorbent, stressed that they are working 24/7 to maintain supplies.

sourceString: Domain.com, a real estate site, reported some property sellers offering free toilet paper to the first bidder on auctions in Melbourne, when fewer auctions were held because of buyers having time off on the long weekend of Labour Day.
targetString: Domain.com, एक रियल इस्टेट साइट, यांनी अहवाल दिला की ते मेलबर्न मध्ये काही मालमत्ता विक्रेते त्याच्या लिलावावर पहिली बोली लावणाऱ्या बोलीदाराला मोफत टॉयलेट पेपर देऊ करत आहेत, जेव्हा कामगार दिनाच्या मोठ्या वीकएडच्या वेळी खरेदीदारांना वेळ असल्याकारणाने काहीच लिलाव घेण्यात आले.
en-mt: Domain.com, a real estate site, reported that some real estate agents in Melbourne were offering free toilet paper to the first bidder at their auctions, when buyers had no time during the Labor Day weekend.

sourceString: The Thursday edition of NT News, a daily printed in Darwin, included an eight-page insert meant to be cut up and used as toilet paper.
targetString: NT News च्या गुरूवारच्या आवृत्तीमध्ये, डार्विन मध्ये दररोज छापला जाणाराने, कापला जावा आणि टॉयलेट पेपर म्हणून वापरला जावा म्हणून, आठ पानी इन्सर्ट सामील केला होता.
en-mt: Thursday's edition of the NT News, printed daily in Darwin, included an eight-page insert to be cut up and used as toilet paper.

sourceString: The stores were originally reluctant to impose restrictions, according to a report from ABC Australia on March 3 in which they said they had no plans to introduce restrictions on the purchases.
targetString: ABC Australia च्या 3 मार्चच्या अहवालानुसार, स्टोअर मूळतः प्रतिबंधने लागू करण्याच्या विरोधात होते, ज्यामध्ये त्यांनी असे म्हटले आहे की खरेदीवर कोणतिही प्रतिबंधने लावण्याची कोणतिही योजना त्यांच्याकडे नव्हती.
en-mt: According to a March 3 report by ABC Australia, the store was originally opposed to the ban, stating that it had no plans to impose any restrictions on purchases.

sourceString: Russell Zimmerman added that other products are also in high demand, including masks, sanitiser, dried goods, handwash and flour.
targetString: रस्सेल झिम्मेरमॅन यांनी असे सांगितले की अऩ्य उत्पादनाची देखील मोठ्या प्रमाणात मागणी आहे ज्यामध्ये मास्क, सॅन्टिटाझर, सुक्या वस्तू, हॅण्डवॉश आणि पीठ यांचा समावेश आहे.
en-mt: Russell Zimmerman said other products are also in high demand, including masks, sanitizers, dry goods, handwash and flour.

sourceString: Similarly, outside of Australia, on Sunday evening online British supermarket Ocado was observed limiting purchases of Andres toilet paper to two 12-roll packs.
targetString: त्याचप्रमाणे, ऑस्ट्रेलियाच्या बाहेर, रविवारी सायंकाळी ब्रिटीश ऑनलाइन सुपरमार्केट Ocado ने Andres टॉयलेट पेपर च्या खरेदीला मर्यादा घातल 12-रोलच्या दोन पॅक पर्यंत मर्यादित केले.
en-mt: Similarly, outside Australia, British online supermarket Ocado on Sunday evening limited purchases of Andres toilet paper to two packs of 12-rolls.

sourceString: World Health Organization declares COVID-19 pandemic
targetString: जागतिक आरोग्य संघटनेने COVID-19 ही जागतिक साथ असल्याचे जाहीर केले आहे
en-mt: The World Health Organization has declared COVID-19 a global pandemic

sourceString: On Wednesday, the World Health Organization (WHO) declared the ongoing outbreak of COVID-19 — the disease caused by coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 — to be a pandemic.
targetString: बुधवारी जागतिक आरोग्य संघटना (WHO) द्वारे COVID-19 चा सुरु असलेला उद्रेक SARS-CoV-2 ह्या कोरोना विषाणूमुळे होणारा रोग- महामारी म्हणून जाहीर केला गेला.
en-mt: The ongoing outbreak of COVID-19 was declared a pandemic by the World Health Organization (WHO) on Wednesday.

sourceString: Although the word "pandemic" only refers to how widely a disease has spread, not how dangerous specific cases are, the WHO noted the need to drive governments to action:
targetString: जरी "जागतिक साथ " हा शब्द काही विशिष्ट घटना किती धोकादायक आहेत ह्यापेक्षा फक्त एखादा रोग किती पसरला आहे ह्याच्याशी संबंधित असला तरी WHO ने सरकारांद्वारे ठोस कृती केली जाण्याची गरज असल्याचे नमूद केले आहे.
en-mt: Although the term "global epidemic" refers only to how widespread a disease is rather than how dangerous certain events are, the WHO notes the need for concerted action by governments.

sourceString: All countries can still change the course of this pandemic.
targetString: सर्व देश अजूनही ह्या जागतिक साथीचा रोख बदलू शकतात
en-mt: All countries can still cash in on this global pandemic

sourceString: If countries detect, test, treat, isolate, trace and mobilize their people in the response, said Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, the Director-General of the WHO.
targetString: जर यास प्रतिसाद म्हणून राष्ट्रांनी ते ओळखले, तुअवर चाचण्या, उपचार, विलगीकरण केले, माग काढला आणि आपल्या जनतेस या लढ्यात एकजूट केले, असे WHO चे महासंचालक टेड्रोस अॅडहॅनोम घेब्रायसस यांनी म्हटले.
en-mt: If the response is that nations recognize it, test, treat, isolate, trace and unite their people in the fight, said WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus.

sourceString: We are deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity and by the alarming levels of inaction.
targetString: धोकादायक पातळीवरील प्रसार व गांभीर्य आणि भयावह पातळीवरील निष्क्रियता ह्या दोन्हींमुळे आम्ही अत्यंत काळजीत आहोत.
en-mt: We are deeply concerned by both the dangerous levels of proliferation and severity and the alarming levels of inaction.

sourceString: According to Dr. Tom Frieden, formerly the director of the United States' Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, the pandemic is "unprecedented."
targetString: युनायटेड स्टेट्सच्या रोग नियंत्रण आणि प्रतिबंध केंद्रांचे माजी प्रमुख डॉ .टॉम फ्रीडन ह्यांच्या मते ही जागतिक साथ "अभूतपूर्व" आहे.
en-mt: The global epidemic is "unprecedented," according to Dr. Tom Frieden, former head of the United States' Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.

sourceString: He said, in remarks published by CNN in February, "other than influenza, no other respiratory virus has been tracked from emergence to continuous global spread."
targetString: फेब्रुवारीत सीएनएनमध्ये प्रसिद्ध केलेल्या टिप्पण्यांमध्ये ते म्हणतात, "इन्फ्लुएंझाशिवाय श्वसनाशी निगडित इतर कोणत्याही विषाणूचा उद्भवापासून ते जागतिक प्रसार होण्यापर्यंत मागोवा घेतला गेलेला नाही."
en-mt: "Other than influenza, no other respiratory virus has been tracked from origin to global spread," he says in comments published on CNN in February.

sourceString: Ghebreyesus expressed a similar view, saying "we have never before seen a pandemic sparked by a coronavirus."
targetString: घेब्रेयेसूस हाच दृष्टिकोन व्यक्त करून म्हणतात," कोरोना विषाणूमुळे उद्भवलेली जागतिक साथ आम्ही यापूर्वी कधीही पाहिलेली नाही."
en-mt: Ghebreyesus echoes this view, saying, "We've never seen a global pandemic caused by the corona virus before."

sourceString: He continued, "and we have never before seen a pandemic that can be controlled at the same time."
targetString: ते पुढे म्हणाले,"आणि आपण अशी जागतिक साथ पाहिलेली नाही, ज्यावर त्याच काळात नियंत्रण मिळवता येते."
en-mt: He added, "And we haven't seen a global epidemic that can be brought under control at the same time."

sourceString: The new status as a pandemic follows the WHO's decision in January to declare the outbreak a public health emergency of international concern.
targetString: जागतिक साथीची सद्यस्थिती ही WHO ने जानेवारीमध्ये ह्या उद्रेकास जागतिक चिंतेची सार्वजनिक आरोग्य आणीबाणी म्हणून जाहीर करण्याच्या निर्णयाचे अनुसरण आहे.
en-mt: The current status of the global pandemic follows the WHO's decision in January to declare the outbreak a public health emergency of global concern.

sourceString: The United States' National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Disease's director, Dr. Anthony Fauci, said of the outbreak, "bottom line, it's going to get worse."
targetString: युनायटेड स्टेट्सच्या राष्ट्रीय ऍलर्जी आणि संसर्गजन्य रोगाच्या संस्थेचे प्रमुख डॉ. अँथनी फॉसी उद्रेकाबद्दल म्हणाले, "हे निश्चित आहे की ही परिस्थिती आणखी बिघडत जाणार आहे."
en-mt: The head of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases of the United States, Dr. Anthony Fauci said of the outbreak, "It's certain that this situation is going to get worse."

sourceString: As of Thursday, Associated Press reported there were at least 126,000 cases of COVID-19 worldwide, resulting in over 4,600 deaths.
targetString: गुरुवारपर्यंत असोसिएटेड प्रेसने असं नोंदवलं की जगभरामध्ये COVID-19 ची कमीतकमी 126,000 प्रकरणे असून, त्याच्या परिणामस्वरूप 4,600 पेक्षा जास्त मृत्यू झाले आहेत.
en-mt: As of Thursday, the Associated Press reported that there have been at least 126,000 cases of COVID-19 worldwide, resulting in more than 4,600 deaths.

sourceString: The 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic is an ongoing pandemic of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: 2019-20 कोरोना विषाणूची जागतिक साथ ही कोरोना विषाणू 2019 (COVID-19)ची जागतिक साथ असून ती श्वसनास तीव्र असह्य विकृती निर्माण करणार्‍या कोरोना विषाणू 2 (SARS-CoV-2) मुळे होते.
en-mt: The 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic is a global pandemic of coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) caused by the severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

sourceString: The outbreak was identified in Wuhan, China, in December 2019, declared to be a Public Health Emergency of International Concern on 30 January 2020, and recognized as a pandemic on 11 March 2020.
targetString: हा उद्रेक वुहान, चीन येथे डिसेंबर 2019 मध्ये झाल्याचे आढळले असून, ही जागतिक चिंतेची सार्वजनिक आरोग्य आणीबाणी असल्याचे 30 जानेवारी 2020 मध्ये जाहीर करण्यात आले आहे आणि 11 मार्च 2020 पासून जागतिक साथ म्हणून ओळखली जाऊ लागली आहे.
en-mt: The outbreak was detected in Wuhan, China in December 2019, and was declared a public health emergency of global concern on 30 January 2020, and has been recognized as a global pandemic since 11 March 2020.

sourceString: As of 10 April 2020, approximately 1.61 million cases of COVID-19 have been reported in 210 countries and territories, resulting in approximately 97,000 deaths.
targetString: 10 एप्रिल 2020 ला COVID-19 च्या 210 देश आणि प्रांतांमध्ये जवळजवळ 1.61 दशलक्ष प्रकरणे नोंदविली गेली आहेत आणि परिणामस्वरूप जवळजवळ 97,000 मृत्यू झाले आहेत.
en-mt: As of April 10, 2020, nearly 1.61 million cases of COVID-19 have been reported in 210 countries and territories, resulting in nearly 97,000 deaths.

sourceString: About 364,000 people have recovered.
targetString: जवळ-जवळ 3,64,000 लोक बरे झाले आहेत.
en-mt: Around 3,64,000 people have recovered.

sourceString: The case fatality rate has been estimated to be 4% in China, while globally ranging from 13.04% in Algeria to .08% in New Zealand.
targetString: चीनमध्ये मृत्यूदराचा अंदाज 4% असून, जगामध्ये तो अल्जीरिया 13.04% ते न्यूझीलंडमध्ये .08% ह्या श्रेणीमध्ये आहे.
en-mt: The mortality rate in China is estimated at 4%, and globally it ranges from 13.04% in Algeria to .08% in New Zealand.

sourceString: Common symptoms include fever, cough and shortness of breath.
targetString: सर्वसामान्य लक्षणांमध्ये ताप, खोकला आणि धाप लागणे ह्यांचा समावेश होतो.
en-mt: Common symptoms include fever, cough and shortness of breath.

sourceString: Complications may include pneumonia and acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: गुंतागुंतींच्या प्रकरणांत न्यूमोनिया आणि श्वसनास तीव्र त्रास होणे ही लक्षणे आढळू शकतात.
en-mt: Complicated cases may include pneumonia and severe respiratory distress.

sourceString: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is typically around five days, but may range from two to fourteen days.
targetString: संसर्ग होण्यापासून लक्षणे दिसण्यापर्यंतचा काळ हा साधारणपणे सुमारे पाच दिवसांचा आहे, परंतु तो दोन ते चौदा दिवसांपर्यंत असू शकतो.
en-mt: The time from infection to onset of symptoms is usually about five days, but can range from two to fourteen days.

sourceString: There is no known vaccine or specific antiviral treatment.
targetString: कुठलीही लस अथवा विशिष्ट विषाणूरोधक उपचार ज्ञात नाहीत.
en-mt: There is no known vaccine or specific antiviral treatment.

sourceString: Primary treatment is symptomatic and supportive therapy.Recommended preventive measures include hand washing, covering one's mouth when coughing, maintaining distance from other people, and monitoring and self-isolation for people who suspect they are infected.
targetString: प्राथमिक उपचार हे लक्षणानुसार आणि आधारभूत स्वरूपाचे उपचार करणे हे आहेत. शिफारस केलेल्या प्रतिबंधात्मक उपायांमध्ये हात धुणे, खोकताना तोंड झाकणे, इतर लोकांपासून अंतर राखणे, निरीक्षण करणे आणि ज्यांना संसर्ग झाल्याचा संशय आहे अशा व्यक्तींनी स्वतःचे विलगीकरण करणे ह्यांचा समावेश होतो.
en-mt: Primary treatment is symptomatic and supportive. Recommended preventive measures include hand washing, covering coughs, social distancing, surveillance, and self-isolation by individuals suspected of being infected.

sourceString: Authorities worldwide have responded by implementing travel restrictions, quarantines, curfews, workplace hazard controls, and facility closures.
targetString: जगभरातील अधिकाऱ्यांनी प्रवासास प्रतिबंध, विलगीकरण करणे, संचारबंदी, कामाच्या ठिकाणी धोक्यांचे नियंत्रण करणे आणि सेवा-सुविधा बंद ठेवून प्रतिसाद दिला आहे.
en-mt: Authorities around the world have responded with travel bans, quarantines, curfews, workplace hazard controls and service closures.

sourceString: The pandemic has led to severe global socioeconomic disruption, the postponement or cancellation of sporting, religious, political and cultural events, and widespread shortages of supplies exacerbated by panic buying.
targetString: ह्या जागतिक साथीमुळे जागतिक पातळीवर तीव्र सामाजिक-आर्थिक वियोजन झाले आहे. खेळ, धार्मिक, राजकीय आणि सांस्कृतिक कार्यक्रम पुढे ढकलले गेले आहेत किंवा रद्द झाले आहेत आणि पुरवठ्याच्या वस्तूंचा व्यापक तुटवडा झाला असून तो भीतीपोटी केलेल्या खरेदीमुळे विकोपास गेला आहे.
en-mt: Due to this global pandemic, there has been severe socio-economic disintegration globally. Sports, religious, political and cultural events have been postponed or cancelled, and there have been widespread shortages of supplies, fueled by panic buying.

sourceString: Schools and universities have closed either on a nationwide or local basis in 193 countries, affecting approximately 99.4 percent  of the world's student population.
targetString: 193 देशांमध्ये शाळा आणि विद्यापीठे एकतर देशपातळीवर किंवा स्थानिक पातळीवर बंद आहेत, आणि त्याचा परिणाम जागतिक विद्यार्थ्यांच्या संख्येपैकी जवळ-जवळ 99.4% विद्यार्थ्यांवर झाला आहे.
en-mt: Schools and universities are closed either nationally or locally in 193 countries, affecting nearly 99.4% of the global student population.

sourceString: Misinformation about the virus has spread online, and there have been incidents of xenophobia and discrimination against Chinese people, other people of East and Southeast Asian descent and appearance, and others from areas with significant virus cases.
targetString: विषाणूबद्दल चुकीची माहिती ऑनलाईन पसरली आहे आणि चिनी लोकांच्या, इतर पूर्व व दक्षिणपूर्व वंशाच्या आणि त्यांच्यासारखे दिसणाऱ्या व विषाणूच्या लक्षणीय प्रकरणे असणाऱ्या भागातील लोकांबाबत भीती किंवा तिरस्कार वाटणे आणि भेदभाव करण्याच्या घटना घडल्या आहेत.
en-mt: Misinformation about the virus has spread online, and there have been cases of fear or hatred and discrimination against Chinese, other eastern and southeastern ethnicities, and people who look like them and from areas with significant cases of the virus.

sourceString: Due to reduced travel and closures of heavy industry, there has been a decrease in air pollution and carbon emissions.
targetString: प्रवासामध्ये घट झाल्यामुळे आणि अवजड उद्योग बंद असल्यामुळे वायू प्रदूषण आणि कार्बन उत्सर्जन कमी झाले आहे.
en-mt: Air pollution and carbon emissions have decreased due to a reduction in travel and the closure of heavy industry.

sourceString: Health authorities in Wuhan, China (the capital of Hubei province) reported a cluster of pneumonia cases of unknown cause on 31 December 2019, and an investigation was launched in early January 2020.
targetString: वुहान, चीन (हुबेई प्रांताची राजधानी) येथील आरोग्य अधिकाऱ्यांनी 31 डिसेंबर 2019 मध्ये अज्ञात कारणामुळे झालेल्या न्यूमोनियाची प्रकरणे नोंदविली आणि जानेवारी 2020 च्या सुरुवातीला चौकशी सुरु करण्यात आली होती.
en-mt: Health officials in Wuhan, China (the capital of Hubei province) reported cases of pneumonia of unknown cause on 31 December 2019, and an investigation was launched in early January 2020.

sourceString: The cases mostly had links to the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market and so the virus is thought to have a zoonotic origin.
targetString: बहुतांश प्रकरणे ही हुनानच्या समुद्री खाद्यपदार्थांच्या घाऊक बाजाराशी निगडित होती आणि म्हणून ह्या विषाणूचे मूळ प्राणिजन्य असल्याचे मानले जाते.
en-mt: Most of the cases were linked to Hunan's seafood wholesale market, and the virus is therefore believed to be of animal origin.

sourceString: The virus that caused the outbreak is known as SARS-CoV-2, a newly discovered virus closely related to bat coronaviruses, pangolin coronaviruses, and SARS-CoV.The earliest known person with symptoms was later discovered to have fallen ill on 1 December 2019, and that person did not have visible connections with the later wet market cluster.
targetString: ज्या विषाणूमुळे हा उद्रेक झाला आहे त्याला SARS-CoV-2 असे ओळखले जाते, हा एक नव्याने सापडलेला विषाणू असून त्याचा वटवाघूळांच्या कोरोना विषाणूंशी, खवले मांजरांशी निगडित कोरोना विषाणू आणि SARS-CoV यांच्याशी जवळचा संबंध आहे. लक्षणे दिसलेली अगदी सुरुवातीची ज्ञात व्यक्ती नंतर 1 डिसेंबर 2019 ला आजारी पडलेली आढळली आणि त्या व्यक्तीचा नंतरच्या वेट मार्केट समूहाशी थेट संबंध नव्हता.
en-mt: The virus that caused the outbreak, known as SARS-CoV-2, is a newly discovered virus closely related to bat coronaviruses, scaly cat-associated coronaviruses, and SARS-CoV. The earliest known person to show symptoms was later found to have fallen ill on December 1, 2019, and was not directly linked to the later Wet Market group.

sourceString: Of the early cluster of cases reported in December 2019, two-thirds were found to have a link with the market.
targetString: 2019 मध्ये नोंदविल्या गेलेल्या सुरुवातीच्या प्रकरणांच्या गटामध्ये दोन तृतीयांश प्रकरणांचा संबंध मार्केटशी असल्याचे सापडले आहे.
en-mt: Two-thirds of the initial batch of cases reported in 2019 were found to be linked to the market.

sourceString: On 13 March 2020, an unverified report from the South China Morning Post suggested that a case traced back to 17 November 2019, in a 55-year-old from Hubei province, may have been the first.On 26 February 2020, the WHO reported that, as new cases reportedly declined in China but suddenly increased in Italy, Iran, and South Korea, the number of new cases outside China had exceeded the number of new cases within China for the first time.
targetString: 13 मार्च 2020 ला दक्षिण चीनच्या मॉर्निंग पोस्टच्या अप्रमाणित अहवालामध्ये असे सुचवलेलं होतं की 17 नोव्हेंबर 2019 पर्यंत मागोवा घेतला गेलेल्या हुबेई प्रांतामधल्या एका 55 वर्षीय व्यक्तीचे सर्वात पहिले प्रकरण असू शकते. 26 फेब्रुवारी 2020 ला WHO ने असं नोंदवलं की जशी चीनमध्ये नवीन प्रकरणांची नोंदणी कमी झाली पण अचानक इटली आणि दक्षिण कोरियामध्ये वाढली, तेव्हा प्रथमच चीनच्या बाहेरील नवीन प्रकरणांची संख्या चीनमधील संख्येपेक्षा वाढली होती.
en-mt: An unconfirmed report by the South China Morning Post on 13 March 2020 suggested that the earliest case may have been a 55-year-old man from Hubei province, who was traced back to 17 November 2019. On February 26, 2020, the WHO reported that as the number of new cases declined in China but suddenly increased in Italy and South Korea, for the first time the number of new cases outside China exceeded the number inside China.

sourceString: There may be substantial underreporting of cases, particularly among those with milder symptoms.
targetString: प्रकरणांची नोंद बऱ्याच मोठ्या प्रमाणात कमी स्वरुपात केली गेली असू शकते, विशेष करून अशी प्रकरणे ज्यांमध्ये सौम्य लक्षणे दिसून आली आहेत.
en-mt: Cases may have been underreported to a greater extent, especially those with mild symptoms.

sourceString: By 26 February, relatively few cases had been reported among youths, with those 19 and under making up 2.4% of cases worldwide.The United Kingdom's chief scientific adviser, Patrick Vallance, estimated that 60% of the British population would need to become infected before effective herd immunity could be achieved.
targetString: 26 फेब्रुवारीपर्यंत तरुणांमध्ये तुलनेने कमी प्रकरणे नोंदविली गेली, 19 किंवा त्याखालील वयाची प्रकरणे जगभरातील प्रकरणांच्या 2.4% होती. युनायटेड किंग्डमचे मुख्य वैद्यकीय सल्लागार पॅट्रिक व्हॅलन्सच्या अंदाजानुसार सामूहिक रोगप्रतिकारशक्ती प्राप्त करण्यापूर्वी ब्रिटिश लोकसंख्येच्या 60% लोकांना संसर्ग होणे गरजेचे आहे.
en-mt: As of February 26, relatively few cases were reported among young people, with cases aged 19 or under accounting for 2.4% of cases worldwide. Patrick Vallance, the United Kingdom's chief medical adviser, estimates that 60% of the British population would need to be infected before mass immunity is achieved.

sourceString: Cases refers to the number of people who have been tested for COVID-19, and whose test has been confirmed positive according to official protocols.
targetString: प्रकरणांचा संदर्भ COVID-19 बाबत चाचणी केलेल्या लोकांच्या संख्येविषयी आहे आणि ज्यांची चाचणी अधिकृत नियमानुसार सकारात्मक असल्याचे नक्की झाले आहे अशा लोकांशी आहे.
en-mt: Cases refer to the number of people who have been tested for COVID-19 and those who have tested positive according to official guidelines.

sourceString: As of 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of its population, and many countries have had official policies not to test those with only mild symptoms, such as Italy, the Netherlands, Spain, and Switzerland.
targetString: 23 मार्चपर्यंत कोणत्याही देशांनी त्यांच्या लोकसंख्येच्या 3% पेक्षा जास्त जणांच्या चाचण्या केल्या नव्हत्या आणि इटली, नेदरलँड, स्पेन आणि स्वित्झर्लंडसारख्या बऱ्याच देशांची अधिकृत धोरणे अशी होती की सौम्य लक्षणे असलेल्यांची चाचणी करू नये.
en-mt: As of March 23, no country had tested more than 3% of its population, and many countries such as Italy, the Netherlands, Spain and Switzerland had official policies not to test those with mild symptoms.

sourceString: A study published on 16 March found that in China, up to 23 January, an estimated 86% of COVID-19 infections had not been detected, and that these undocumented infections were the infection source for 79% of documented cases.
targetString: 16 मार्चला प्रसिद्ध झालेल्या एका अभ्यासानुसार चीनमध्ये 23 जानेवारीपर्यंत COVID-19 चा संसर्ग झालेल्यांपैकी अंदाजे 86% व्यक्ती सापडल्या नव्हत्या आणि ह्या संसर्ग असलेल्या अलिखित व्यक्ती ह्या लिखित 79% प्रकरणांच्या संसर्ग स्त्रोत होत्या.
en-mt: According to a study released on March 16, an estimated 86% of people infected with COVID-19 in China had not been detected as of January 23, and undocumented individuals with the infection were the source of infection for 79% of documented cases.

sourceString: A statistical analysis published 30 March estimated that numbers of infections in Italy were considerably greater than the reported cases.
targetString: 30 मार्च रोजी प्रसिद्ध झालेल्या एका सांख्यिकी विश्लेषणामध्ये असा अंदाज व्यक्त केला आहे की इटलीमधील संक्रमणांची संख्या नोंदवलेल्या प्रकरणांपेक्षा बऱ्यापैकी जास्त होती.
en-mt: A statistical analysis released on March 30 estimated that the number of infections in Italy was significantly higher than reported cases.

sourceString: The initial estimates of the basic reproduction number (R0) for COVID-19 were 1.4 to 2.4.
targetString: COVID-19 बद्दलच्या मूलभूत पुनरुत्पादन संख्येचा (R0) प्राथमिक अंदाज 1.4 ते 2.4 होता.
en-mt: A preliminary estimate of the basic reproduction number (R0) for COVID-19 was 1.4 to 2.4.

sourceString: A study published by the US Center for Disease Control and Prevention has concluded that it may be 5.7.
targetString: युएसच्या रोग नियंत्रण आणि प्रतिबंध केंद्राने प्रसिद्ध केलेल्या अभ्यासानुसार तो 5.7 असू शकतो असा निष्कर्ष काढला आहे.
en-mt: A study released by the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention concluded that it could be 5.7.

sourceString: Most people with COVID-19 recover.
targetString: COVID-19 झालेले बहुसंख्य व्यक्ती बरे होतात.
en-mt: Most people who contract COVID-19 recover.

sourceString: For those who do not, the time from development of symptoms to death has been between 6 and 41 days, with the most common being 14 days.
targetString: आणि जे होत नाहीत त्यांच्यामध्ये लक्षणे दिसण्यापासून मृत्यू होण्यापर्यंतचा काळ हा 6 ते 41 दिवसांपर्यंत व बहुतांशी सामान्यपणे 14 दिवस असतो.
en-mt: And in those that do not, the time from onset of symptoms to death ranges from 6 to 41 days, with most typically 14 days.

sourceString: As of 10 April 2020, approximately 97,000 deaths had been attributed to COVID-19.
targetString: 10 एप्रिल 2020 पर्यंत COVID-19 मुळे जवळ-जवळ 97,000 मृत्यू झालेले आहेत.
en-mt: As of April 10, 2020, there have been nearly 97,000 deaths due to COVID-19.

sourceString: In China, as of 5 February about 80% of deaths were in those over 60, and 75% had pre-existing health conditions including cardiovascular diseases and diabetes.Official tallies of deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic generally refer to dead people who tested positive for COVID according to official protocols.
targetString: चीनमध्ये 5 फेब्रुवारीपर्यंत मृतकांपैकी 80% लोक हे 60 वर्षावरील व्यक्ती होते, आणि 75% जणांना पूर्वीपासूनच्या आरोग्याच्या समस्या असलेले हृदयरोग आणि मधुमेहाचा समावेश असलेले आजार होते. COVID-19 या महामारीमुळे झालेल्या मृत्यूच्या अधिकृत आकड्यांमध्ये सहसा अशा मृतकांचा संबंध असतो ज्यांच्या अधिकृत नियमानुसार केलेल्या COVID च्या चाचण्या सकारात्मक आल्या असतील.
en-mt: 80% of the dead in China as of February 5 were people over 60, and 75% had pre-existing health conditions including heart disease and diabetes. Official death tolls from the COVID-19 pandemic usually relate to those who have tested positive for COVID according to official guidelines.

sourceString: The number of true fatalities from COVID-19 may be much higher, as it may not include people who die without testing - e.g. at home, in nursing homes, etc.
targetString: खरोखरच COVID-19 मुळे होणारे मृत्यू हे बरेच जास्त असू शकतात, कारण त्यामध्ये ज्या व्यक्ती चाचण्या न होता, उदाहरणार्थ, घरी, शुश्रुषालयांमध्ये इ. ठिकाणी मृत्युमुखी पडत आहेत त्यांचा समावेश नसू शकतो.
en-mt: The actual death toll from COVID-19 may be much higher, as it includes people who have not been tested, for example at home, in nursing homes, etc. May not include those dying in place.

sourceString: Partial data from Italy found that the number of excess deaths during the pandemic exceeded the official COVID death tally by a factor of 4-5x.
targetString: इटलीमधील थोड्याशा माहितीमधून असे आढळते की जागतिक साथीदरम्यान जास्त मृत्यूंची संख्या ही अधिकृत COVID मृत्युसंख्येपेक्षा 4-5 पट होती.
en-mt: A little data from Italy suggests that the excess death toll during the global pandemic was 4-5 times higher than the official COVID death toll.

sourceString: A spokeswoman for the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) acknowledged "We know that [the stated death toll] is an underestimation", a statement corroborated by anecdotal reports of undercounting in the U.S. Such underestimation often occurs in pandemics, such as the 2009 H1N1 swine flu epidemic.The first confirmed death was in Wuhan on 9 January 2020.
targetString: युएसच्या रोग नियंत्रण आणि प्रतिबंध केंद्राच्या (CDC) प्रवक्ता महिलेने असे मान्य केले की,"आम्हाला हे माहीत आहे की [सांगितलेली मृत्यूंची संख्या] हा कमी प्रमाणात वर्तवलेला अंदाज आहे", हे असे विधान आहे ज्याला यूएसमधील मोजणी कमी झाल्याच्या अपूर्ण अहवालांमुळे पुष्टी मिळते. अशा पद्धतीची कमी मोजणी होणे हे महामारीमध्ये बरेचदा घडते, जसे 2009 च्या H1N1 स्वाईन फ्लूच्या साथीत घडले होते. पहिला खात्रीलायक मृत्यू वुहानमध्ये 9 जानेवारी 2020 रोजी झाला होता.
en-mt: A spokeswoman for the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) acknowledged that, "We know [the reported number of deaths] is an underestimate", a statement that is corroborated by incomplete reports that the count in the US has fallen. Such systematic undercounting often occurs in epidemics, as occurred in the 2009 H1N1 swine flu pandemic. The first confirmed death occurred in Wuhan on January 9, 2020.

sourceString: The first death outside mainland China occurred on 1 February in the Philippines, and the first death outside Asia was in France on 14 February.
targetString: चीनच्या मुख्यभूमीच्या बाहेर मृत्यू हा पहिल्यांदा प्रथम फिलिपिन्समध्ये 1 फेब्रुवारीला झाला आणि आशियाच्या बाहेरील पहिला मृत्यू हा फ्रान्समध्ये 14 फेब्रुवारीला झाला होता.
en-mt: The first death outside mainland China was in the Philippines on February 1, and the first death outside Asia was in France on February 14.

sourceString: By 28 February, outside mainland China, more than a dozen deaths each were recorded in Iran, South Korea, and Italy.
targetString: 28 फेब्रुवारीपर्यंत, चीनच्या मुख्यभूमी बाहेर, एक डझनाहून अधिक मृत्यू इराण, दक्षिण कोरिया आणि इटलीमध्ये प्रत्येकी नोंदवले गेले होते.
en-mt: As of February 28, outside mainland China, more than a dozen deaths were each reported in Iran, South Korea and Italy.

sourceString: By 13 March, more than forty countries and territories had reported deaths, on every continent except Antarctica.Several measures are commonly used to quantify mortality.
targetString: अंटार्क्टिका वगळता इतर सर्व खंडांमध्ये 13 मार्चपर्यंत चाळीसहून अधिक देश आणि प्रदेशांमध्ये मृत्यू नोंदविले गेले होते. मृत्यूंची संख्या नोंदविण्यासाठी सर्वसाधारणपणे अनेक पद्धती वापरल्या जातात.
en-mt: More than forty countries and territories had reported deaths as of March 13 on all continents except Antarctica. Several methods are commonly used to record the number of deaths.

sourceString: These numbers vary by region and over time, and are influenced by the volume of testing, healthcare system quality, treatment options, time since initial outbreak, and population characteristics such as age, sex, and overall health.The death-to-case ratio reflects the number of deaths divided by the number of diagnosed cases within a given time interval.
targetString: ह्या आकड्यांमध्ये प्रदेश आणि वेळेनुसार फरक पडतो आणि त्यावर केल्या गेलेल्या चाचण्यांची संख्या, आरोग्यसेवा व्यवस्थेचा दर्जा, उपचारांचे पर्याय, उद्रेक झाल्यापासूनचा काळ आणि लोकसंख्येची वैशिष्ट्ये; उदाहरणार्थ वय, लिंग आणि एकूण आरोग्य ह्यांचा प्रभाव पडतो. मृत्यूंचे प्रकरणांशी असलेले गुणोत्तर हे एका ठराविक काळातील एकूण मृत्यूंचा आकडा भागिले निदान झालेली प्रकरणे दर्शवितो.
en-mt: These figures vary by region and time and include the number of tests performed, the quality of the healthcare system, treatment options, time since the outbreak, and population characteristics; For example, age, gender, and overall health have an effect. The death-to-case ratio is the total number of deaths divided by the number of diagnosed cases over a period of time.

sourceString: Based on Johns Hopkins University statistics, the global death-to-case ratio is 6.0% (97,039/1,617,204) as of 10 April 2020.
targetString: जॉन्स हॉपकिन्स विद्यापीठाच्या आकडेवारीनुसार, 10 एप्रिल 2020 ला जगभरातील मृत्यू व प्रकरणांचे गुणोत्तर हे 6.0% (97,039/1,617,204) आहे.
en-mt: According to data from Johns Hopkins University, the ratio of deaths to cases worldwide as of April 10, 2020 is 6.0% (97,039/1,617,204).

sourceString: The number varies by region.
targetString: ही संख्या प्रदेशानुसार बदलते.
en-mt: This number varies by region.

sourceString: In China, estimates for the death-to-case ratio decreased from 17.3% (for those with symptom onset 1–10 January 2020) to 0.7% (for those with symptom onset after 1 February 2020).Other measures include the case fatality rate (CFR), which reflects the percent of diagnosed people who die from a disease, and the infection fatality rate (IFR), which reflects the percent of infected (diagnosed and undiagnosed) who die from a disease.
targetString: चीनमध्ये मृत्यूचे प्रकरणांशी असलेले गुणोत्तर 17.3% (1 ते 10 जानेवारी 2020 मध्ये लक्षणे असलेल्यांबाबत) वरून 0.7% (1 फेब्रुवारी 2020 नंतर लक्षणे असलेल्यांबाबत) पर्यंत कमी झाले. इतर पद्धतींमध्ये प्रकरण मृत्यू दर (सीएफआर) चा समावेश होतो, जो रोगामुळे मृत्युमुखी पडणार्‍या संक्रमित झालेल्या व्यक्तींची (निदान झालेले आणि न झालेले) टक्केवारी दर्शवितो.
en-mt: The ratio of deaths to cases in China decreased from 17.3% (for those with symptoms between 1 and 10 January 2020) to 0.7% (for those with symptoms after 1 February 2020). Other methods include the case fatality rate (CFR), which indicates the percentage of infected individuals (diagnosed and undiagnosed) who die from the disease.

sourceString: These statistics are not timebound and follow a specific population from infection through case resolution.
targetString: या आकडेवारीला वेळेचे बंधन नसते आणि ती संक्रमण होणे ते प्रकरणाचे निराकरण होण्यापर्यंत एका विशिष्ट लोकसंख्येचा मागोवा घेते.
en-mt: These statistics are not time-bound and track a specific population from infection to case resolution.

sourceString: A number of academics have attempted to calculate these numbers for specific populations.
targetString: अनेक शैक्षणिक संस्थांनी काही विशिष्ट लोकसंख्येसाठी ह्या आकड्यांचा हिशोब करण्याचा प्रयत्न केला आहे.
en-mt: Many educational institutions have attempted to calculate these figures for certain populations.

sourceString: The University of Oxford's Centre for Evidence-Based Medicine estimates that the infection fatality rate for the pandemic as a whole is between 0.1% and 0.39%.
targetString: युनिव्हर्सिटी ऑफ ऑक्सफर्डच्या पुराव्यावर आधारित वैद्यकशास्त्राच्या केंद्राने असा अंदाज व्यक्त केला आहे की जागतिक साथीचे एकूण संक्रमण होऊन मृत्यू होण्याचा दर हा 0.1% ते 0.39% च्या दरम्यान आहे.
en-mt: The University of Oxford's Center for Evidence-Based Medicine has estimated that the global epidemic's overall infection-death rate is between 0.1% and 0.39%.

sourceString: The upper estimate of this range is consistent with the results from the first random testing for COVID-19 in Germany, and a statistical study analysing the impact of testing on CFR estimates.
targetString: ह्या श्रेणीतील वरच्या बाजूचा अंदाज हा जर्मनीमध्ये COVID-19 च्या प्रथम यादृच्छिक पद्धतीने केलेल्या चाचण्यांशी आणि एका सांख्यिकी अभ्यासाशी जो चाचण्यांचा सीएफआरवरील प्रभावाचे विश्लेषण करतो यांच्याशी सुसंगत आहे.
en-mt: An estimate on the upper side of this range is consistent with the first randomized trials of COVID-19 in Germany and a statistical study that analyzed the impact of the trials on CFR.

sourceString: The WHO asserts that the pandemic can be controlled.
targetString: WHO ची अशी खात्री आहे की ही जागतिक साथ नियंत्रणात आणली जाऊ शकते.
en-mt: WHO is confident that this global epidemic can be brought under control.

sourceString: The peak and ultimate duration of the outbreak are uncertain and may differ by location.
targetString: ह्या उद्रेकाची सर्वोच्च पातळी आणि जास्तीत जास्त कालमान अनिश्चित आहे आणि ते ठिकाणानुसार बदलू शकते.
en-mt: The peak level and maximum duration of this eruption are uncertain and may vary from location to location.

sourceString: Maciej Boni of Penn State University stated, "Left unchecked, infectious outbreaks typically plateau and then start to decline when the disease runs out of available hosts.
targetString: पेन स्टेट युनिव्हर्सिटीचे मॅसीएज बोनी असे नमूद करतात की, "जर तपासणी केली नाही तर संक्रमणाचा उद्रेक एका पातळीवर येऊन वाढायचा थांबतो आणि तो रोगास उपलब्ध असलेले यजमान कमी झाल्यावर कमी होतो.
en-mt: Maciej Bonney of Penn State University notes, "If left unchecked, outbreaks can plateau and decline as the number of hosts available to the disease decreases.

sourceString: But it's almost impossible to make any sensible projection right now about when that will be".
targetString: पण हे कधी घडेल ह्याबद्दल एखादे योग्य अनुमान वर्तवणे हे आत्ता केवळ अशक्य आहे."
en-mt: But it is simply impossible at present to make an accurate prediction as to when this will happen."

sourceString: The Chinese government's senior medical adviser Zhong Nanshan argued that "it could be over by June" if all countries can be mobilized to follow the WHO's advice on measures to stop the spread of the virus.
targetString: चिनी सरकारचे वरिष्ठ वैद्यकीय सल्लागार झोंग नानशान ह्यांनी युक्तिवाद केला आहे की जर सर्व देशांना WHO च्या विषाणू प्रसार होण्यास प्रतिबंध करण्याच्या उपायांचा सल्ला पाळण्यास आरंभ केल्यास "हे जूनपर्यंत संपेल".
en-mt: Zhong Nanshan, a senior medical adviser to the Chinese government, has argued that "it will be over by June" if all countries begin to follow the WHO's advice on measures to prevent the spread of the virus.

sourceString: On 17 March, Adam Kucharski of the London School of Hygiene & Tropical Medicine stated that SARS-CoV-2 "is going to be circulating, potentially for a year or two".
targetString: 17 मार्चला लंडन स्कूल ऑफ हायजिन अँड ट्रॉपिकल मेडिसिनचे ऍडम कुचार्स्की ह्यांनी नमूद केलं की SARS-CoV2" एक ते दोन वर्षे पसरत जाण्याची शक्यता आहे."
en-mt: On March 17, Adam Kucharski of the London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine noted that SARS-CoV2 "is likely to circulate for one to two years."

sourceString: According to the Imperial College study led by Neil Ferguson, physical distancing and other measures will be required "until a vaccine becomes available (potentially 18 months or more)".
targetString: इंपिरियल कॉलेजच्या नील फर्ग्युसन यांनी नेतृत्व केलेल्या अभ्यासानुसार शारीरिक अंतर राखणे आणि इतर उपायांची "लस उपलब्ध होईपर्यंत (18 महिने किंवा जास्त काळ लागण्याची शक्यता)आवश्यकता असेल".
en-mt: Physical distancing and other measures "will be needed until a vaccine is available (likely 18 months or longer)," according to the study, led by Neil Ferguson of Imperial College.

sourceString: William Schaffner of Vanderbilt University stated, "I think it's unlikely that this coronavirus—because it's so readily transmissible—will disappear completely" and it "might turn into a seasonal disease, making a comeback every year".
targetString: व्हांडरबिल्ट युनिव्हर्सिटीच्या विल्यम शाफनर यांनी नमूद केले आहे की, "हा विषाणू इतक्या सहजगत्या संक्रमित होत असल्यामुळे संपूर्ण नष्ट होणे अशक्य आहे", त्यामुळे "तो हंगामी रोग होईल आणि बहुधा दर वर्षी परतेल."
en-mt: William Schaffner of Vanderbilt University noted that "total eradication is impossible because the virus is so easily transmissible", so "it will become a seasonal disease and probably return every year."

sourceString: The virulence of the comeback would depend on herd immunity and the extent of mutation.
targetString: परतण्याचा विषारीपणा किंवा तीव्रता ही सामूहिक प्रतिकारशक्ती आणि परिवर्तित होण्याच्या व्याप्तीवर अवलंबून असते.
en-mt: The toxicity or severity of the return depends on the collective immunity and extent of conversion.

sourceString: Symptoms of COVID-19 can be relatively non-specific and infected people may be asymptomatic.
targetString: COVID-19 ची लक्षणे ही तुलनात्मकदृष्ट्या विशिष्ट नसतात आणि संसर्ग झालेल्या लोकांमध्ये लक्षणे आढळून येतीलच असे नाही.
en-mt: The symptoms of COVID-19 are relatively non-specific, and people who are infected do not necessarily have symptoms.

sourceString: The two most common symptoms are fever (88%) and dry cough (68%).
targetString: सर्वात समान दोन लक्षणे ताप (88%) आणि कोरडा खोकला (68%) ही आहेत.
en-mt: The two most common symptoms are fever (88%) and dry cough (68%).

sourceString: Less common symptoms include fatigue, respiratory sputum production (phlegm), loss of the sense of smell, shortness of breath, muscle and joint pain, sore throat, headache, chills, vomiting, hemoptysis, diarrhea, or cyanosis.The WHO states that approximately one person in six becomes seriously ill and has difficulty breathing.
targetString: कमी आढळणाऱ्या लक्षणांमध्ये थकवा, श्वसनमार्गात स्रावाचे (कफ) तयार होणे, गंध भावनेचा अभाव, धाप लागणे ,स्नायू आणि सांधेदुखी, घसा खवखवणे, डोकेदुखी, थंडी वाजणे, उलट्या होणे, रक्तस्राव, अतिसार किंवा प्राणवायूच्या कमतरतेमुळे त्वचा निळी पडणे ह्यांचा समावेश होतो. WHO असे नमूद करते की अंदाजे सहापैकी एकजण गंभीर आजारी पडतो आणि त्याला श्वसनाचा त्रास होतो.
en-mt: Less common symptoms include fatigue, production of secretions (phlegm) in the respiratory tract, lack of sense of smell, shortness of breath, muscle and joint pain, sore throat, headache, chills, vomiting, bleeding, diarrhea or blue skin due to shortness of breath. The WHO states that approximately one in six people become seriously ill and have respiratory problems.

sourceString: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) lists emergency symptoms as difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain or pressure, sudden confusion, difficulty waking, and bluish face or lips; immediate medical attention is advised if these symptoms are present.Further development of the disease can lead to severe pneumonia, acute respiratory distress syndrome, sepsis, septic shock and death.
targetString: यूएसच्या रोग नियंत्रण आणि प्रतिबंध केंद्रांनी (CDC) आपत्कालीन लक्षणांची यादी केली आहे; उदाहरणार्थ श्वसनास त्रास, दीर्घ काळ छाती दुखणे किंवा दाब, अचानक संभ्रम होणे, उठताना त्रास होणे आणि चेहरा किंवा ओठ निळे पडणे; अशी लक्षणे असल्यास त्वरित वैद्यकीय उपचार घेण्याचा सल्ला दिला आहे. रोग आणखी वाढल्यास तीव्र न्यूमोनिया, श्वसनाच्या त्रासाचे तीव्र संलक्षण, जखमेत पू होणे, सेप्टिक शॉक आणि मृत्यू होऊ शकतो.
en-mt: The US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) lists emergency symptoms; For example, shortness of breath, prolonged chest pain or pressure, sudden confusion, difficulty getting up, and blue face or lips; Immediate medical treatment is advised in case of such symptoms. As the disease progresses, acute pneumonia, acute respiratory distress syndrome, wound suppuration, septic shock and death may occur.

sourceString: Some of those infected may be asymptomatic, with no clinical symptoms but with test results that confirm infection, so researchers have issued advice that those with close contact to confirmed infected people should be closely monitored and examined to rule out infection.
targetString: संसर्ग झालेल्यांपैकी काही जणांमध्ये लक्षणे दिसत नसतील, कोणतीही वैद्यकीय लक्षणे आढळत नसतील परंतु चाचण्यांचे निकाल संसर्गाची खात्री देत असतील, म्हणून संशोधकांनी सल्ला दिला आहे की ज्यांचा संसर्ग झाल्याची खात्री असलेल्या लोकांशी जवळून संपर्क आला आहे अशांचे बारकाईने निरीक्षण केले पाहिजे आणि संसर्गाची शक्यता फेटाळण्यासाठी परीक्षण केले पाहिजे.
en-mt: Some of those infected may be asymptomatic, with no medical symptoms but test results confirming infection, so researchers advise that those who have been in close contact with people who are believed to be infected should be closely monitored and tested to rule out infection.

sourceString: Chinese estimates of the asymptomatic ratio range from few to 44%.
targetString: चिनी लोक असा अंदाज वर्तवतात की लक्षणे नसलेल्यांचे गुणोत्तर थोडे ते 44% इतके असू शकते.
en-mt: The Chinese estimate that the proportion of asymptomatic may be as low as 44%.

sourceString: The usual incubation period (the time between infection and symptom onset) ranges from one to 14 days; it is most commonly five days.As an example of uncertainty, the estimate of the fraction of people with COVID-19 who lost their sense of smell was initially 30% and later fell to 15%.
targetString: सामान्यपणे विषाणूंनी शरीरात प्रवेश केल्यावर प्रत्यक्ष रोगाची सुरुवात होण्याचा काळ (संसर्ग होणे ते लक्षणे दिसण्याचा काळ) एक ते 14 दिवसांपर्यंत असतो, सर्वसाधारणपणे तो पाच दिवसांचा असतो. अनिश्चिततेचे उदाहरण म्हणून COVID-19 असलेल्या लोकांपैकी गंध भावना गमावलेल्या लोकांची संख्या प्रारंभी 30% होती व नंतर ती 15% पर्यंत उतरली असा अंदाज आहे.
en-mt: Generally, the time to onset of actual disease (time from infection to onset of symptoms) after the virus enters the body ranges from one to 14 days, with the most common being five days. As an example of uncertainty, it is estimated that the number of people with COVID-19 who lose their sense of smell was initially 30% and then dropped to 15%.

sourceString: Some details about how the disease is spread are still being determined.
targetString: हा रोग कसा पसरला असावा ह्याबद्दलचे काही तपशील अजूनही शोधले जात आहेत.
en-mt: Some details about how the disease may have spread are still being explored.

sourceString: The disease is believed to be primarily spread during close contact and by small droplets produced during coughing, sneezing, or talking; with close contact being within 1 to 2 metres (3 to 6 feet).
targetString: हा रोग प्रामुख्याने जवळून संपर्क आल्याने आणि खोकताना निर्माण झालेल्या छोट्या थेंबांमुळे, शिंकताना किंवा बोलताना, जवळून संपर्क 1 ते 2 मीटरच्या आत (3 ते 6 फूट) असताना पसरत असल्याचे मानले जाते.
en-mt: The disease is thought to be spread primarily by close contact and through small droplets produced when coughing, sneezing or talking, within 1 to 2 meters (3 to 6 feet) of close contact.

sourceString: Studies have found that an uncovered coughing can lead to droplets travelling up to 4.5 metres (15 feet) to 8.2 metres (27 feet).
targetString: अभ्यासादरम्यान असे आढळले आहे की तोंड न झाकता खोकल्यामुळे थेंब 4.5 मीटर (15 फूट) ते 8.2 मीटर (27 फूट) प्रवास करू शकतात.
en-mt: Studies have found that coughing without covering the mouth can travel 4.5 meters (15 feet) to 8.2 meters (27 feet).

sourceString: Some have proposed that the virus may also be transmitted by small droplets that stay for more prolonged periods in the air, that may be generated during speech.Respiratory droplets may also be produced during breathing out, including when talking, though the virus is not generally airborne.
targetString: काही जणांनी असा विचार मांडला आहे की बोलताना तोंडातून बाहेर पडणारे जे छोटे थेंब बाहेर पडतात त्या हवेमध्ये बराच काळ राहू शकणाऱ्या छोट्या थेंबांमधून देखील हा विषाणू संक्रमित होऊ शकतो. जरी हा विषाणू हवेमध्ये तयार होत नसला तरी श्वसनमार्गातील थेंब श्वासोच्छवास करताना, बोलताना तयार होऊ शकतात.
en-mt: Some have suggested that the virus can also be transmitted through small droplets that can remain in the air for a long time, such as those that come out of the mouth when talking. Although the virus is not airborne, droplets in the respiratory tract can be produced by breathing and speaking.

sourceString: The droplets can land in the mouths or noses of people who are nearby or possibly be inhaled into the lungs.
targetString: हे थेंब जवळपास असलेल्या लोकांच्या तोंडात किंवा नाकात जाऊ शकतात किंवा श्वासाबरोबर फुफ्फुसात ओढले जाऊ शकतात.
en-mt: These droplets can go into the mouth or nose of bystanders or be inhaled into the lungs.

sourceString: Some medical procedures such as intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) may cause respiratory secretions to be aerosolized and thus result in airborne spread.
targetString: इंट्युबेशन किंवा कार्डीओपल्मनरी रिससीटेशन ह्यांसारख्या वैद्यकीय कार्यपद्धतींमुळे श्वसनमार्गातील स्राव हे बारीक प्रमाणात फवारले जाऊ शकतात आणि त्यामुळे हवेतून प्रसार होऊ शकतो.
en-mt: Medical procedures such as intubation or cardiopulmonary resuscitation can cause respiratory secretions to become aerosolized and become airborne.

sourceString: It may also spread when one touches a contaminated surface, including skin, and then touches their eyes, nose, or mouth.
targetString: जर एखाद्याने एखाद्या दूषित पृष्ठभागास, ज्यामध्ये त्वचेचाही समावेश होतो, स्पर्श केला आणि नंतर त्याचे डोळे, नाक किंवा तोंडास स्पर्श केला तरी तो पसरू शकतो.
en-mt: It can spread if someone touches a contaminated surface, including skin, and then touches their eyes, nose, or mouth.

sourceString: While there are concerns it may spread by faeces, this risk is believed to be low.
targetString: तो विष्ठेद्वारे पसरू शकतो अशी काळजी वाटत असली तरी ह्यात धोका कमी आहे असे मानले जाते.
en-mt: Although there is concern that it can be spread through faeces, the risk is thought to be low.

sourceString: The Government of China denied the possibility of faecal-oral transmission of SARS-CoV-2.The virus is most contagious during the first three days after onset of symptoms, although spread may be possible before symptoms appear and in later stages of the disease.
targetString: चिनी सरकारने विष्ठेद्वारे किंवा तोंडावाटे SARS-CoV-2 च्या संक्रमणाची शक्यता फेटाळली आहे. जरी लक्षणे दिसण्यापूर्वी आणि रोगाच्या पुढील टप्प्यात प्रसार होण्याची शक्यता असली तरी लक्षणे दिसल्यानंतरच्या पहिल्या तीन दिवसांत ह्या विषाणूचा संसर्ग होण्याची शक्यता सर्वात जास्त असते.
en-mt: The Chinese government has ruled out the possibility of transmission of SARS-CoV-2 through feces or mouth. Although transmission is possible before symptoms appear and during the later stages of the disease, the virus is most likely to be contracted during the first three days after symptoms appear.

sourceString: People have tested positive for the disease up to three days before onset of symptoms suggesting transmission is possible before developing significant symptoms.
targetString: लक्षणे दिसू लागण्याच्या तीन दिवस आधी लोकांच्या चाचण्या सकारात्मक आल्या आहे आणि ह्यावरून असे सूचित होते की मोठ्या प्रमाणावर लक्षणे दिसण्यापूर्वीदेखील संसर्ग होणे शक्य आहे.
en-mt: People have tested positive up to three days before the onset of symptoms, suggesting that it is possible to become infected even before symptoms appear on a large scale.

sourceString: Only few reports of laboratory-confirmed asymptomatic cases exist, but asymptomatic transmission has been identified by some countries during contact tracing investigations.
targetString: लक्षणे दिसत नसलेल्या पण प्रयोगशाळेत पुष्टी केलेल्या प्रकरणांचे केवळ थोडेसेच अहवाल आहेत, पण संपर्काविषयी शोध घेताना काही देशांनी लक्षणे दिसत नसतानाही संसर्ग झाल्याचे शोधले आहे.
en-mt: There are only a few reports of asymptomatic but laboratory-confirmed cases, but some countries have detected asymptomatic infection during contact tracing.

sourceString: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) states that while it is not entirely clear how easily the disease spreads, one person generally infects two to three others.The virus survives for hours to days on surfaces.
targetString: युरोपियन सेन्टर फॉर डिसीज प्रिव्हेंशन अँड कंट्नेरोल असे सांगितले आहे की हा रोग किती सहजगत्या पसरतो हे संपूर्णपणे स्पष्ट नसले तरी एका व्यक्तीमुळे इतर दोन ते तीन व्यक्तींना संसर्ग होतो. विषाणू पृष्ठभागावर काही तास ते काही दिवस जिवंत राहतो.
en-mt: The European Center for Disease Prevention and Control states that although it is not entirely clear how easily the disease spreads, one person can infect two to three others. The virus survives on surfaces for a few hours to a few days.

sourceString: Specifically, the virus was found to be detectable for up to three days on plastic (polypropylene) and 304 stainless steel, for one day on cardboard, and for up to four hours on copper.
targetString: विशेषतः हा विषाणू प्लास्टिकवर (पॉलीप्रॉपिलीन) आणि 304 स्टेनलेस स्टीलवर तीन दिवसापर्यंत, पुठ्ठयावर एक दिवस आणि तांब्यावर चार तासांपर्यंत सापडू शकतो असे आढळले आहे.
en-mt: Specifically, the virus has been found to be detectable on plastic (polypropylene) and 304 stainless steel for up to three days, on cardboard for one day, and on copper for up to four hours.

sourceString: This, however, varies based on the humidity and temperature.Pets and other animals have tested positive for COVID-19.
targetString: मात्र हे आर्द्रता आणि तापमानानुसार बदलू शकते. पाळीव प्राणी आणि इतर प्राण्यांच्या COVID-19 च्या चाचण्या सकारात्मक आल्या आहेत.
en-mt: But this can vary with humidity and temperature. Pets and other animals have tested positive for COVID-19.

sourceString: There is no evidence animals can pass the virus on to humans, though British authorities advise washing one's hands after contact with animals, like after contact with other surfaces infected people could have touched.
targetString: जरी ब्रिटिश अधिकारी जसे संसर्ग झालेल्या व्यक्तींनी ज्या पृष्ठभागाशी स्पर्श केला असण्याची शक्यता आहे अशा इतर पृष्ठभागाशी संपर्क आल्यावर हात धुण्याचा सल्ला देतात तसाच प्राण्यांशी संपर्क आल्यानंतर आपले हात धुण्याचा सल्ला देत असले तरी प्राणी हा विषाणू मानवांमध्ये संक्रमित करू शकतात असा कोणताही पुरावा नाही.
en-mt: There is no evidence that animals can transmit the virus to humans, although British authorities recommend washing hands after contact with animals, as well as washing hands after contact with other surfaces that infected people may have touched.

sourceString: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel virus, first isolated from three people with pneumonia connected to the cluster of acute respiratory illness cases in Wuhan.
targetString: तीव्र स्वरूपाचा गंभीर श्वसनरोग कोरोनाविषाणू 2 (SARS-CoV-2) हा एक अभूतपूर्व विषाणू आहे, जो प्रथम वुहानमध्ये तीव्र स्वरूपाचा श्वसनाचा आजार असलेल्या प्रकरणांच्या समूहाशी संबंध असलेल्या न्यूमोनिया असलेल्या तीन व्यक्तींपासून वेगळा केला गेला.
en-mt: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is an unprecedented virus that was first isolated from three individuals with pneumonia associated with a cluster of acute respiratory disease cases in Wuhan.

sourceString: All features of the novel SARS-CoV-2 virus occur in related coronaviruses in nature.Outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which dissolves its protective envelope.SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to the original SARS-CoV.
targetString: नोवेल SARS-CoV-2 ची सर्व वैशिष्ट्ये निसर्गात असणाऱ्या सर्व संबंधित कोरोना विषाणूंमध्ये आढळतात. मानवी शरीराबाहेर हा विषाणू घरगुती साबणाने त्याचे संरक्षक कवच विरघळत असल्याने मरतो. SARS-CoV-2 मूलतः SARS CoV शी जवळून संबंधित आहे.
en-mt: All the characteristics of the novel SARS-CoV-2 are found in all related corona viruses in nature. Outside the human body, the virus dies as household soap dissolves its protective shell. SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to SARS CoV in origin.

sourceString: It is thought to have a zoonotic origin.
targetString: त्याचे मूळ प्राणिजन्य आहे असे मानले जाते.
en-mt: It is believed to be of animal origin.

sourceString: Genetic analysis has revealed that the coronavirus genetically clusters with the genus Betacoronavirus, in subgenus Sarbecovirus (lineage B) together with two bat-derived strains.
targetString: जनुकीय विश्लेषणावरून असे उघड झाले आहे की कोरोना विषाणू जिनस बीटाकोरोनाव्हायरस बरोबर सबजीनस सर्बीकोव्हायरस (लाइनएज B) सह दोन वटवाघूळांपासून उत्पन्न झालेल्या प्रकारांबरोबर जनुकीय समूह बनवतो.
en-mt: Genetic analysis revealed that the coronaviruses form a genetic cluster with the two bat-derived strains, including the genus Betacoronavirus and the subgenus Cerbicovirus (lineage B).

sourceString: It is 96% identical at the whole genome level to other bat coronavirus samples (BatCov RaTG13).
targetString: त्याचे संपूर्ण जीनोम पातळीवर इतर वटवाघूळांशी संबंधित कोरोना विषाणूंच्या नमुन्यांशी (BatCov RaTG13) 96% साधर्म्य आहे.
en-mt: It has 96% similarity to other bat-related corona virus samples (BatCov RaTG13) at the whole genome level.

sourceString: In February 2020, Chinese researchers found that there is only one amino acid difference in certain parts of the genome sequences between the viruses from pangolins and those from humans.
targetString: फेब्रुवारी 2020 मध्ये चिनी संशोधकांना असे आढळले आहे की खवलेमांजरांच्या विषाणूंमध्ये आणि मानवांच्या विषाणूंमधल्या जीनोम सिक्वेन्समधील काही भागात फक्त एका अमिनो आम्लाचा फरक आहे.
en-mt: In February 2020, Chinese researchers found that parts of the genome sequence between scaly cat viruses and human viruses differ by just one amino acid.

sourceString: Whole-genome comparison to date has found at most 92% of genetic material shared between pangolin coronavirus and SARS-CoV-2, which is insufficient to prove pangolins to be the intermediate host.
targetString: आजमितीला संपूर्ण जीनोम तुलनेमध्ये खवलेमांजराच्या विषाणू आणि SARS-CoV-2 मध्ये सामायिक असलेल्या जीनोम सामग्रीच्या 92% सामग्री शोधलेली आहे, जी खवलेमांजरं हेच मध्यस्थ यजमान आहेत हे सिद्ध करण्यास अपुरी आहे.
en-mt: Whole genome comparisons to date have found 92% of shared genome material between scaly virus and SARS-CoV-2, which is insufficient to prove that scaly cats are the intermediate host.

sourceString: Infection by the virus can be provisionally diagnosed on the basis of symptoms, though confirmation is ultimately by reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) of infected secretions or CT imaging.
targetString: लक्षणांच्या आधारे विषाणूचा संसर्ग झाल्याचे तात्पुरते निदान करता येऊ शकते पण त्याची पुष्टी मात्र संसर्ग झालेल्या सरावाच्या रिव्हर्स ट्रान्सक्रिप्शन पॉलिमिरेज चेन रिऍक्शनने (rRT-PCR) किंवा CT इमेजिंगने होते.
en-mt: A viral infection can be tentatively diagnosed based on symptoms but confirmed by reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) or CT imaging of infected specimens.

sourceString: A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes.
targetString: वुहानमध्ये केल्या गेलेल्या PCR आणि CT च्या तुलनात्मक अभ्यासाने असे सुचवले आहे की CT जरी कमी अचूक असली तरी PCR पेक्षा लक्षणीयरीत्या संवेदनशील आहे आणि तिच्या प्रतिमाजनक वैशिष्ट्यांपैकी अनेक वैशिष्ट्ये ही इतर न्यूमोनिया आणि रोग प्रक्रियांशी जुळणारी आहेत.
en-mt: A comparative study of PCR and CT performed in Wuhan suggests that CT, although less accurate, is significantly more sensitive than PCR and that many of its imaging features are consistent with other pneumonias and disease processes.

sourceString: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19".
targetString: मार्च 2020 ला अमेरिकन कॉलेज ऑफ रेडिओलॉजीने अशी शिफारस केली आहे की COVID-19 चे निदान करण्यासाठी CT चा वापर करू नये किंवा पहिली चाचणी म्हणून वापर करू नये.
en-mt: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology has recommended that CT not be used to diagnose COVID-19 or as the first test.

sourceString: The WHO has published several RNA testing protocols for SARS-CoV-2, with the first issued on 17 January.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 करता WHO ने RNA चाचणीचे अनेक नियम जारी केले आहेत, त्यातील पहिला 17 जानेवारीला जारी केला होता.
en-mt: WHO has issued several guidelines for RNA testing for SARS-CoV-2, the first of which was issued on January 17.

sourceString: The test uses real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).
targetString: ही चाचणी रियल टाइम रिव्हर्स ट्रान्सक्रिप्शन पॉलिमिरेज चेन रिऍक्शन (rRT-PCR) वापरते.
en-mt: This test uses real time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).

sourceString: The test can be done on respiratory or blood samples.
targetString: ही चाचणी श्वसनमार्गाच्या किंवा रक्ताच्या नमुन्यावर केली जाऊ शकते.
en-mt: This test can be done on a respiratory or blood sample.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to days.
targetString: निकाल सहसा काही तास ते काही दिवसांत उपलब्ध होऊ शकतात.
en-mt: Results are usually available within a few hours to a few days.
