en-mt: The Italian government had to suspend all flights to and from China and declare a state of emergency as cases began to rise rapidly.

sourceString: An unassociated cluster of COVID-19 cases was later detected, starting with 16 confirmed cases in Lombardy on 21 February.On 22 February, the Council of Ministers announced a new decree-law to contain the outbreak, including quarantining more than 50,000 people from 11 different municipalities in northern Italy.
targetString: लोम्बार्डीमध्ये २१ फेब्रुवारीला एक संबंध नसलेला कोविड १९ च्या केसेसचा समूह नंतर सापडला होता ज्याची सुरुवात १६ पुष्टी झालेल्या केसेसनी झाली होती.२२ फेब्रुवारीला मंत्र्यांच्या परिषदेने उद्रेक ताब्यात आणण्यासाठी एक नवीन हुकूम वजा कायदा जाहीर केला ज्यात इटलीतील उत्तर भागातील ११ वेगवेगळ्या नगरपालिकांमधील ५०००० पेक्षा जास्त लोकांचे विलगीकरण करण्याचा समावेश होता.
en-mt: An unrelated cluster of Covid-19 cases was discovered in Lombardy on 21 February after it began with 16 confirmed cases. On 22 February, the Council of Ministers announced a new decree to contain the outbreak, including the isolation of more than 50,000 people in 11 different municipalities in northern Italy. was included.

sourceString: Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte said, "In the outbreak areas, entry and exit will not be provided.
targetString: पंतप्रधान गिउसेप कॉन्ट म्हणाले,"उद्रेक झालेल्या भागात प्रवेश मिळणार नाही आणि बाहेरही जात येणार नाही."
en-mt: Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte said, "There will be no entry or exit to the affected area."

sourceString: Suspension of work activities and sports events has already been ordered in those areas."On 4 March, the Italian government ordered the full closure of all schools and universities nationwide as Italy reached 100 deaths.
targetString: कामाचे उपक्रम आणि खेळाच्या कार्यक्रम स्थगित करण्याचे आदेश त्या भागात आधीच दिलेले आहेत. "४ मार्च रोजी इटालियन सरकारनी इटलीमध्ये १०० मृत्यू झाल्याने सर्व शाळा आणि विद्यापीठे संपूर्ण बंद करण्याचे आदेश दिले."
en-mt: Suspension of work activities and sports events have already been ordered in those areas. "On March 4, the Italian government ordered the complete closure of all schools and universities after 100 deaths in Italy."

sourceString: All major sporting events, including Serie A football matches, were to be held behind closed doors until April, but on 9 March, all sport was suspended completely for at least one month.
targetString: सेरी ए फुटबॉल सामन्यांसह सर्व मुख्य खेळाचे कार्यक्रम एप्रिलपर्यंत बंद मैदानात होणार होते पण ९ मार्च रोजी कमीतकमी एक महिन्यासाठी सर्व खेळाचे कार्यक्रम स्थगित करण्यात आले.
en-mt: All major sporting events, including Serie A football matches, were scheduled to take place behind closed doors until April, but on March 9, all sporting events were suspended for at least a month.

sourceString: On 11 March, Prime Minister Conte ordered stoppage of nearly all commercial activity except supermarkets and pharmacies.On 6 March, the Italian College of Anaesthesia, Analgesia, Resuscitation and Intensive Care (SIAARTI) published medical ethics recommendations regarding triage protocols that might be employed.
targetString: 11 मार्च रोजी पंतप्रधान काँटे ह्यांनी सुपरमार्केट आणि औषधाची दुकाने सोडून जवळ जवळ सर्व व्यावसायिक कामे बंद ठेवण्याचा आदेश दिला. 6 मार्च रोजी इटालियन कॉलेज ऑफ ऍनेस्थेशिया, अनलजेसिया, रिसेसीटेशन आणि अतिदक्षता (SIAARTI) नी उपचार करताना वापरता येतील अश्या पाळावयाच्या शिष्टाचारांची शिफारस केलेली वैद्यकीय नीतितत्त्वे प्रसिद्ध केली.
en-mt: On March 11, Prime Minister Conte ordered the closure of almost all businesses except supermarkets and drug stores. On March 6, the Italian College of Anesthesia, Analgesia, Resuscitation and Intensive Care (SIAARTI) published a medical code of ethics recommending the etiquette that can be used during treatment.

sourceString: On 19 March, Italy overtook China as the country with the most coronavirus-related deaths in the world after reporting 3,405 fatalities from the pandemic.
targetString: १९ मार्च रोजी इटलीने चीनला जागतिक साथीमुळे ३४०५ मृत्यूंची संख्या नोंदवून जगामधील कोरोना विषाणूमुळे सर्वात जास्त मृत्यू झालेला देश म्हणून मागे टाकले.
en-mt: On March 19, Italy overtook China as the country with the highest death toll from the coronavirus in the world, recording 3,405 deaths from the global pandemic.

sourceString: On 22 March, it was reported that Russia had sent nine military planes with medical equipment to Italy.
targetString: असे नोंदवले गेलं की २२ मार्चला रशियाने वैद्यकीय उपकरणे घेऊन सैन्यदलाची नऊ विमाने इटलीला पाठवली होती.
en-mt: It was reported that on March 22, Russia sent nine military planes carrying medical equipment to Italy.

sourceString: As of 5 April, there were 128,948 confirmed cases, 15,887 deaths, and 21,815 recoveries in Italy, with the majority of those cases occurring in the Lombardy region.
targetString: इटलीमध्ये ५ एप्रिलपर्यंत पुष्टी झालेल्या १२८९४८ केसेस होत्या , १५८८७ मृत्यू झाले होते ,आणि २१८१५ जण बरे झाले होते, आणि त्यातील बहुतांश केसेस ह्या लोम्बार्डयच्या भागात झाल्या होत्या.
en-mt: Italy had 128,948 confirmed cases as of April 5, 15,887 deaths, and 21,815 recoveries, with most of the cases occurring in the Lombardy region.

sourceString: A CNN report indicated that the combination of Italy's large elderly population and inability to test all who have the virus to date may be contributing to the high fatality rate.
targetString: CNN च्या एका अहवालाने असे सूचित केले की इटलीची वृद्ध लोकांची मोठी लोकसंख्या आणि आजपर्यंत ज्या लोकांना विषाणूचा संसर्ग झाला आहे अशा सर्व लोकांच्या चाचण्या करण्याची असमर्थता ही मोठ्या मृत्युदरास कारणीभूत असू शकते.
en-mt: A report by CNN suggested that Italy's large population of elderly people and the inability to test all people who have contracted the virus to date may have contributed to the high death toll.

sourceString: The United Kingdom's response to the virus first emerged as one of the most relaxed of the affected countries, and until 18 March 2020, the British government did not impose any form of social distancing or mass quarantine measures on its citizens.
targetString: युनायटेड किंग्डमचा विषाणूबद्दलचा प्रतिसाद संसर्ग झालेल्या इतर देशांपैकी सर्वात सौम्य प्रतिसाद म्हणून दिसला आणि १८ मार्च २०२० पर्यंत ब्रिटिश सरकारनी कुठल्याही प्रकारचे सामाजिक दुरीकरण किंवा लोकसंख्येचे विलगीकरण त्यांच्या नागरिकांवर लादले नव्हते.
en-mt: The United Kingdom's response to the virus appeared to be one of the mildest of the infected countries, and as of 18 March 2020, the British government had not imposed any form of social distancing or population isolation on its citizens.

sourceString: As a result, the government received criticism for the perceived lack of pace and intensity in its response to concerns faced by the public.On 16 March, Prime Minister Boris Johnson made an announcement advising against all non-essential travel and social contact, suggesting people work from home where possible and avoid venues such as pubs, restaurants, and theatres.
targetString: ह्याचा परिणाम म्हणून सरकारवर लोकांना तोंड द्यावे लागत असलेल्या अडचणींना प्रतिसाद देण्यासाठीचा वेग आणि तीव्रता ओळखण्यात कमी पडल्याची टीका झाली. 16 मार्चला पंतप्रधान बॉरीस जॉन्सन ह्यांनी एक घोषणा केली आणि सर्व अनावश्यक प्रवास आणि सामाजिक संबंध टाळण्याचा सल्ला दिला, लोकांना शक्य असेल तेव्हा घरून काम करण्याचे आणि दारूचे गुत्ते, उपाहारगृहे आणि थिएटरसारखी ठिकाणे टाळण्याचे सुचवले.
en-mt: As a result, the government was criticized for failing to recognize the speed and intensity with which it responded to the problems people were facing. Prime Minister Boris Johnson made an announcement on March 16 advising people to avoid all non-essential travel and social contact, to work from home when possible and to avoid places like bars, restaurants and theatres.

sourceString: On 20 March, the government announced that all leisure establishments such as pubs and gyms were to close as soon as possible, and promised to pay up to 80% of workers' wages to a limit of £2,500 per month to prevent unemployment in the crisis.On 23 March, the Prime Minister announced tougher social distancing measures, banning gatherings of more than two people and restricting travel and outdoor activity to that deemed strictly necessary.
targetString: 20 मार्च रोजी सरकारनी असे जाहीर केलं की दारूचे गुत्ते आणि व्यायामशाळांसारखी मनोरंजनाची सर्व ठिकाणे शक्य तितक्या लवकर बंद केली जावीत आणि दरमहा 2500 पौंडाच्या मर्यादेपर्यंत कामगारांच्या वेतनाच्या 80% रक्कम देण्याचे आश्वासन दिले ज्यायोगे संकटकाळात बेरोजगारी टाळता येईल. 23 मार्च रोजी पंतप्रधानांनी दोनपेक्षा जास्त लोकांनी एकत्र येण्यावर बंदी, प्रवासावर आणि बाहेरील कामावर फक्त आवश्यकतेनुसार मर्यादा असे अधिक कडक सामाजिक अंतरणाचे उपाय जाहीर केले.
en-mt: On 20 March the government announced that all places of entertainment such as pubs and gymnasiums should be closed as soon as possible and promised to pay 80% of workers' wages up to a limit of £2,500 per month to avoid unemployment during the crisis. On March 23, the Prime Minister announced stricter social distancing measures, with a ban on gatherings of more than two people, and restrictions on travel and outside work to only essentials.

sourceString: Unlike previous measures, these restrictions were enforceable by police through the issuing of fines and the dispersal of gatherings.
targetString: पूर्वीच्या उपायांपेक्षा ही वेगळी असून , ही बंधने पोलीस दंड करून आणि जमलेले लोक पांगवून अमलात आणण्यास भाग पाडू शकत होते.
en-mt: Unlike previous measures, these restrictions could be enforced by the police through fines and the dispersal of crowds.

sourceString: Most businesses were ordered to close, with exceptions for businesses deemed "essential", including supermarkets, pharmacies, banks, hardware shops, petrol stations, and garages.
targetString: बहुतांश व्यवसाय बंद करण्याचे आदेश दिले गेले, ज्याला "अत्यावश्यक" मानले गेलेले व्यवसाय अपवाद होते ज्याच्यामध्ये सुपरमार्केट , वैद्यकीय दुकाने ,हार्डवेअरचे दुकाने, पेट्रोल पंप आणि गॅरेजेसचा समावेश होता.
en-mt: Most businesses were ordered to close, with the exception of businesses deemed "essential" which included supermarkets, medical stores, hardware stores, petrol pumps and garages.

sourceString: On 20 January, the first known case of COVID-19 was confirmed in the Pacific Northwest state of Washington in a man who had returned from Wuhan on 15 January.
targetString: कोविड १९च्या पहिल्या ज्ञात केसची पुष्टी २० जानेवारीला वॉशिंग्टनच्या पॅसिफिक नॉर्थवेस्ट स्टेटमध्ये १५ जानेवारीला वुहानहून परत आलेल्या माणसामध्ये झाली.
en-mt: The first known case of Covid-19 was confirmed on January 20 in the Pacific Northwest state of Washington in a man who had returned from Wuhan on January 15.

sourceString: The White House Coronavirus Task Force was established on 29 January.
targetString: २९ जानेवारीला व्हाईट हाउस कोरोनाव्हायरस टास्क फोर्स स्थापन करण्यात आली.
en-mt: The White House Coronavirus Task Force was established on January 29.

sourceString: On 31 January, the Trump administration declared a public health emergency, and placed restrictions on entry for travellers from China.
targetString: ३१ जानेवारी रोजी ट्रम्प प्रशासनाने सार्वजनिक आरोग्य आणीबाणी जाहीर केली आणि चीनहून येणाऱ्या प्रवाशांच्या प्रवेशावर बंधने घातली.
en-mt: On January 31, the Trump administration declared a public health emergency and restricted the entry of travelers from China.

sourceString: On 28 January 2020, the Center for Disease Control—the leading public health institute of the U.S. government—announced they had developed their own testing kit.
targetString: 28 जानेवारी 2020 ला अमेरिकी सरकारची अग्रगण्य सार्वजनिक आरोग्य संस्था रोग नियंत्रण केंद्राने स्वतःची चाचणी सामग्री विकसित केल्याचे जाहीर केले.
en-mt: On January 28, 2020, the Centers for Disease Control, a leading public health agency of the US government, announced that it had developed its own test material.

sourceString: Despite doing so, the United States had a slow start in testing, which obscured the true extent of the outbreak at the time.
targetString: असे करूनही युनायटेड स्टेट्सचा चाचण्यांचा दर कमी असल्याने त्यावेळेची उद्रेकाची खरी व्याप्ती अस्पष्ट होती.
en-mt: Even so, the true extent of the outbreak at the time was unclear due to the United States' low rate of testing.

sourceString: Testing was marred by defective test kits produced by the federal government in February, a lack of federal government approval for non-government test kits (by academia, companies and hospitals) until the end of February, and restrictive criteria for people to qualify for a test until early March (a doctor's order was required thereafter).
targetString: चाचण्यांना संघराज्याच्या सरकारनी फेब्रुवारीमध्ये बनवलेल्या सदोष चाचणी सामग्रीमुळे, बिगर सरकारी चाचणी सामग्रीस (शैक्षणिक संस्था,कंपन्या आणि रुग्णालयांनी बनवलेल्या) संघराज्याच्या सरकारची फेब्रुवारीच्या शेवटपर्यंत मान्यता नसल्याने आणि चाचणी करण्यास पात्र होण्यासाठी लोकांसाठी मार्चच्या सुरुवातीपर्यंत बंधनात्मक निकष असणे (त्यानंतर डॉक्टरचा आदेश गरजेचा झाला) ह्यामुळे गालबोट लागले.
en-mt: The tests were met with controversy because of faulty test materials created by the federal government in February, non-government test materials (made by academic institutions, companies and hospitals) not being approved by the federal government until the end of February, and having mandatory criteria for people to be eligible for the test until early March (after which a doctor's order was required).

sourceString: By 27 February, The Washington Post reported fewer than 4,000 tests had been conducted in the United States.
targetString: २७ जानेवारीपर्यंत वॉशिंग्टन पोस्टने असं नोंदवलं की युनायटेड स्टेट्स मध्ये ४००० पेक्षा कमी चाचण्या केल्या गेल्या होत्या.
en-mt: As of January 27, the Washington Post reported that fewer than 4,000 tests had been conducted in the United States.

sourceString: By 13 March, The Atlantic reported that less than 14,000 tests had been conducted.
targetString: १३ मार्चपर्यंत अटलांटिकने १४००० पेक्षा कमी चाचण्या केल्या गेल्याचे नोंदवले.
en-mt: As of March 13, The Atlantic reported that fewer than 14,000 tests had been conducted.

sourceString: On 22 March, the Associated Press reported: "Many people who have symptoms and a doctor's order have waited hours or days for a test."After the first death in the United States was reported in Washington state on 29 February, Governor Jay Inslee declared a state of emergency, an action that was soon followed by other states.
targetString: 22 मार्च रोजी असोसिएटेड प्रेसने असे नोंदवले की बरीच लक्षणे असलेली लोकं आणि डॉक्टरांचे चाचणी करण्याच्या आदेशांना चाचणीसाठी काही तास ते काही दिवस लागत आहेत. अमेरिकेमध्ये पहिला मृत्यू वॉशिंग्टनमध्ये २९ फेब्रुवरीला नोंदवला गेल्यावर राज्यपाल जे इन्स्ले ह्यांनी राज्यात आणीबाणी जाहीर केली, एक अशी कृती जिचे लवकरच इतर राज्यांनी अनुकरण केले.
en-mt: On March 22, the Associated Press reported that many people with symptoms and doctors' orders to test were taking hours to days for testing. After the first US death was reported in Washington on February 29, Governor Jay Inslee declared a state of emergency, an action that was soon followed by other states.

sourceString: Schools in the Seattle area cancelled classes on 3 March, and by mid-March, schools across the country were shutting down.On 6 March 2020, the United States was advised of projections for the impact of the new coronavirus on the country by a group of epidemiologists at Imperial College London.
targetString: सिएटल भागातील शाळांमधील वर्ग ३ मार्च रोजी रद्द केले आणि मार्चच्या मध्यावर संपूर्ण देशामधील शाळा बंद होत होत्या. ६ मार्च २०२० रोजी लंडनच्या इंपिरिअल कॉलेजच्या साथीच्या रोगाच्या तज्ज्ञांनी यूएसला ह्या नवीन कोरोना विषाणूचा देशावर काय परिणाम होऊ शकतो ह्याबद्दल भविष्यातील संभाव्य गोष्टींविषयी सल्ला दिला.
en-mt: Schools in the Seattle area canceled classes on March 3, and schools across the country were closing in mid-March. On March 6, 2020, epidemiologists from Imperial College London advised the US on future prospects for how the new corona virus could affect the country.

sourceString: On the same day President Trump signed the Coronavirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriations Act, which provided $8.3 billion in emergency funding for federal agencies to respond to the outbreak.
targetString: त्याच दिवशी अध्यक्ष ट्रम्प ह्यांनी कोरोनाव्हायरस प्रिपरेडनेस अँड रिस्पॉन्स सप्लिमेंटल अप्रोप्रिएशन्स ऍक्टवर सही केली,ज्यामुळे उद्रेकास तोंड देण्यासाठी संघराज्याच्या एजन्सीजना ८.३ $ चा निकडीचा निधी मिळाला.
en-mt: On the same day, President Trump signed the Coronavirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriations Act, which provided $8.3 billion in emergency funding to federal agencies responding to the outbreak.

sourceString: Corporations imposed employee travel restrictions, cancelled conferences, and encouraged employees to work from home.
targetString: कंपन्यांनी कर्मचाऱ्यांच्या प्रवासावर बंधने घातली,परिषद रद्द केल्या आणि कर्मचाऱ्यांना घरून काम करण्यास प्रोत्साहित केले.
en-mt: Companies have restricted employee travel, canceled conferences and encouraged employees to work from home.

sourceString: Sports events and seasons were cancelled.On 11 March, Trump announced travel restrictions for most of Europe, excluding the United Kingdom, for 30 days, effective 13 March.
targetString: खेळाचे कार्यक्रम आणि मोसम रद्द केले गेले.११मार्च रोजी ट्रम्पनी युनायटेड किंग्डम सोडून बहुतांश युरोपसाठी १३ मार्च पासून ३० दिवसांसाठी प्रवासावर मर्यादा जाहीर केल्या.
en-mt: Sports events and seasons were cancelled. On March 11, Trump announced travel restrictions for most of Europe, except the United Kingdom, for 30 days beginning March 13.

sourceString: The following day, he expanded the restrictions to include the United Kingdom and Ireland.
targetString: दुसऱ्या दिवशी त्यांनी बंधने वाढवून त्यामध्ये युनायटेड किंग्डम आणि आयर्लंडचा सामावेश केला.
en-mt: The next day they expanded the restrictions to include the United Kingdom and Ireland.

sourceString: On 13 March, he declared a national emergency, which made federal funds available to respond to the crisis.
targetString: 13 मार्चला त्यांनी राष्ट्रीय आणीबाणी घोषित केल्याने संकटाला तोंड देण्यासाठी संघराज्याच्या निधीदेखील उपलब्ध झाला.
en-mt: His declaration of a national emergency on March 13 also made federal funds available to deal with the crisis.

sourceString: Beginning on 15 March, many businesses closed or reduced hours throughout the U.S. to try to reduce the spread of the virus.
targetString: १५ मार्चच्या सुरुवातीला विषाणूचा प्रसार कमी करण्यासाठी संपूर्ण युएसमध्ये अनेक व्यवसाय बंद झाले किंवा त्यांनी कामाचे तास कमी केले.
en-mt: As of early March 15, many businesses across the US closed or reduced hours to slow the spread of the virus.

sourceString: By 17 March, the epidemic had been confirmed in all 50 states and in the District of Columbia.On 23 March, it was reported that New York City had 10,700 cases of the coronavirus, more than the total number of cases in South Korea.
targetString: 17 मार्चपर्यंत सर्व 50 राज्यांमध्ये आणि कोलंबिया जिल्ह्यामध्ये पुष्टी मिळाली होती. 23 मार्चला असे नोंदवले गेले की न्यूयॉर्क शहरामध्ये कोरोना विषाणूची 10700 प्रकरणे होती जी दक्षिण कोरियाच्या एकूण प्रकरणांपेक्षा जास्त होत्या.
en-mt: As of March 17, all 50 states and the District of Columbia had been confirmed. On March 23, it was reported that New York City had 10,700 cases of the corona virus, which was more than the total number of cases in South Korea.

sourceString: On 25 March, the governor said that social distancing seemed to be working, as estimates of case doubling slowed from 2.0 days to 4.7 days.
targetString: २५ मार्च रोजी राज्यपालांनी सांगितले की सामाजिक दुरीकरणाने फरक पडत असल्याचे वाटत आहे, कारण केसेस दुप्पट होण्याचे अंदाज २.० दिवसांवरून ४.७ दिवसांपर्यंत कमी झाले.
en-mt: On March 25, the governor said that social distancing seemed to be making a difference, as the estimate for the doubling of cases decreased from 2.0 days to 4.7 days.

sourceString: As of 28 March, there were 32,308 confirmed cases in New York City, and 672 people had died from the virus.On 26 March, the United States was reported to have more confirmed coronavirus infection cases than any other country in the world, including China and Italy.As of 8 April, 400,335 cases have been confirmed in the United States, and 12,841 people have died.
targetString: २८ मार्चपर्यंत , न्यूयॉर्क शहरामध्ये ३२३०८ पुष्टी झालेल्या केसेस होत्या , आणि ६७२ लोक विषाणूमुळे मरण पावले होते.२६ मार्चला युनायटेड स्टेट्समध्ये जगामध्ये चीन आणि इटलीसह कोरोना विषाणूचा संसर्ग झाल्याची पुष्टी झालेल्या कोणत्याही देशापेक्षा जास्त केसेस होत्या असे नोंदवले गेले. ८ एप्रिलपर्यंत युनायटेड स्टेट्स मध्ये पुष्टी झालेल्या ४०००३३५ केसेस असून १२८४१ लोक मरण पावले आहेत.
en-mt: As of March 28, New York City had 32308 confirmed cases, and 672 people had died from the virus. On March 26, the United States reported more confirmed cases of the coronavirus than any other country in the world, including China and Italy. As of April 8, the United States has 4,000,335 confirmed cases and 12,841 deaths.

sourceString: Per media reports on 30 March, U.S. President Trump has decided to extend social distancing guidelines until 30 April.
targetString: ३० मार्चच्या माध्यमांच्या अहवालानुसार यूएसचे अध्यक्ष ट्रम्प ह्यांनी सामाजिक दुरीकरणाच्या मार्गदर्शक सूचना ३० एप्रिलपर्यंत वाढवल्या आहेत.
en-mt: US President Trump has extended social distancing guidelines till April 30, according to media reports on March 30.

sourceString: On the same day, the USNS Comfort, a hospital ship with about 1000 beds, made anchor in New York.
targetString: त्याच दिवशी युएसएनएस कम्फर्ट ह्या १००० खाटा असलेल्या रुग्णालय असलेल्या जहाज न्यूयॉर्कमध्ये दाखल झाले.
en-mt: On the same day, USNS Comfort, a 1000-bed hospital ship, arrived in New York.

sourceString: On 3 April, the U.S. had a record 884 deaths due to the coronavirus in a 24-hour period.
targetString: ३ एप्रिल रोजी यूएस मध्ये कोरोना विषाणूमुळे २४ तासांमधील विक्रमी ८८४ इतकी मृत्युसंख्या नोंदवली गेली.
en-mt: On April 3, the US recorded a record 24-hour death toll of 884 due to the corona virus.

sourceString: In the state of New York the cases have exceeded 100,000 people on 3 April.The White House has been criticized for downplaying the threat and controlling the messaging by directing health officials and scientists to coordinate public statements and publications related to the virus with the office of Vice-President Mike Pence.
targetString: 3 एप्रिल रोजी न्यूयॉर्क राज्यामधील प्रकरणांची संख्या 100000 पार झाली आहे. व्हाईट हाऊसवर धोक्याची तीव्रता कमी दाखवण्याबद्दल आणि थेट आरोग्य अधिकाऱ्यांकडून आणि शास्त्रज्ञांकडून दिल्या जाणाऱ्या संदेशांवर नियंत्रण ठेऊन विषाणूशी संबंधित जनतेसाठीची निवेदने आणि प्रसिद्धीपत्रके ह्यांचा उपाध्यक्ष माईक पेन्स ह्यांच्या कार्शीयालयाशी समन्वय करण्याबद्दल टीका होत आहे.
en-mt: As of April 3, the number of cases in New York state has crossed 100,000. The White House has been criticized for downplaying the threat and coordinating public statements and press releases related to the virus with Vice President Mike Pence's office while controlling messages directly from health officials and scientists.

sourceString: Overall approval of Trump's management of the crisis has been polarized along partisan lines.
targetString: एकूणच ट्रम्प प्रशासनाची संकटाविषयी मान्यता ही ध्रुवीकृत आणि पक्षपाती होती.
en-mt: Overall, the Trump administration's response to the crisis has been polarized and partisan.

sourceString: Some U.S. officials and commentators criticized the U.S. reliance on importation of critical materials, including essential medical supplies, from China.
targetString: काही यूएस अधिकारी आणि भाष्यकारांनी युएसच्या चीनकडून महत्वाच्या गोष्टी आयात करण्यासाठी अवलंबून राहण्यावर टीका केली ज्यामध्ये महत्वाच्या वैद्यकीय पुरवठाच्या वस्तूंचा समावेश होता.
en-mt: Some US officials and commentators have criticized the US' reliance on China for vital imports, including critical medical supplies.

sourceString: An analysis of air travel patterns was used to map and predict patterns of spread and was published in The Journal of Travel Medicine in mid-January 2020.
targetString: हवाई प्रवासाच्या नमुन्यांच्या विश्लेषणाचा प्रसाराचा मग काढण्यासाठी आणि प्रसाराची व्याप्ती ठरविण्यासाठी उपयोग केला गेला आणि ते विश्लेषण द जर्नल ऑफ ट्रॅव्हल मेडिसिनमध्ये जानेवारीच्या मध्यावर प्रसिद्ध करण्यात आले.
en-mt: An analysis of air travel patterns was used to map the spread and determine the extent of the spread, and the analysis was published in mid-January in The Journal of Travel Medicine.

sourceString: Based on 2018 information from the International Air Transport Association, Bangkok, Hong Kong, Tokyo, and Taipei had the largest volume of travellers from Wuhan.
targetString: इंटरनॅशनल एअर ट्रान्सपोर्ट असोसिएशनच्या २०१८ च्या माहितीनुसार वुहानहून बँकॉक ,हाँगकाँग,टोकियो आणि तायपेई येथे जाणारे प्रवासी सर्वात जास्त होते.
en-mt: According to the International Air Transport Association's 2018 data, the most passengers from Wuhan were to Bangkok, Hong Kong, Tokyo and Taipei.

sourceString: Dubai, Sydney, and Melbourne were also reported as popular destinations for people travelling from Wuhan.
targetString: दुबई,सिडनी ,आणि मेलबर्न हीदेखील वुहानहुन प्रवास करणाऱ्या लोकांची लोकप्रिय ठिकाणे असल्याचे नोंदवले होते.
en-mt: Dubai, Sydney, and Melbourne were also reported to be popular destinations for people traveling from Wuhan.

sourceString: Bali was reported as least able among the 20 most popular destination cities in terms of preparedness, while cities in Australia were considered most able.Australia released its Emergency Response Plan for Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) on 7 February.
targetString: २० सर्वात लोकप्रिय ठिकाणांपैकी बाली हे संसर्गास तोंड देण्यास सर्वात अक्षम म्हणून नोंदवले गेले तर ऑस्ट्रियामधील शहरे सर्वात सक्षम म्हणून नोंदवली गेली. ऑस्ट्रेलियाने ७ फेब्रुवारीला त्यांची अभूतपूर्व कोरोना विषाणूबद्दलची (कोविड १९) निकडीची प्रतिसाद योजना जाहीर केली
en-mt: Of the 20 most popular destinations, Bali was reported as the least able to deal with the infection, while cities in Austria were reported as the most able. Australia on February 7 announced its unprecedented Corona Virus (Covid-19) Emergency Response Plan

sourceString: It stated that much was yet to be discovered about COVID-19, and that Australia would emphasize border control and communication in its response to the pandemic.
targetString: त्यात असे म्हटले होते की COVID-19 बद्दल अजून बरेच संशोधन बाकी होते आणि ऑस्ट्रेलिया सीमारेषा नियंत्रणावर ह्या जागतिक साथीच्या त्यांच्या प्रतिसादाची माहिती देण्यावर भर देईल.
en-mt: It said there was still much research to be done on COVID-19 and Australia would focus on border controls to inform their response to the global pandemic.

sourceString: On 21 March, a human biosecurity emergency was declared in Australia.
targetString: 21 मार्चला ऑस्ट्रेलियामध्ये मानवी जैविक सुरक्षेची आणीबाणी जाहीर करण्यात आली.
en-mt: A human biosecurity emergency was declared in Australia on 21 March.

sourceString: Owing to the effective quarantine of public transport in Wuhan and Hubei, several countries have planned to evacuate their citizens and diplomatic staff from the area, primarily through chartered flights of the home nation, with Chinese authorities providing clearance.
targetString: वुहान आणि हुबेईमधील सार्वजनिक वाहतूक व्यवस्थेच्या परिणामकारक विलगीकरणामुळे बऱ्याच देशांनी त्यांच्या नागरिकांना आणि परराष्ट्राविषयक कर्मचाऱ्यांना त्या भागातून मुख्यत्वेकरून मातृदेशाच्या चार्टर्ड उड्डाणाच्या माध्यमातून आणि चिनी अधिकाऱ्यांच्या संमतीने हलविण्याची योजना केलेली आहे
en-mt: Due to the effective isolation of the public transport system between Wuhan and Hubei, many countries plan to move their nationals and foreign staff from the area, mainly via chartered flights from the mother country and with the consent of the Chinese authorities.

sourceString: Canada, the United States, Japan, India, Sri Lanka, Australia, France, Argentina, Germany, and Thailand were among the first to plan the evacuation of their citizens.
targetString: कॅनडा , युनायटेड स्टेट्स ,जपान ,इंडिया ,श्री लंका ,ऑस्ट्रेलिया,फ्रान्स ,अर्जेन्टिना,जर्मनी,आणि थायलंड हे देश स्वतःच्या नागरिकांना हलविण्याची योजना करणाऱ्या देशांमध्ये पहिले होते.
en-mt: Canada, the United States, Japan, India, Sri Lanka, Australia, France, Argentina, Germany, and Thailand were among the first countries to plan to relocate their citizens.

sourceString: Pakistan has said that it will not be evacuating any citizens from China.
targetString: पाकिस्तानने असं म्हटले आहे की ते त्यांच्या कोणत्याही नागरिकास चीनमधून हलविणार नाहीत.
en-mt: Pakistan has said that it will not evacuate any of its citizens from China.

sourceString: On 7 February, Brazil evacuated 34 Brazilians or family members in addition to four Poles, a Chinese person, and an Indian citizen.
targetString: 7 फेब्रुवारीला ब्राझीलने ४ पोलंडच्या नागरिकांना, एका चिनी व्यक्तीला आणि एका भारतीय नागरिकासह ब्राझीलच्या 34 नागरिकांना किंवा त्यांच्या कुटुंबियांना हलविले.
en-mt: On February 7, Brazil evacuated 34 Brazilian nationals or their families, including 4 Polish nationals, one Chinese national and one Indian national.

sourceString: The citizens of Poland, China, and India deplaned in Poland, where the Brazilian plane made a stopover before following its route to Brazil.
targetString: पोलंड,चीन आणि भारताचे नागरिक पोलंडमध्ये उतरले जिथे ब्राझीलचे विमान ब्राझीलला मार्गस्थ होण्यापूर्वी थांबले होते.
en-mt: Citizens of Poland, China and India landed in Poland where the Brazilian plane had stopped before en route to Brazil.

sourceString: Brazilian citizens who went to Wuhan were quarantined at a military base near Brasília.
targetString: ब्राझीलचेजे नागरिक वुहानला जाऊन आले होते त्यांना ब्राझिलियाजवळील सैन्यातळावर विलग करून ठेवण्यात आले होते.
en-mt: Brazilian nationals who had traveled to Wuhan were quarantined at a military base near Brasilia.

sourceString: On the same day, 215 Canadians (176 from the first plane, and 39 from a second plane chartered by the U.S. government) were evacuated from Wuhan to CFB Trenton to be quarantined for two weeks.
targetString: त्याच दिवशी कॅनडाचे 215 नागरिक (पहिल्या विमानातून 176 आणि US सरकारच्या भाड्याने दिलेल्या दुसऱ्या विमानाने 39) वुहानहून CFB ट्रेंटनला दोन आठवडे विलग करण्यासाठी हलविण्यात आले.
en-mt: On the same day, 215 Canadian citizens (176 on the first plane and 39 on the second plane chartered by the US government) were moved from Wuhan to CFB Trenton for two weeks of isolation.

sourceString: On 11 February, another plane of 185 Canadians from Wuhan landed at CFB Trenton.
targetString: 11 फेब्रुवारीला 185 कॅनेडियन नागरिकांना वुहानहून घेऊन आलेले आणखी एक विमान CFB ट्रेंटन येथे उतरले.
en-mt: On February 11, another flight carrying 185 Canadian citizens from Wuhan landed at CFB Trenton.

sourceString: Australian authorities evacuated 277 citizens on 3 and 4 February to the Christmas Island Detention Centre, which had been repurposed as a quarantine facility, where they remained for 14 days.
targetString: ऑस्ट्रेलियन अधिकाऱ्यांनी 3 आणि 4 फेब्रुवारीला 277 नागरिकांना ख्रिसमस आयलंड डिटेन्शन सेंटरला हलवले, ज्यास विलगीकरण सुविधा म्हणून पुन्हा करण्यात आले होते, तिथे ते नागरिक 14 दिवस राहिले.
en-mt: On 3 and 4 February, Australian authorities moved 277 nationals to the Christmas Island detention center, which had been repurposed as an isolation facility, where they remained for 14 days.

sourceString: A New Zealand evacuation flight arrived in Auckland on 5 February; its passengers (including some from Australia and the Pacific) were quarantined at a naval base in Whangaparoa, north of Auckland.
targetString: 5 फेब्रुवारीला जेव्हा न्यूझीलंडचे लोकांना स्थलांतरित करणारे विमान ऑकलंडला आले तेव्हा त्यातील प्रवाशांना (ज्यात काही ऑस्ट्रेलियाच्या आणि पॅसिफिकच्या नागरिकांचा समावेश होता.) वांगापरोआ, उत्तर ऑकलंड येथे नाविक दलाच्या तळावर विलगीकरण करून ठेवले गेले.
en-mt: When a plane evacuating New Zealanders arrived in Auckland on 5 February, its passengers (including some Australian and Pacific nationals) were quarantined at the naval base at Whangaparoa, north of Auckland.

sourceString: On 15 February, the United States announced that it would evacuate Americans aboard the cruise ship Diamond Princess.
targetString: १५ फेब्रुवारीला , युनायटेड स्टेट्सनी असे घोषित केले की ते डायमंड एक्सप्रेस ह्या समुद्रपर्यटनाच्या जहाजावरील अमेरिकन नागरिकांना हलवतील.
en-mt: On February 15, the United States announced that it would evacuate American citizens on board the Diamond Express cruise ship.

sourceString: On 21 February, a plane carrying 129 Canadian passengers who had been evacuated from Diamond Princess landed in Trenton, Ontario.
targetString: 21 फेब्रुवारीला डायमंड प्रिंसेसवरून हलविलेल्या 129 कॅनेडियन प्रवाशांना घेऊन येणारे विमान ट्रेंटन,ऑंटेरियो येथे उतरले.
en-mt: On February 21, a plane carrying 129 Canadian passengers transferred from the Diamond Princess landed in Trenton, Ontario.

sourceString: In early March, the Indian government began evacuating its citizens from Iran.On 14 March a South African Airways aircraft chartered by the South African Government repatriated 112 South African citizens.
targetString: मार्चच्या सुरुवातीला भारतीय सरकारनी आपल्या नागरिकांना इराणहून हलविण्यास सुरुवात केली. १४ मार्चला साऊथ आफ्रिकन सरकारनी अधिकृत केलेलं साऊथ आफ्रिकन एयरवेजचे विमान ११२ साऊथ आफ्रिकन नागरिकांना स्वदेशी घेऊन गेलं.
en-mt: In early March, the Indian government began evacuating its citizens from Iran. On March 14, a South African Airways flight authorized by the South African government repatriated 112 South African citizens.

sourceString: Medical screening was performed prior to departure, and four South Africans who were showing signs of coronavirus were left behind to mitigate risk.
targetString: निर्गमनापूर्वी वैद्यकीय चाचण्या करण्यात आल्या आणि चार साऊथ आफ्रिकन नागरिक जे कोरोना विषाणूची चिन्हे दाखवत होते त्यांना धोका टाळण्यासाठी मागे ठेवण्यात आले.
en-mt: Medical tests were carried out before departure and four South African nationals who were showing symptoms of the corona virus were kept back to avoid danger.

sourceString: Only South Africans who tested negative were repatriated.
targetString: फक्त ज्या साऊथ आफ्रिकन नागरिकांची चाचणी नकारात्मक आली त्यांनाच स्वदेशी परत नेण्यात आले.
en-mt: Only South Africans who tested negative were repatriated.

sourceString: Test results cleared all the South Africans, including the flight crew, pilots, hotel staff, police and soldiers involved in the humanitarian mission who, as a precautionary measure, all remained under observation and in quarantine for a 14-day period at The Ranch Resort.
targetString: चाचण्यांच्या निकालांनी सर्व साऊथ आफ्रिकन नागरिकांना मुक्त केले ज्यामध्ये विमानातील कर्मचारी, हॉटेलचे कर्मचारी, पोलीस आणि सैनिक ज्यांचा ह्या मानवतावादी मोहिमेत सामावेश होता आणि जे खबरदारीचा उपाय म्हणून निरीक्षणाखाली आणि 14 दिवस विलगीकरण कालावधीसाठी द रँच रिसॉर्ट येथे राहिले.
en-mt: The results of the tests freed all South African nationals including flight attendants, hotel staff, police and soldiers who were involved in the humanitarian mission and who remained at The Ranch Resort under observation and a 14-day isolation period as a precautionary measure.

sourceString: On 20 March, the United States began to partially withdrawal its troops from Iraq due to the pandemic.
targetString: २० मार्चला , जागतिक साथीमुळे युनायटेड स्टेट्सनी त्यांच्या सैन्यदलांना इराकमधून अंशतः काढून घेण्यास सुरुवात केली.
en-mt: On March 20, the United States began a partial withdrawal of its forces from Iraq due to the global pandemic.

sourceString: On 5 February, the Chinese foreign ministry stated that 21 countries (including Belarus, Pakistan, Trinidad and Tobago, Egypt, and Iran) had sent aid to China.
targetString: 5 फेब्रुवारीला, चायनीज परराष्ट्र मंत्र्यानी असे निवेदन केले की 21 देशांनी (ज्यात बेलारूस, पाकिस्तान, त्रिनिदाद आणि टोबॅगो, इजिप्त आणि इराणचा समावेश होता) चीनला वैद्यकीय मदत पाठविली.
en-mt: On February 5, the Chinese Foreign Minister stated that 21 countries (including Belarus, Pakistan, Trinidad and Tobago, Egypt, and Iran) had sent medical aid to China.

sourceString: Some Chinese students at American universities joined together to help send aid to virus-stricken parts of China, with a joint group in the greater Chicago area reportedly managing to send 50,000 N95 masks to hospitals in the Hubei province on 30 January.The humanitarian aid organization Direct Relief, in coordination with FedEx, sent 200,000 face masks along with other personal protective equipment, including gloves and gowns, by emergency airlift to the Wuhan Union Hospital by 30 January.
targetString: अमेरिकन विद्यापीठांमधील काही चायनीज विद्यार्थी चीनमधील विषाणूग्रस्त भागाला मदत पाठवण्यासाठी ग्रेटर शिकागोमधील एका संयुक्त गटाबरोबर एकत्र आले जो गट कथितपणे 30 जानेवारीला हुबेई प्रांतामधल्या रुग्णालयांना 50000 N 95 मास्क्स पाठवण्याचे व्यवस्थापन करत होता. मानवतावादी मदत करणारी संस्था डायरेक्ट रिलीफने फेडेक्सबरोबर समन्वय साधून 30 जानेवारीला आणीबाणीसाठीच्या विमानांतून हातमोजे आणि झग्यांसारख्या इतर वैयक्तिक संरक्षणात्मक उपकरणांबरोबर 200000 चेहऱ्याचे मुखवटे वुहान युनिअन हॉस्पिटलला पाठवले.
en-mt: Some Chinese students at American universities joined forces with a joint group in Greater Chicago to send aid to the virus-hit area of China, which reportedly managed to send 50,000 N95 masks to hospitals in Hubei province on January 30. The humanitarian aid organization Direct Relief coordinated with FedEx to send 200,000 face masks to Wuhan Union Hospital on January 30 via emergency planes, along with other personal protective equipment such as gloves and gowns.

sourceString: On 5 February, Bill and Melinda Gates announced a $100 million donation to the WHO to fund vaccine research and treatment efforts along with protecting "at-risk populations in Africa and South Asia".
targetString: ५ फेब्रुवारीला बिल आणि मेलिंडा गेट्स ह्यांनी डब्लूएचओला लस संशोधन आणि आफ्रिका आणि साऊथ आफ्रिकेतील धोक्यात असलेल्या लोकसंख्येच्या संरक्षणासह उपचारांच्या प्रयत्नांबद्दलच्या निधीसाठी १०० दशलक्ष $ ची देणगी दिली.
en-mt: On February 5, Bill and Melinda Gates donated $100 million to the WHO to fund vaccine research and treatment efforts, including the protection of at-risk populations in Africa and South Africa.

sourceString: Interaksyon reported that the Chinese government donated 200,000 masks to the Philippines on 6 February, after Senator Richard Gordon shipped 3.16 million masks to Wuhan.
targetString: इंटराक्सयोनी असे नोंदवले की सिनेटचे सदस्य रिचर्ड गॉर्डननी वुहानला 3.16 दशलक्ष मुखवटे पाठवल्यानंतर 6 फेब्रुवारीला चिनी सरकारने 200000 मुखवटे फिलिपिन्सला देणगी म्हणून दिले.
en-mt: Interaksyoni reported that the Chinese government donated 200,000 masks to the Philippines on February 6, after Senator Richard Gordon sent 3.16 million masks to Wuhan.

sourceString: On 19 February, the Singapore Red Cross announced that it would send $2.26 million worth of aid to China.
targetString: १९ फेब्रूवारीला सिंगापूरच्या रेड क्रॉनी असे जाहीर केलं की ते चीनला २.२६ दशलक्ष किमतीची मदत पाठवतील.
en-mt: On February 19, Singapore's red cronies announced that they would send aid worth 2.26 million to China.

sourceString: Japan donated one million face masks to Wuhan, Turkey dispatched medical equipment, Russia sent more than 13 tonnes of medical supplies to Wuhan, Malaysia announced a donation of 18 million medical gloves to China, Germany delivered various medical supplies including 10,000 Hazmat suits, and the United States donated 17.8 tons of medical supplies to China and promised an additional $100 million in financial support to affected countries.After cases in China seemed to stabilize, the country has been sending aid to various nations hit by the pandemic.
targetString: जपानने वुहानला देणगी म्हणून एक दशलक्ष चेहऱ्याचे मुखवटे पाठवले, टर्कीने वैद्यकीय उपकरणे पाठविली , रशियाने वुहानला १३ टनाहून अधिक वैद्यकीय पुरवठ्याच्या वस्तू पाठवल्या, मलेशियानी चीनला १८ दशलक्ष वैद्यकीय हातमोजांची देणगी जाहीर केली,जर्मनीने धोकादायक गोष्टींपासून संरक्षण करायच्या कपड्यांसह १०००० बऱ्याच प्रकारच्या वैद्यकीय पुरवठ्याच्या वस्तू पोहोचवल्या , युनायटेड स्टेट्सनी १७.८ टन वैद्यकीय पुरवठ्याच्या वस्तू चीनला देणगीदाखल दिल्या आणि असे आश्वासन दिले की अजून १०० दशलक्ष $ आर्थिक मदतीच्या स्वरूपात परिणाम झालेल्या देशांना दिले जातील. चीनमधील केसेस स्थिर होत आहेत असे दिसल्यावर चीनने ह्या जागतिक साथीच्या रोगाने पछाडलेल्या विविध देशांना मदत पाठवायला सुरुवात केली आहे.
en-mt: Japan sent a million face masks as a donation to Wuhan, Turkey sent medical equipment, Russia sent more than 13 tons of medical supplies to Wuhan, Malaysia announced a donation of 18 million medical gloves to China, Germany delivered 10,000 medical supplies including protective clothing, United The United States donated 17.8 tons of medical supplies to China and promised another $100 million in financial aid to affected countries. As the cases in China appear to be stabilizing, China has started sending aid to various countries affected by the global pandemic.

sourceString: In March, China, Cuba and Russia sent medical supplies and experts to help Italy deal with its coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: मार्चमध्ये चीन,क्युबा आणि रशियाने इटलीला कोरोना विषाणूच्या उद्रेकास तोंड देण्यासाठी वैद्यकीय पुरवठा आणि तज्ज्ञ पाठवले.
en-mt: In March, China, Cuba and Russia sent medical supplies and experts to Italy to combat the coronavirus outbreak.

sourceString: Businessman Jack Ma sent 1.1 million testing kits, 6 million face masks, and 60,000 protective suits to Addis Ababa, Ethiopia for distribution by the African Union.
targetString: व्यावसायिक जॅक मा ह्यांनी आदीस अबाबा इथिओपियाला १.१ दशलक्ष चाचण्यांची सामग्री,६ दशलक्ष चेहऱ्याचे मुखवटे आणि ६०००० संरक्षणाचे कपडे आफ्रिकन युनिअनतर्फे वाटपासाठी पाठवले.
en-mt: Businessman Jack Ma sent 1.1 million test kits, 6 million face masks and 60,000 protective clothing to Addis Ababa, Ethiopia for distribution by the African Union.

sourceString: He later sent 5,000 testing kits, 100,000 face masks and 5 ventilators to Panama.
targetString: त्यांनी नंतर पनामाला ५००० चाचण्यांची सामग्री ,१००००० चेहऱ्याचे मुखवटे आणि ५ व्हेंटिलेटर पाठवले.
en-mt: They later sent 5000 test kits, 100000 face masks and 5 ventilators to Panama.

sourceString: Ma also donated medical supplies to Canada.The Netherlands, Spain, Turkey, Georgia, and the Czech Republic expressed their concerns over Chinese-made masks and test kits.
targetString: मा ह्यांनी कॅनडाला देखील वैद्यकीय पुरवठ्याच्या वस्तू देणगीदाखल दिल्या. नेदरलँडज,स्पेन,टर्की,जॉर्जिया आणि झेक रिपब्लिक ह्यांनी चिनी बनावटीचे मुखवटे आणि चाचणी सामग्रीबाबत चिंता व्यक्त केली.
en-mt: Ma also donated medical supplies to Canada. The Netherlands, Spain, Turkey, Georgia and the Czech Republic have expressed concern about Chinese-made masks and test materials.

sourceString: For instance, Spain withdrew 58,000 Chinese-made coronavirus testing kits with an accuracy rate of just 30%, meanwhile, the Netherlands recalled 600,000 Chinese face masks which were defective.
targetString: उदाहरणार्थ, स्पेनने चिनी बनावटीची ५८००० कोरोना विषाणूच्या चाचण्यांची सामग्री काढून घेतली ज्यांचा अचूकतेचा दर केवळ ३०% होता, दरम्यान नेदर्लँडजनी चिनी बनावटीचे सदोष असलेले ६००००० चेहऱ्याचे मुखवटे परत मागवले.
en-mt: For example, Spain recalled 58,000 Chinese-made coronavirus tests that had an accuracy rate of only 30%, while the Netherlands recalled 6,000 defective Chinese-made face masks.

sourceString: Belgium recalled 100,000 unusable masks, thought to be from China, but were in fact from Colombia.
targetString: बेल्जीयमनी १००००० वापरण्यास अयोग्य असे मुखवटे परत मागवले जे चीनहून आले असल्याचे मानले जात होते परंतु वास्तविक जे कोलंबियाहून आले होते.
en-mt: Belgium recalled 100,000 unusable masks that were believed to have come from China but actually came from Colombia.

sourceString: On the other hand, Chinese aid has been well-received in parts of Latin America and Africa.On 2 April, the World Bank launched emergency support operations for developing countries.
targetString: तर दुसरीकडे ,चिनी मदतीला लॅटिन अमेरिका आणि आफ्रिकेच्या भागांमध्ये चांगला प्रतिसाद मिळाला. २ एप्रिल रोजी जागतिक बँकेने विकसित देशांसाठी तातडीची मदत देण्याची कृती सुरुवात केली.
en-mt: On the other hand, Chinese aid has been well received in parts of Latin America and Africa. On April 2, the World Bank began operations to provide emergency aid to developed countries.

sourceString: The WHO has commended the efforts of Chinese authorities in managing and containing the epidemic.
targetString: डब्लूएचओने चिनी अधिकाऱ्यांच्या साथीच्या रोगाचे व्यवस्थापन आणि प्रतिबंध करण्याच्या प्रयत्नांचे कौतुक केले.
en-mt: The WHO praised the efforts of the Chinese authorities to manage and prevent the epidemic.

sourceString: The WHO noted the contrast between the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak, where Chinese authorities were accused of secrecy that impeded prevention and containment efforts, and the current crisis where the central government "has provided regular updates to avoid panic ahead of Lunar New Year holidays".
targetString: WHO ने 2002-2004 च्या दरम्यानच्या SARS उद्रेकामधील तफावत नोंदवली जेव्हा चिनी अधिकाऱ्यांवर गुप्ततेचा आरोप केला गेला होता ज्यामुळे रोगाचा प्रतिबंध करून रोग ताब्यात ठेवण्याच्या प्रयत्नामध्ये अडचणी आल्या आणि सध्याचे संकट जिथे केंद्रीय सरकारने सौर नववर्षाच्या तोंडावर घबराट टाळण्यासाठी नियमित माहिती पुरवली.
en-mt: The WHO noted the contrast between the SARS outbreak between 2002-2004 when Chinese officials were accused of secrecy that hampered efforts to contain the disease and the current crisis where the central government provided routine information to avoid panic in the run-up to the Solar New Year.

sourceString: On 23 January, in reaction to the central authorities' decision to implement a transportation ban in Wuhan, WHO representative Gauden Galea remarked that while it was "certainly not a recommendation the WHO has made", it was also "a very important indication of the commitment to contain the epidemic in the place where it is most concentrated" and called it "unprecedented in public health history".On 30 January, following confirmation of human-to-human transmission outside China and the increase in the number of cases in other countries, the WHO declared the outbreak a Public Health Emergency of International Concern (PHEIC), the sixth PHEIC since the measure was first invoked during the 2009 swine flu pandemic.
targetString: 23 जानेवारीला केंद्रीय अधिकाऱ्यांच्या वुहानमध्ये वाहतुकीवर बंदी घालण्याच्या निर्णयाला प्रतिक्रिया म्हणून डब्लूएचओ प्रतिनिधी गॉडेन गेली ह्यांनी म्हटले की ही डब्लूएचओने केलेली शिफारस खचितच नव्हती आणि हे जिथे साथरोगचा प्रादुर्भाव सगळ्यात जास्त आहे तिथे साथ ताब्यात आणण्याच्या वाचनबद्धतेचं द्योतक होतं आणि ह्यास "सार्वजनिक आरोग्य इतिहासामधली अभूतपूर्व घटना" असे म्हटले.३० जानेवारीला चीनमधील मानवाकडून मानवाला होणाऱ्या संक्रमणाची पुष्टी मिळाल्यानंतर आणि इतर देशात केसची संख्या वाढल्यानंतर , डब्लूएचओने ह्या उद्रेकास आंतरराष्ट्रीय चिंतेची सार्वजनिक आरोग्य आणीबाणी (पीएचइआयसी) म्हणून जाहीर केले, जी २००९ दरम्यानच्या स्वाईन फ्लू ह्या जागतिक साथरोगाच्या वेळेस पहिल्यांदा उपाययोजना लागू केल्यानंतरची सहावी पीएचइआयसी होती.
en-mt: Reacting to central authorities' January 23 decision to impose a travel ban on Wuhan, WHO representative Godden Geley said the WHO recommendation was unfounded and showed a willingness to contain the virus where the epidemic is most prevalent, calling it an "unprecedented event in public health history". .On January 30, after human-to-human transmission was confirmed in China and the number of cases in other countries increased, the WHO declared the outbreak a Public Health Emergency of International Concern (PHEIC), the sixth PHEIC since measures were first imposed during the global pandemic of swine flu in 2009.

sourceString: WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom said that the PHEIC was due to "the risk of global spread, especially to low- and middle-income countries without robust health systems.
targetString: डब्लूएचओ डायरेक्टर जनरल टेड्रोस अधानोम म्हणाले की पीएचइआयसी हे जागतिक प्रसाराच्या धोक्यामुळे होते विशेषतः कमी आणि माध्यम उत्पन्न असलेल्या देशांमध्ये जिथे आरोग्य प्रणाली सक्षम नसतात.
en-mt: WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom said that PHEIC poses a threat to global transmission, particularly in low- and middle-income countries where health systems are weak.

sourceString: In response to the implementations of travel restrictions, Tedros stated that "there is no reason for measures that unnecessarily interfere with international travel and trade" and that the "WHO doesn't recommend limiting trade and movement."
targetString: प्रवासावर घातलेल्या बंधनांना प्रतिसाद देताना टेड्रोस म्हणाले की "आंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रवास आणि व्यापार ह्यात हस्तक्षेप करणारे अनावश्यक उपाय करण्याची काही गरज नाही" आणि "डब्लूएचओ व्यापार आणि हालचालींवर बंधने आणण्याची शिफारस करत नाही."
en-mt: Responding to the travel restrictions, Tedros said there was "no need to take unnecessary measures that interfere with international travel and trade" and that "the WHO does not recommend restrictions on trade and movement."

sourceString: On 5 February, the WHO appealed to the global community for a $675 million contribution to fund strategic preparedness in low-income countries, citing the urgency to support those countries which "do not have the systems in place to detect people who have contracted the virus, even if it were to emerge".
targetString: 5 फेब्रुवारीला WHO ने जागतिक समुदायाला कमी उत्पन्न असलेल्या देशांमध्ये योजनाबद्ध तयारीस निधी म्हणून 675 दशलक्ष $ साहाय्याचे आवाहन केले आणि ह्यात त्यांनी अशा देशांना साहाय्य करण्याची निकड पाहिली ज्यांच्याकडे जरी विषाणूचा संसर्ग होण्याची सुरुवात होणार असली तरी विषाणूचा संसर्ग झालेले लोक शोधण्याची प्रणाली नव्हती.
en-mt: On February 5, the WHO called on the global community to provide $675 million to fund planned preparedness in low-income countries, citing an urgent need to help countries that, even if the virus is starting to spread, do not have systems to detect people infected with the virus.

sourceString: Tedros further made statements declaring that "we are only as strong as our weakest link" and urged the international community to "invest today or pay more later".On 11 February, the WHO in a press conference established COVID-19 as the name of the disease.
targetString: टेड्रोसनि पुढे असे जाहीर करत सांगितले की "आपण आपल्या सर्वात कमकुवत साखळीइतकेच प्रबळ आहोत" आणि आंतरराष्टीय समुदायास असा आग्रह केला की "आज गुंतवणूक करा किंवा उद्या जास्त रक्कम भरा".११ फेब्रुवारीला डब्लूएचओनी एका पत्रकार परिषदेमध्ये रोगाचे कोविड १९ असे नामकरण केले.
en-mt: Tedros went on to declare that "we are only as strong as our weakest link" and urged the international community to "invest today or pay more tomorrow". On February 11, the WHO named the disease Covid-19 in a press conference.

sourceString: On the same day, Tedros stated that UN Secretary-General António Guterres had agreed to provide the "power of the entire UN system in the response".
targetString: त्याच दिवशी टेड्रोस म्हणाले की यूएन सेक्रेटरी जनरल अँटोनियो गुटेरेस ह्यांनी संपूर्ण यूएन प्रणालीची शक्ती प्रतिसाद देण्यासाठी देण्याचे कबूल केले आहे.
en-mt: That same day, Tedros said UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres had agreed to commit the entire UN system to a response.

sourceString: A UN Crisis Management Team was activated as a result, allowing coordination of the entire United Nations response, which the WHO states will allow them to "focus on the health response while the other agencies can bring their expertise to bear on the wider social, economic and developmental implications of the outbreak".
targetString: परिणाम म्हणून एक यूएन संकट व्यवस्थापन गट सक्रिय करण्यात आला आणि त्यास संपूर्ण युनायटेड नेशन्सच्या प्रतिसादाचा समन्वय करण्याची परवानगी देण्यात आली, ज्याबद्दल WHO असे म्हणते की त्यामुळे त्यांना आरोग्यविषयक प्रतिसादावर लक्ष केंद्रित करता येईल व इतर एजन्सीजना त्यांचे नैपुण्य जास्त विस्तृत अशा सामाजिक, आर्थिक आणि विकासावर झालेले परिणाम सहन करण्यासाठी वापरता येईल.
en-mt: As a result, a UN Crisis Management Group was activated and allowed to coordinate the response across the United Nations, which the WHO says will allow it to focus on the health response and expand the expertise of other agencies on social, economic and development impacts. Can be used to endure.

sourceString: On 14 February, a WHO-led Joint Mission Team with China was activated to provide international and WHO experts on the ground in China to assist in the domestic management and evaluate "the severity and the transmissibility of the disease" by hosting workshops and meetings with key national-level institutions and to conduct field visits to assess the "impact of response activities at provincial and county levels, including urban and rural settings".On 25 February, the WHO declared that "the world should do more to prepare for a possible coronavirus pandemic," stating that while it was still too early to call it a pandemic, countries should nonetheless be "in a phase of preparedness".
targetString: १४ फेब्रुवारीला, डब्लूएचओने पुढाकार घेतलेल्या चीनबरोबरच्या एका संयुक्त गटाची आंतरराष्ट्रीय आणि डब्लूएचओ तज्ज्ञ देण्यासाठी सुरुवात करण्यात आली ज्यायोगे चीनमध्ये स्थानिक व्यवस्थापनास मदत होऊ शकेल आणि रोगाची तीव्रता आणि संसर्गाचे कार्यशाळा घेऊन आणि राष्ट्रीय पातळीवरच्या महत्त्वाच्या संस्थांबरोबर बैठक घेऊन मूल्यमापन करता येईल आणि प्रांत आणि देश पातळीवरील शहरी आणि ग्रामीण पद्धतीच्या क्षेत्रास प्रतिसादाच्या कृतींचा परिणाम तपासण्यासाठी भेटी देता येतील. २५ फेब्रुवारीला डब्लूएचओनी जाहीर केलं की " जगानी शक्य असलेल्या कोरोना विषाणूच्या जागतिक साथीला तोंड देण्यासाठी अजून काम केले पाहिजे" आणि असे म्हटले की जरी ह्यास आत्ताच जागतिक साथीचा रोग म्हणणे घाईचे होत असले तरी देशांनी तयारीच्या अवस्थेत राहावे.
en-mt: On 14 February, a WHO-initiated joint working group with China was launched to provide international and WHO experts to assist local management in China and assess disease severity and transmission through workshops and meetings with key organizations at the national level, and urban and rural areas at the provincial and country levels. Method area visits can be made to check the effect of response actions. On February 25, the WHO announced that "the world must do more to address a possible global pandemic of the coronavirus" and said that although it is too early to call it a global pandemic, countries should remain in a state of preparedness.

sourceString: In response to a developing outbreak in Iran, the WHO sent a Joint Mission Team there to assess the situation.On 28 February, WHO officials said that the coronavirus threat assessment at the global level would be raised from "high" to "very high", its highest level of alert and risk assessment.
targetString: इराणमध्ये होत असलेल्या उद्रेकाला प्रतिसाद म्हणून WHO ने एक संयुक्त मोहीम गट परिस्थितीची तपासणी करण्यासाठी पाठवला. 28 फेब्रुवारीला WHO च्या अधिकाऱ्यांनी म्हटले की कोरोना विषाणूच्या धोक्याची जागतिक पातळीवरील तपासणी ही "जास्त" वरून "फार जास्त" म्हणजे तिच्या इशारा आणि धोका तपासण्याच्या सर्वाधिक पातळीवर वाढवली जाईल.
en-mt: In response to the outbreak in Iran, WHO sent a joint mission team to investigate the situation. On February 28, WHO officials said that the global assessment of the threat of the corona virus will be raised from "high" to "very high", the highest level of its alert and risk assessment.

sourceString: Mike Ryan, executive director of the WHO's health emergencies program, warned in a statement that "This is a reality check for every government on the planet: Wake up.
targetString: डब्लूएचओच्या आरोग्यविषयक आणीबाणी च्या कार्यक्रमाचे कार्यकारी संचालक माईक रायन ह्यांनी एका निवेदनात इशारा दिला की ही पृथ्वीवरच्या प्रत्येक सरकारसाठी वास्तविकता तपासायची वेळ आहे.जागे व्हा.
en-mt: Mike Ryan, executive director of the WHO's Health Emergencies Programme, warned in a statement that it is time for every government on earth to take a reality check. Wake up.

sourceString: This virus may be on its way and you need to be ready," urging that the right response measures could help the world avoid "the worst of it".
targetString: हा विषाणू येत असेल आणि तुम्ही तयार राहायला पाहिजे. त्यांनी असाही आग्रह केला की योग्य प्रतिसाद देण्याच्या उपायांनी जगाला सगळ्यात वाईट गोष्ट टाळण्यास मदत होईल.
en-mt: This virus is coming and you need to be prepared. He also insisted that appropriate response measures would help the world avoid the worst.

sourceString: Ryan further stated that the current data did not warrant public health officials to declare a global pandemic, saying that such a declaration would mean "we're essentially accepting that every human on the planet will be exposed to that virus."
targetString: रायन ह्यांनी पुढे असे म्हटले की सध्याची माहिती सार्वजनिक आरोग्य अधिकाऱ्यांना ही जागतिक रोगाची साथ म्हणून जाहीर करण्याचा इशारा देत नव्हती आणि म्हटले की असे जाहीर करण्याचा अर्थ असा होईल की आपण मूलतः असे स्वीकारत आहोत की ह्या भूतलावरचा प्रत्येक मानव ह्या विषाणूला सामोरा जाईल.
en-mt: Ryan went on to say that the current information did not prompt public health officials to declare it a global pandemic, saying that declaring it would mean that we are basically accepting that every human on the planet will be exposed to the virus.

sourceString: On 11 March, the WHO declared the coronavirus outbreak a pandemic.
targetString: ११ मार्चला डब्लूएचओने कोरोना विषाणूच्या उद्रेकास जागतिक साथीचा रोग म्हणून घोषित केले.
en-mt: On March 11, the WHO declared the outbreak of the Corona virus as a global pandemic.

sourceString: The Director-General said that the WHO was "deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity, and by the alarming levels of inaction".The WHO has faced significant criticism for what is seen as inadequate handling of the pandemic, including the late declaration of a public health emergency and the classification of the virus as a pandemic.
targetString: व्यवस्थापकीय संचालक असे म्हणाले की डब्लूएचओला "रोगप्रसाराच्या वाढत्यापातळीची आणि तीव्रतेची आणि निष्क्रियतेच्या धोकादायक पातळीचीअतिशय चिंता आहे". डब्लूएचओवर जागतिक साथ अयोग्य प्रकारे हाताळल्याचे निदर्शनास आल्याबद्दल खूप टीका होत आहे ज्यामध्ये सार्वजनिक आरोग्य आणीबाणी उशिरा जाहीर करणे आणि विषाणूचे जागतिक साथ म्हणून वर्गीकरण करणे ह्यांचा सामावेश होतो.
en-mt: The managing director said the WHO was "deeply concerned about the increasing level and severity of the epidemic and the dangerous level of inactivity". The WHO has been widely criticized for what it has seen as its mishandling of the global pandemic, including the late declaration of a public health emergency and the classification of the virus as a global pandemic.

sourceString: The backlash included a petition for the WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom to tender his resignation, signed by 733,000 people as of 6 April.
targetString: प्रतिकूल प्रतिक्रियांमध्ये WHO चे व्यवस्थापकीय संचालक टेड्रोस अधानोम ह्यांच्या राजीनाम्याची मागणी करणाऱ्या याचिकेचा समावेश होता ज्यावर 6 एप्रिलपर्यंत 733000 लोकांनी स्वाक्षरी केली होती.
en-mt: The backlash included a petition calling for the resignation of WHO managing director Tedros Adhanom, which had been signed by 733,000 people as of April 6.

sourceString: On 26 March 2020, dozens of UN human rights experts emphasized respecting the rights of every individual during the COVID-19 pandemic.
targetString: २६ मार्च २०२० रोजी मानवी अधिकाराच्या डझनावारी तज्ज्ञांनी कोविड १९ जागतिक साथीच्या दरम्यान प्रत्येक व्यक्तीच्या हक्कांचा मान राखण्यावर भर देण्याचे सांगितले.
en-mt: On March 26, 2020, dozens of human rights experts called for an emphasis on respecting the rights of every individual during the Covid-19 global pandemic.

sourceString: The expert group stated that everyone is entitled to life-saving interventions and the government holds this responsibility.
targetString: ह्या तज्ज्ञांच्या असे सांगितले की प्रत्येकाला आयुष्य वाचवणार्या हस्तक्षेपाचा हक्क आहे आणि ही सरकारची जबाबदारी आहे.
en-mt: These experts said that everyone has a right to life-saving intervention and it is the government's responsibility.

sourceString: The group stressed that the lack of resources or health insurance should never serve as a justification for discrimination against a specific group.
targetString: ह्या गटानी ह्यावर भर दिला की साधनांची कमतरता किंवा आरोग्य विमा नसणे हे एखाद्या विशिष्ट गटाच्या भेदभावाचे स्पष्टीकरण वापरले जाऊ नये.
en-mt: The group stressed that lack of resources or lack of health insurance should not be used as an explanation for discrimination against a particular group.

sourceString: The experts underscored that every individual has the right to health, including people with disabilities, belonging to minority groups, older people, internally displaced people, the homeless, those living in extremely poor conditions, people in detention, as well as refugees and other unspecified groups in need of government support.
targetString: तज्ज्ञांनी असे अधोरेखित केला की प्रत्येक व्यक्तीला आरोग्यविषयक अधिकार आहेत ज्यामध्ये अपंग लोक, अल्पसंख्यांक गटात मोडणारे,म्हातारे लोक, अंतर्गत विस्थापित झालेले लोक,बेघर ,अत्यंत गरिबीत जगणारे लोक, ताब्यात घेतले गेलेले लोक त्याचप्रमाणे निर्वासित आणि इतर सरकारच्या मदतीची गरज असणाऱ्या अनिर्दिष्ट समावेश होतो.
en-mt: The experts highlighted that everyone has the right to health, including persons with disabilities, persons belonging to minority groups, the elderly, internally displaced persons, the homeless, people living in extreme poverty, detained persons as well as refugees and other unspecified persons in need of government assistance.

sourceString: International governmental organizations are addressing the economic and social impacts of the COVID-19 crisis.
targetString: आंतरराष्ट्रीय सरकारी संस्था कोविड १९ संकटाच्या आर्थिक आणि सामाजिक परिणामाचे निराकरण करीत आहेत.
en-mt: International governmental organizations are addressing the economic and social impact of the Covid-19 crisis.

sourceString: The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development has launched a platform to provide timely and comprehensive information on policy responses in countries around the world, as well as viewpoints and advice.
targetString: आर्थिक सहकार्य आणि विकास संस्थेने एक व्यासपीठ सुरु केले आहे जे जगभरातील प्रतिसादाच्या योजनांबद्दल वेळेवर आणि विस्तृत माहिती आणि त्याच प्रमाणे मते आणि सल्ले पुरवते.
en-mt: The Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development has launched a platform that provides timely and comprehensive information on global response plans, as well as opinions and advice.

sourceString: From policies to strengthen health systems and the world economy to addressing the effects of lockdown and restrictions on travel, the digital hub includes a Country Policy Tracker, and aims to help countries learn from each other and to facilitate a co-ordinated global response to the coronavirus challenge.
targetString: आरोग्य प्रणाली आणि जागतिक अर्थव्यवस्था सक्षम करण्याच्या योजनांपासून ते टाळेबंदीच्या आणि प्रवासावरील बंधनांच्या परिणामांचे निराकरण करण्यापर्यंत , डिजिटल हबमध्ये देशाच्या योजनांचा मागोवा घेण्याचा सामावेश होतो , आणि त्याचे उद्दिष्ट देशांना एकमेकांपासून शिकण्यास मदत करणे आणि कोरोना विषाणूच्या आव्हानाचा एक समन्वयित जागतिक प्रतिसाद सुकर करणे हा आहे.
en-mt: From plans to strengthen health systems and the global economy to addressing the effects of lockdowns and travel restrictions, the digital hub involves tracking country plans, and aims to help countries learn from each other and facilitate a coordinated global response to the challenge of the coronavirus.

sourceString: The Chinese government has been criticized by the United States, UK Minister for the Cabinet Office Michael Gove, and Brazil President Jair Bolsonaro's son Eduardo Bolsonaro for its handling of the pandemic, which began in the Chinese province of Hubei.
targetString: चिनी सरकारवर युनायटेड स्टेट्स, युके कॅबिनेट ऑफिसचे मंत्री मायकेल ग्लोव्ह आणि ब्राझीलचे अध्यक्ष जेअर बोल्सनरोंचा मुलगा एदुआर्दो बोल्सनरो यांनीही चीनच्या हुबेईच्या चिनी प्रांतामध्ये सुरु झालेली जागतिक साथ हाताळण्यावर टीका केली आहे.
en-mt: The Chinese government has also been criticized by the United States, UK Cabinet Office Minister Michael Glove and Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro's son Eduardo Bolsonaro over its handling of the global outbreak that began in the Chinese province of Hubei.

sourceString: A number of provincial-level administrators of the Communist Party of China (CPC) were dismissed over their handling of the quarantine efforts in Central China, a sign of discontent with the political establishment's response to the outbreak in those regions.
targetString: प्रांतीय पातळीवरचे कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी ऑफ चायनाच्या (सीपीसी) अनेक प्रशासकांना त्यांच्या मध्य चीनमध्ये विलगीकरणाचे प्रयत्न हाताळण्याबद्दल काढून टाकण्यात आले जे प्रस्थापित राजकीय पक्षाच्या त्याभागातील उद्रेकाच्या प्रतिसादाच्या विरुद्धच्या असंतोषाचे चिन्ह होते.
en-mt: Several provincial-level Communist Party of China (CPC) administrators were fired for their handling of separatist efforts in central China, a sign of discontent with the established political party's response to the outbreak in that region.

sourceString: Some commentators believe that this move was intended to protect Chinese Communist Party general secretary Xi Jinping from the public's anger over the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: काही समालोचकांचे असे मानतात की ह्या चालीचा उद्देश चायनीज कम्युनिस्ट पार्टीचे सरचिटणीस शी जिनपिंग ह्यांना लोकांच्या कोरोना विषाणूच्या उद्रेकाबद्दलच्या रोषापासून वाचवणे हा होता.
en-mt: Some commentators believe the move was intended to shield Chinese Communist Party General Secretary Xi Jinping from public anger over the coronavirus outbreak.

sourceString: Some Chinese officials, e.g. Zhao Lijian rejected an earlier acknowledgement of the coronavirus outbreak starting in Wuhan, in favour of conspiracy theories about the COVID-19 originating from the U.S. or Italy.
targetString: झाओ लिजिअनसारख्या काही चिनी अधिकाऱ्यांनी COVID-19 ची सुरुवात US किंवा इटलीहून झाल्याच्या कारस्थानाच्या सिद्धांताची बाजू घेऊन सुरुवातीचे कोरोना विषाणूचा उद्रेक वुहानमधून झाल्याचे म्हणणे अमान्य केले.
en-mt: Some Chinese officials, such as Zhao Lijian, rejected the claim that the initial corona virus outbreak came from Wuhan, favoring conspiracy theories that COVID-19 originated in the US or Italy.

sourceString: The U.S. administration of Donald Trump has referred to the coronavirus as "Chinese virus" or "Wuhan virus" saying that China's "censorship supercharged a virus that has now turned into a global pandemic", which has in turn been criticized by some critics as racism and "distract[ing] from his administration's failure to contain the disease".
targetString: डोनाल्ड ट्रम्प ह्यांच्या US प्रशासनाने कोरोना विषाणूला "चिनी विषाणू" किंवा "वुहान विषाणू" असे संबोधले आहे आणि असे म्हटले आहे की चीनच्या "गोपनीयतेमुळे एक विषाणू एवढा प्रबळ झाला आहे की त्याचे जागतिक साथीमध्ये रूपांतर झाले आहे" ज्यावर काही टीकाकारांनी वंशवादी आणि "स्वतःच्या प्रशासनाचे रोगाचे नियंत्रण करण्यात आलेल्या अपयशास दूर ठेवणे" अशी टीका केली आहे
en-mt: Donald Trump's US administration has called the coronavirus the "Chinese virus" or the "Wuhan virus" and said China's "privacy has allowed a virus to become so dominant that it has turned into a global pandemic" in what some critics call racist and "own administration's disease." "Keeping control failures at bay" has been criticized

sourceString: The Daily Beast obtained a U.S. government cable outlining a communications stratagem with apparent origins in the National Security Council, with the strategy being quoted as "Everything is about China.
targetString: द डेली बीस्टला यूएस सरकारची एक तार मिळाली ज्यात शत्रूला फसविण्याचा क्लुप्ती च्या रुपरेषेचे संदेश होते ज्याचे उगम वरकरणी राष्ट्रीय सुरक्षा परिषदेत होते आणि ज्यात योजनेस "चीनबद्दल सर्वकाही आहे" असे म्हटले होते.
en-mt: The Daily Beast obtained a U.S. government cable containing messages outlining a secret plan to deceive the enemy that originated at the National Security Council and said the plan was "all about China."

sourceString: We're being told to try and get this messaging out in any way possible, including press conferences and television appearances."Outlets such as Politico, Foreign Policy, and Bloomberg have claimed that China's efforts to send aid to virus-stricken countries is part of a propaganda push for global influence.
targetString: आम्हाला असे सांगण्यात येत आहे की प्रयत्न करा आणि हे संदेश पत्रकार परिषद आणि दूरदर्शनवरील उपस्थिती वगैरे कोणत्याही मार्गाने बाहेर उघड करा. पॉलिटिको ,फॉरीन पॉलिसी आणि ब्लूमबर्गसारख्या माध्यमांनी असा दावा केला आहे की चीनच्या विषाणूग्रस्त भागात मदत पाठवण्याचे प्रयत्न हा एक जागतिक प्रभुत्वासाठीच्या प्रचाराचा प्रयत्न आहे.
en-mt: We are told to try and get these messages out in any way possible, such as press conferences and television appearances. Media outlets such as Politico, Foreign Policy, and Bloomberg have claimed that China's efforts to send aid to virus-hit areas is a propaganda effort for global hegemony.

sourceString: EU foreign policy chief Josep Borrell warned that there is "a geo-political component including a struggle for influence through spinning and the 'politics of generosity'".
targetString: EU परराष्ट्र धोरणाचे मुख्य जोसेप बॉरेल ह्यांनी इशारा दिला की एक फिरवाफिरवी करून आणि "उदारतेचे राजकारण" हा प्रभुत्वाच्या धडपडीचा समावेश असलेला भूराजकीय घटक आहे.
en-mt: EU foreign policy chief Josep Borrell warned that there was a geopolitical element involving a spin-off and a "politics of liberalism" involving a struggle for dominance.

sourceString: Borrell also said that "China is aggressively pushing the message that, unlike the US, it is a responsible and reliable partner."
targetString: बोरेल ह्यांनी असाही म्हटले की चीन आक्रमकपणे असा संदेश पाठवत आहे की युएसपेक्षा तो एक जबाबदार आणि भरवसा ठेवण्यासारखा भागीदार आहे.
en-mt: Borrell also said that China is aggressively sending the message that it is a more responsible and trustworthy partner than the US.

sourceString: China has also called for the US to lift its sanctions off of Syria, Venezuela and Iran, while reportedly sending aid to the latter two countries.
targetString: चीनने US ला सीरिया, व्हेनेझुएला,आणि इराणवरील बंदी उठविण्याची मागणी केली आहे आणि व्हेनेझुएला व इराणला मदतही पाठवली असल्याचे कथित आहे.
en-mt: China has demanded the US lift sanctions on Syria, Venezuela, and Iran, and has reportedly sent aid to Venezuela and Iran.

sourceString: Jack Ma's donation of 100,000 masks to Cuba was blocked by US sanctions on 3 April.
targetString: जॅक माची १००००० मुखवट्यांची क्युबासाठी असलेली मदत युएसच्या बंधनांमुळे ३ एप्रिल रोजी अडवली गेली.
en-mt: Jack Ma's aid of 100,000 masks to Cuba was blocked on April 3 due to US embargoes.

sourceString: US authorities have also been accused of diverting aid meant for other nations to their own country.
targetString: यूएस अधिकाऱ्यांवर असाही आरोप केला जात आहे की त्यांनी इतर देशांसाठी असलेली मदत स्वतःच्या देसाहत वळवली.
en-mt: US officials have also been accused of diverting aid meant for other countries to their own country.

sourceString: And there have been mask-related disputes reported between other countries, such as Germany, Austria and Switzerland; and the Czech Republic and Italy.
targetString: इतर देशांमध्ये मुखवट्यांसंबंधी वाद झाल्याचेही नोंदवले गेले आहे , उदाहरणार्थ जर्मनी, ऑस्टिया आणि स्वित्झर्लंड ; आणि झेक रिपब्लिक आणि इटली.
en-mt: Controversy regarding masks has also been reported in other countries, for example Germany, Austria and Switzerland; and the Czech Republic and Italy.

sourceString: In addition, Turkey seized hundreds of ventilators destined for Spain.
targetString: त्यात भर म्हणून ,टर्कीने स्पेनसाठी असलेले शेकडो व्हेंटीलेटर्स ताब्यात घेतले.
en-mt: In addition, Turkey seized hundreds of ventilators destined for Spain.

sourceString: In early March, the Italian government criticized the European Union's lack of solidarity with coronavirus-affected Italy.
targetString: मार्चच्या सुरुवातीला इटालियन सरकारनी विषाणूचा प्रादुर्भाव झालेल्या इटलीशी ऐक्याच्या भावनेचा अभाव असल्याचा युरोपिअन युनिअनवर आरोप केला.
en-mt: In early March, the Italian government accused the European Union of lacking a sense of solidarity with virus-hit Italy.

sourceString: Maurizio Massari, Italy's ambassador to the EU, said that "Only China responded bilaterally.
targetString: इटलीचे इयूचे राजदूत माऊरिझिओ मसारी म्हणाले की "फक्त चीनने द्विपक्षीय प्रतिसाद दिला."
en-mt: Italy's ambassador to the EU, Maurizio Massari, said that "only China responded bilaterally."

sourceString: Certainly, this is not a good sign of European solidarity."
targetString: खचितच , हे काही युरोपिअन ऐक्याचे चांगले चिन्ह नव्हे."
en-mt: Certainly, this is not a good sign of European unity."

sourceString: On 22 March, after a phone call with Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte, Russian president Vladimir Putin arranged the Russian army to send military medics, special disinfection vehicles, and other medical equipment to Italy.
targetString: 22 मार्च रोजी इटलीचे पंतप्रधान जिऊसेप्पे कॉन्ट ह्यांच्याबरोबर दूरध्वनीवर संभाषण झाल्यावर रशियाचे अध्यक्ष व्लादिमिर पुतीन ह्यांनी इटलीला सैन्यविषयक औषधसामग्री, निर्जंतुकीकरण करणारी विशेष वाहने आणि इतर वैद्यकीय सामग्री पाठवण्यासाठी रशियन सैन्याची योजना केली.
en-mt: After a telephone conversation with Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte on March 22, Russian President Vladimir Putin announced plans for the Russian military to send military medicine, special disinfecting vehicles and other medical supplies to Italy.

sourceString: Italy's La Stampa newspaper cited an anonymous "high-level political source" that 80 percent of Russia's aid was "useless or of little use to Italy".
targetString: इटलीच्या ला स्टांपा वर्तमानपत्रांनी एका अज्ञात "उच्चस्तरीय राजकीय स्रोताचा" आधार घेऊन असे म्हटले की रशियाने पाठवलेल्या मदतीच्या सामग्रीपैकी 80% ही निरुपयोगी किंवा इटलीच्या फारच कमी उपयोगाची होती.
en-mt: Italy's La Stampa newspaper, citing an unnamed "high-level political source", said that 80% of the aid sent by Russia was useless or of little use to Italy.

sourceString: The source accused Russia of embarking on a "geopolitical and diplomatic" charm offensive.
targetString: स्त्रोताने रशियावर आरोप केला की रशियाने "भूराजकीय आणि मुत्सद्दी" अनुनयाची आक्षेपार्ह मोहिम चालवली आहे.
en-mt: The source accused Russia of conducting an offensive campaign of "geopolitical and diplomatic" persuasion.

sourceString: The President of Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, and Italian Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio dismissed the media reports and expressed their gratitude.
targetString: लोम्बार्डीचे अध्यक्ष ऍटिलिओ फोंटाना आणि इटलीचे परराष्ट्र मंत्री लुइगी डी माईओ ह्यांनी माध्यमांच्या अहवालांचे खंडन केले आणि त्यांची कृतज्ञता व्यक्त केली.
en-mt: Lombardy President Attilio Fontana and Italian Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio denied the media reports and expressed their gratitude.

sourceString: Russia also sent a cargo plane with medical aid to the United States.
targetString: रशियाने देखील वैद्यकीय मदत घेऊन जाणारे मालवाहतूक विमान युनायटेड स्टेट्सला पाठवले.
en-mt: Russia also sent a cargo plane carrying medical aid to the United States.

sourceString: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said that "when offering assistance to US colleagues, [Putin] assumes that when US manufacturers of medical equipment and materials gain momentum, they will also be able to reciprocate if necessary."
targetString: क्रेमलिनचे प्रवक्ते दिमित्री पिस्कोव्ह म्हणाले की, "युएसच्या सहकार्यांना मदत देऊ करताना ,[पुतीन]गृहीत धरतात की जेव्हा युएसचे वैद्यकीय सामग्रीचे आणि वस्तूंचे उत्पादनकर्ते वेग घेतील तेव्हा तेदेखील गरज भासल्यास त्याचप्रमाणे परतफेड करतील."
en-mt: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Piskov said, "In offering aid to US allies, [Putin] assumes that when US producers of medical supplies and goods pick up speed, they will also reciprocate if necessary."

sourceString: The planned NATO "Defender 2020" military exercise in Germany, Poland, and the Baltic states, the largest NATO war exercise since the end of the Cold War, will be held on a reduced scale.
targetString: नाटोचा नियोजित "डिफेंडर 2020" सैन्यदलाचा जर्मनी, पोलंड,आणि बाल्टिक राज्यांमधील कार्यक्रम छोट्या स्वरुपात केला जाईल जो नाटोचा शीतयुद्धाच्या समाप्तीनंतरचा सर्वात मोठा कार्यक्रम होता.
en-mt: NATO's planned "Defender 2020" deployment of troops to Germany, Poland, and the Baltic states will be scaled back, NATO's largest since the end of the Cold War.

sourceString: The Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament's general secretary Kate Hudson criticized the Defender 2020 exercise: "In the current public-health crisis, it jeopardizes the lives not only of the troops from the US and the many European countries participating but the inhabitants of the countries in which they are operating."The Iranian government has been heavily affected by the virus, with around two dozen parliament members infected as well as fifteen other current or former political figures.
targetString: अण्वस्त्रे निःशस्त्रीकरणाच्या मोहिमेचे सरचिटणीस केट हडसन यांनी डिफेंडर 2020 ह्या कार्यक्रमावर टीका केली: "सध्याच्या सार्वजनिक आरोग्य संकटात, हा कार्यक्रम फक्त US च्या आणि इतर अनेक युरोपियन देशांच्या सैन्यदलांनाच धोक्यात आणत नाही तर ज्या देशात ते काम करत आहेत त्या देशातील रहिवाशांना देखील धोक्यात आणतो." इराणी सरकारवर ह्या विषाणूमुळे प्रचंड परिणाम झाला आहे आणि जवळजवळ दोन डझन संसद सदस्याना संसर्ग झाला आहे आणि त्याचप्रमाणे सध्याच्या किंवा माजी पंधरा राजकीय व्यक्तींना संसर्ग झाला आहे.
en-mt: Kate Hudson, Secretary General of the Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament, criticized the Defender 2020 program: "In the current public health crisis, this program not only endangers the military forces of the US and many other European countries, but also the citizens of the countries in which they operate." The Iranian government has been heavily affected by the virus, with nearly two dozen members of parliament infected, as well as fifteen current or former political figures.

sourceString: Iran's President Hassan Rouhani wrote a public letter to world leaders asking for help on 14 March 2020, saying that his country is struggling to fight the outbreak due to lack of access to international markets as a result of the United States sanctions against Iran.The outbreak has prompted calls for the United States to adopt social policies common in other wealthy countries, including universal health care, universal child care, paid family leave, and higher levels of funding for public health.
targetString: इराणचे अध्यक्ष हसन रौहानी ह्यांनी 14 मार्च 2020 ला मदतीसाठी जागतिक पुढाऱ्यांना एक सार्वजनिक पत्र लिहिले आहे आणि त्यात असे म्हटले आहे की त्यांचा देश युनायटेड स्टेट्सच्या त्यांच्याविरुद्धच्या बंधनांमुळे आंतरराष्ट्रीय बाजारास प्रवेश नसल्याने उद्रेकाला तोंड देण्यासाठी धडपडत आहे. या उद्रेकाने युनायटेड स्टेट्सला इतर श्रीमंत देशांमध्ये सर्वसामान्य असलेल्या सामाजिक योजनांचा अंगीकार करण्यास सूचित केले आहे ज्यामध्ये युनिवर्सल हेल्थ केअर, युनिवर्सल चाईल्ड केअर, भरपगारी कौटुंबिक सुट्टी आणि सार्वजनिक आरोग्यासाठी जास्त निधी ह्यांचा समावेश होतो.
en-mt: Iranian President Hassan Rouhani wrote a public letter to world leaders asking for help on March 14, 2020, saying his country is struggling to deal with the outbreak as it lacks access to international markets due to the United States' sanctions against it. The outbreak prompted the United States to adopt social programs common in other wealthy countries, including universal health care, universal child care, generous family leave, and increased funding for public health.

sourceString: Political analysts anticipated it may negatively affect Donald Trump's chances of re-election in the 2020 presidential election.Diplomatic relations between Japan and South Korea worsened due to the pandemic.
targetString: राजकीय विश्लेषकांनी असा अंदाज केला की ह्याचा डोनाल्ड ट्रम्प ह्यांची २०२० च्या अध्यक्षीय निवडणुकीत फेरनिवड होण्यावर नकारात्मक परिणाम होईल.ह्या रोगाच्या जागतिक साथीमुळे जपान आणि साऊथ कोरियाचे मुत्सद्दी संबंध बिघडले.
en-mt: Political analysts predict that this will have a negative impact on Donald Trump's re-election in the 2020 presidential election.

sourceString: South Korea criticized Japan's "ambiguous and passive quarantine efforts" after Japan announced anybody coming from South Korea will be placed in two weeks' quarantine at government-designated sites.
targetString: साऊथ कोरियाने जपानच्या "विलगीकरणाच्या संदिग्ध आणि निष्क्रिय प्रयत्नांवर" टीका केली जेव्हा जपानने असे घोषित केलं की साऊथ कोरियातून येणाऱ्या प्रत्येकाला सरकारनी ठरवलेल्या ठिकाणी दोन आठवडे विलग करून ठेवले जाईल.
en-mt: South Korea criticized Japan's "ambiguous and passive efforts at isolation" when Japan announced that anyone arriving from South Korea would be quarantined for two weeks at a government-designated location.
