targetString: COVID-19 च्या रुग्णांमध्ये श्वसनमार्गाशी संबंधित तीव्र समस्या (ARDS) विकसित होत असल्यामुळे तांत्रिक वेन्टिलेशन हे गुंतागुंतीचं होऊन बसतं आणि ऑक्सिजन देणं हे जास्तीत जास्त अवघड होत जातं.
en-mt: As patients with COVID-19 develop acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS), technical ventilation becomes complicated and oxygenation becomes increasingly difficult.

sourceString: Ventilators capable of pressure control modes and high PEEP are needed to maximise oxygen delivery while minimising the risk of ventilator-associated lung injury and pneumothorax.
targetString: दाबनियंत्रणाची क्षमता असणारे वेन्टिलेटर्स आणि उच्च PEEP यांची ऑक्सिजनचा जास्त पुरवठा करत असताना वेन्टिलेटरमुळे होणारी फुफ्फुसांच्या दुखापतीची तसंच न्युमोथोरॅक्सची जोखीम कमी करण्यासाठी गरज पडते.
en-mt: Ventilators with pressure control capabilities and high PEEP are needed to reduce the risk of ventilator-induced lung injury and pneumothorax when delivering too much oxygen.

sourceString: High PEEP may not be available on older ventilators.
targetString: जुन्या वेन्टिलेटर्सवर उच्च क्षमतेचे PEEP उपलब्ध नसू शकतात.
en-mt: Higher capacity PEEPs may not be available on older ventilators.

sourceString: Research into potential treatments started in January 2020, and several antiviral drugs are in clinical trials.
targetString: जानेवारी, 2020 मध्ये संभाव्य उपचारांवर संशोधन सुरु झालं आणि अनेक विषाणूरोधक औषधे त्यानंतर चाचण्यांमधून जात आहेत.
en-mt: Research into potential treatments began in January, 2020, and several antiviral drugs have since gone through trials.

sourceString: Remdesivir appears to be the most promising.
targetString: रेमडेसिवीर हे त्यात सर्वाधिक आश्वासक दिसतं आहे.
en-mt: Remdesivir appears to be the most promising of these.

sourceString: Although new medications may take until 2021 to develop, several of the medications being tested are already approved for other uses or are already in advanced testing.
targetString: जरी नवी औषधे विकसित होण्यासाठी 2021 पर्यंतचा काळ जाईल, तरी अनेक चाचण्या घेतलेल्या औषधांना इतर वापरांसाठी मान्यता मिळाली आहे किंवा ती अधिक पुढच्या चाचण्यांमधून जात आहेत.
en-mt: Although it will take until 2021 for new drugs to be developed, many of the tested drugs have been approved for other uses or are undergoing further testing.

sourceString: Antiviral medication may be tried in people with severe disease.
targetString: विषाणूरोधक औषधांची चाचणी गंभीर आजारी रुग्णांवर केली जाऊ शकते.
en-mt: Antiviral drugs can be tested on critically ill patients.

sourceString: The WHO recommended volunteers take part in trials of the effectiveness and safety of potential treatments.The FDA has granted temporary authorisation to convalescent plasma as an experimental treatment in cases where the person's life is seriously or immediately threatened.
targetString: जागतिक आरोग्य संघटनेने शिफारस केलेल्या स्वयंसेवी व्यक्ती या संभाव्य उपचारांचा परिणाम आणि सुरक्षितता अभ्यासण्यासाठी चाचण्यांमध्ये भाग घेतात. FDA ने ज्यांचे आयुष्य धोक्यात आहे अशा रुग्णांवर प्रायोगिक उपचार म्हणून कॉन्वालसेंट प्लाझ्माचे उपचार करण्याला तात्पुरती मान्यता दिली आहे.
en-mt: Volunteers participate in trials to study the efficacy and safety of these potential treatments, as recommended by the World Health Organization. The FDA has provisionally approved convalescent plasma as an experimental treatment for patients whose lives are in danger.

sourceString: It has not undergone the clinical studies needed to show it is safe and effective for the disease.
targetString: या आजारावर ते प्रभावी आणि सुरक्षित उपचार आहेत हे निश्चित करण्यासाठीच्या रासायनिक अभ्यासांतून ते गेलेले नाहीत.
en-mt: They have not gone through chemical studies to determine that they are effective and safe treatments for this disease.

sourceString: In February 2020, China launched a mobile app to deal with the disease outbreak.
targetString: फेब्रुवारी 2020 मध्ये चीनने या आजाराच्या उद्रेकाला हाताळण्यासाठी एक मोबाईल एप सुरु केलं.
en-mt: In February 2020, China launched a mobile app to deal with the outbreak.

sourceString: Users are asked to enter their name and ID number.
targetString: वापरकर्त्यांना त्यात आपलं नाव आणि ओळखपत्र क्रमांक टाकण्यास सांगितला जातो.
en-mt: Users are asked to enter their name and ID number in it.

sourceString: The app is able to detect 'close contact' using surveillance data and therefore a potential risk of infection.
targetString: निरीक्षण केलेल्या माहितीवरून हे एप 'जवळचा संपर्क' दाखवू शकतं आणि त्यातून संसर्गाची संभाव्य शक्यता समजू शकते.
en-mt: From the monitored information, the app can show 'close contacts' and understand the potential risk of infection.

sourceString: Every user can also check the status of three other users.
targetString: प्रत्येक वापरकर्ता इतर तीन वापरकर्त्यांची स्थितीही तपासू शकतो.
en-mt: Each user can also check the status of three other users.

sourceString: If a potential risk is detected, the app not only recommends self-quarantine, it also alerts local health officials.Big data analytics on cellphone data, facial recognition technology, mobile phone tracking and artificial intelligence are used to track infected people and people whom they contacted in South Korea, Taiwan and Singapore.
targetString: जर संभाव्य जोखमीचा निर्देश झाला, तर हे एप स्व-अलगीकरण सुचवतं. एवढंच नाही तर ते स्थानिक आरोग्य अधिकाऱ्यांना याची माहिती पुरवतं. सेलफोन डाटावरील बिग डाटा एनॅलिटिक्स, चेहऱ्याची ओळख पटवणारं तंत्रज्ञान, मोबाईल फोन ट्रॅकिंग आणि कृत्रिम बुद्धिमत्ता या सर्व साधनांचा वापर संसर्ग झालेल्या रुग्णांवर आणि त्यांच्या संपर्कात आलेल्या लोकांवर लक्ष ठेवण्यासाठी दक्षिण कोरिया, तैवान आणि सिंगापूरमध्ये केला जातो आहे.
en-mt: If a potential risk is indicated, this app suggests self-isolation. Not only this, it also provides information to the local health authorities. Big data analytics on cellphone data, facial recognition technology, mobile phone tracking and artificial intelligence are all being used in South Korea, Taiwan and Singapore to monitor infected patients and their contacts.

sourceString: In March 2020, the Israeli government enabled security agencies to track mobile phone data of people supposed to have coronavirus.
targetString: मार्च 2020 मध्ये इस्त्राईल सरकारने सुरक्षा विभागांना कोरोना विषाणूची लागण झाल्याची शक्यता असणाऱ्या लोकांच्या मोबाईल फोनचा डाटा तपासण्याची मुभा दिली.
en-mt: In March 2020, the Israeli government allowed security departments to check the mobile phone data of people suspected of being infected with the corona virus.

sourceString: The measure was taken to enforce quarantine and protect those who may come into contact with infected citizens.
targetString: विलगीकरण लादण्यासाठी आणि संसर्ग झालेल्या नागरीकांच्या संपर्कात येऊ शकणाऱ्यांना संरक्षित करण्यासाठी उपाय केले गेले.
en-mt: Measures were taken to impose isolation and protect those who might have come into contact with infected civilians.

sourceString: Also in March 2020, Deutsche Telekom shared aggregated phone location data with the German federal government agency, Robert Koch Institute, in order to research and prevent the spread of the virus.
targetString: मार्च 2020 मध्येच ड्युश टेलिकॉमने जर्मन फेडरल गव्हर्नमेंट एजन्सी, रॉबर्ट कोच इन्स्टिट्यूट हिच्याकडे फोनच्या ठिकाणांची एकत्रित केलेली माहिती सोपवली. तिचा उपयोग विषाणूचा प्रसार रोखण्यासाठी आणि संशोधनासाठी केला जाणार आहे.
en-mt: In March 2020, Deutsche Telekom handed over aggregated phone location data to the Robert Koch Institute, a German federal government agency. It will be used to prevent the spread of the virus and for research.

sourceString: Russia deployed facial recognition technology to detect quarantine breakers.
targetString: रशियाने विलगीकरण तोडणाऱ्या लोकांचा शोध घेण्यासाठी चेहरा ओळखण्याचे तंत्रज्ञान स्थापित केले आहे.
en-mt: Russia has installed facial recognition technology to track people who break isolation.

sourceString: Italian regional health commissioner Giulio Gallera said he has been informed by mobile phone operators that "40% of people are continuing to move around anyway".
targetString: इटलीचे क्षेत्रीय आरोग्य आयुक्त जुलियो गालरिय म्हणाले की त्यांना मोबाईल फोनद्वारे माहिती मिळत आहे.
en-mt: Italy's regional health commissioner, Julio Galleria, said he was receiving information via mobile phone.

sourceString: German government conducted a 48 hours weekend hackathon with more than 42.000 participants.
targetString: जर्मन सरकार ने 42000 पेक्षा जास्ती भागीदारांसमवेत 48 तासांचे सप्ताहांत हॅकॅथॉन आयोजित केले.
en-mt: The German government organized a 48-hour weekend hackathon with more than 42,000 partners.

sourceString: Also the president of Estonia, Kersti Kaljulaid, made a global call for creative solutions against the spread of coronavirus.
targetString: तसेच इस्टोनियाचे राष्ट्रपती केर्स्ती कार्ल्यूलाईद ह्यांनी कोरोनाव्हायरसच्या प्रसाराविरुद्ध काही ठोस उपाय काढण्यासाठी वैश्विक आव्हान केले आहे.
en-mt: Also, the President of Estonia, Kersti Karlulaid, has challenged the world to take some concrete measures against the spread of the coronavirus.

sourceString: Individuals may experience distress from quarantine, travel restrictions, side effects of treatment or fear of the infection itself.
targetString: लोकांना विलगीकरण, प्रवास प्रतिबंध, उपचाराचे उलट परिणाम किंवा लागण व्हायची भीती ह्या सर्वांमुळे त्रासदायक वाटू शकते.
en-mt: People may feel distressed by isolation, travel restrictions, treatment side effects or fear of infection.

sourceString: BBC quoted Rory O'Connor in saying, "Increased social isolation, loneliness, health anxiety, stress and an economic downturn are a perfect storm to harm people's mental health and wellbeing."
targetString: बीबीसीने रॉरी ओ कॉनर ह्यांच्या ह्या वक्तव्याचा उल्लेख केला "वाढते सामाजिक विलगीकरण, एकटेपणा, आरोग्याची काळजी, तणाव आणि आर्थिक घसरण हे लोकांच्या मानसिक आरोग्य आणि कल्याणाला धोका व्हायचे मूळ कारण आहेत."
en-mt: The BBC quoted Rory O'Connor as saying "Increasing social isolation, loneliness, health concerns, stress and economic decline are the root causes of threats to people's mental health and well-being."

sourceString: The disease may take a mild course with few or no symptoms, resembling other common upper respiratory diseases such as the common cold.
targetString: हा आजारांत थोडे फार लक्षण असू शकतात किंवा अजिबातच लक्षण नसू शकतात, ज्याचा साधर्म्य सर्दी-खोकला ह्यासारख्या इतर श्वसन संबंधी आजाराशी असतो.
en-mt: These illnesses may have few or no symptoms, similar to other respiratory illnesses such as the common cold.

sourceString: Mild cases typically recover within two weeks, while those with severe or critical diseases may take three to six weeks to recover.
targetString: सौम्य केसेस सामान्यतः दोन आठवड्यात बरे होतात, तर गंभीर आजाराला बरे होण्यास तीन ते सहा आठवडे लागू शकतात.
en-mt: Mild cases usually heal within two weeks, while severe cases may take three to six weeks to heal.

sourceString: Pregnant women may be at higher risk for severe infection with COVID-19 based on data from other similar viruses, like SARS and MERS, but data for COVID-19 is lacking.In some people, COVID-19 may affect the lungs causing pneumonia.
targetString: SARS, MERS सारखे इतर समान विषाणूच्या माहितीच्या आधारे म्हणू शकतो की COVID-19 द्वारे गंभीररित्या संक्रमित झालेल्या गर्भवती महिलांना जास्ती धोका असू शकतो, पण ह्याबाबतीत COVID-19 बद्दल माहिती उपलब्ध नाही. काही लोकांमध्ये COVID-19 फुफ्फुसांवर परिणाम करू शकतो, ज्यामुळे निमोनिया होतो.
en-mt: Based on information from other similar viruses such as SARS, MERS, pregnant women who are severely infected by COVID-19 may be at increased risk, but information on this is not available for COVID-19. In some people, COVID-19 can affect the lungs, causing pneumonia.

sourceString: In those most severely affected, COVID-19 may rapidly progress to acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS) causing respiratory failure, septic shock or multi-organ failure.
targetString: गंभीररित्या प्रभावित झालेल्या लोकांमध्ये COVID-19 एक्युट रेस्पिरेटरी डिस्ट्रेस सिंड्रोम (ARDS) विकसित करू शकतो, ज्याच्या परिणामी श्वसनतंत्र निकामी होणे, सेप्टिक शॉक होणे किंवा अनेक अवयव निकामी होणे, इत्यादी होऊ शकते.
en-mt: People severely affected by COVID-19 can develop acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS), which can result in respiratory failure, septic shock or multiple organ failure, etc.

sourceString: Complications associated with COVID-19 include sepsis, abnormal clotting and damage to the heart, kidneys and liver.
targetString: COVID-19 सोबत जुळलेल्या गुंतागुंतीमध्ये सेप्सिस, रक्ताच्या असामान्य गुठळ्या आणि हृदय, मूत्रपिंड आणि यकृताची हानी होणे, वगैरे समाविष्ट आहे.
en-mt: Complications associated with COVID-19 include sepsis, abnormal blood clots, and damage to the heart, kidneys, and liver, among others.

sourceString: Clotting abnormalities, specifically an increase in prothrombin time, have been described in 6% of those admitted to hospital with COVID-19, while abnormal kidney function is seen in 4% of this group.
targetString: COVID-19 मुळे दवाखान्यात दाखल झालेल्या लोकांपैकी 6% लोकांना रक्ताच्या गुठळ्या होण्यात विकृती होणे, प्रोथ्रोम्बीन कालावधीत वाढ झाल्याचे लक्षांत आले आहे, तसेच ह्या गटांतील 4% लोकांमध्ये मूत्रपिंडाचे कार्य विकृत झाल्याचे आढळले आहे.
en-mt: 6% of people hospitalized with COVID-19 had coagulation abnormalities, increased prothrombin time, and 4% of these groups had kidney function abnormalities.

sourceString: Approximately 20-30% of people who present with COVID-19 demonstrate elevated liver enzymes (transaminases).
targetString: COVID-19 असलेल्या जवळ-जवळ 20-30% लोकांमध्ये उच्च यकृत एन्जाइम असल्याचे आढळले आहे.
en-mt: About 20-30% of people with COVID-19 have been found to have elevated liver enzymes.

sourceString: According to the same report, the median time between onset of symptoms and death was ten days, with five being spent hospitalised.
targetString: ह्याच अहवालात असे सांगितले आहे की आजाराचे लक्षण प्रकट होण्याच्या आणि मृत्यू होण्याच्या मधील कालावधी दहा दिवसाचा होता, ज्यापैकी 5 दिवस दवाखान्यात दाखल व्हायचे होते.
en-mt: The same report states that the time between onset of symptoms and death was ten days, of which five days required hospitalization.

sourceString: However, patients transferred to an ICU had a median time of seven days between hospitalisation and death.
targetString: तरी पण, अतिदक्षता विभागांत दाखल केलेल्या रुग्णांचा त्यांना दवाखान्यात दाखल करायच्या आणि त्यांचा मृत्यू होण्याच्या मधला कालावधी सात दिवसांचा होता.
en-mt: However, the time between admission to the hospital and death for patients admitted to intensive care units was seven days.

sourceString: In a study of early cases, the median time from exhibiting initial symptoms to death was 14 days, with a full range of six to 41 days.
targetString: प्रारंभी केसेसच्या अभ्यासांत आढळले की आजाराची प्रारंभी लक्षणे प्रकट होण्यापासून मृत्यू होण्याचा मधला कालावधी 14 दिवसांचा होता.
en-mt: Early case studies found that the median time from onset of symptoms to death was 14 days.

sourceString: In a study by the National Health Commission (NHC) of China, men had a death rate of 2.8% while women had a death rate of 1.7%.
targetString: चीनच्या राष्ट्रीय आरोग्य आयोग (NHC) च्या एका अभ्यासांत म्हटले आहे की पुरुषांची मृत्युदर 2.8% होती, तर महिलांची मृत्युदर 1.7% इतकी होती.
en-mt: A study by China's National Health Commission (NHC) stated that the male mortality rate was 2.8%, while the female mortality rate was 1.7%.

sourceString: Histopathological examinations of post-mortem lung samples show diffuse alveolar damage with cellular fibromyxoid exudates in both lungs.
targetString: पोस्ट-मोर्टम फुफ्फुस नमुन्याची हिस्टोपॅॅथोलॉजीकल चाचणी दोन्ही फुफ्फुसांत सेल्युलर फ़ाईब्रोमायऑक्साईड सोबत डिफ्यूज एल्विओलर क्षती दर्शवतात.
en-mt: Histopathological examination of post-mortem lung specimens showed diffuse alveolar damage with cellular fibromyxoid in both lungs.

sourceString: Viral cytopathic changes were observed in the pneumocytes.
targetString: न्युमोसाईट्समध्ये व्हायरल सायटोफॅॅटिक बदल दिसून आलेत.
en-mt: Viral cytopathic changes were observed in pneumocytes.

sourceString: The lung picture resembled acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).
targetString: फुफ्फुसाच्या चित्राचा एक्युट रेस्पिरेटरी डिस्ट्रेस सिंड्रोम (ARDS) सोबत साधर्म्य होते.
en-mt: The pulmonary picture is similar to acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).

sourceString: In 11.8% of the deaths reported by the National Health Commission of China, heart damage was noted by elevated levels of troponin or cardiac arrest.
targetString: चीनच्या राष्ट्रीय आरोग्य आयोगद्वारे नोंदवलेल्या मृत्युंपैकी 11.8% मध्ये ट्रोपोनिनची उच्च पातळी किंवा हृदयक्रिया बंद पडणे हे दिसून आले.
en-mt: High levels of troponin or cardiac arrest were observed in 11.8% of deaths reported by the National Health Commission of China.

sourceString: According to March data from the United States, 89% of those hospitalised had preexisting conditions.Availability of medical resources and the socioeconomics of a region may also affect mortality.
targetString: अमेरिकाच्या मार्च अहवालानुसार दवाखान्यात दाखल केलेल्या लोकांपैकी 89% लोकांना आधीपासून काही तक्रारी होत्या. वैद्यकीय संसाधनांची उपलब्धता आणि क्षेत्राचे सामाजिक-आर्थिक स्थिती देखील मृत्युदाराला प्रभावित करतात.
en-mt: According to a March report from the US, 89% of people admitted to hospitals had some pre-existing condition. Availability of medical resources and socio-economic status of the area also affect mortality.

sourceString: Estimates of the mortality from the condition vary because of those regional differences, but also because of methodological difficulties.
targetString: क्षेत्रीय अंतरामुळे ह्या परिस्थितीत मृत्युदराचा अंदाज बदलतो, तर पद्धतीच्या अडचणींंमुळे देखील असे होते.
en-mt: Regional distance varies mortality estimates in these situations, as do methodological constraints.

sourceString: The under-counting of mild cases can cause the mortality rate to be overestimated.
targetString: सौम्य केसेसची मोजणी कमी केल्या मुळे मृत्युदराचा अंदाज जास्ती होऊ शकतो.
en-mt: Undercounting mild cases may overestimate the mortality rate.

sourceString: However, the fact that deaths are the result of cases contracted in the past can mean the current mortality rate is underestimated.
targetString: तथापि, ही वस्तूस्थिती की ह्या मृत्यू विगत काळात संपर्कात आलेल्या केसेसचा परिणाम आहेत, त्याचा अर्थ असा होऊ शकतो की सध्याच्या मृत्युदरराचा अंदाज कमी घेतलेला आहे.
en-mt: However, the fact that these deaths are the result of past contact cases may mean that the current mortality rate is underestimated.

sourceString: Smokers were 1.4 times more likely to have severe symptoms of COVID-19 and approximately 2.4 times more likely to require intensive care or die compared to non-smokers.Concerns have been raised about long-term sequelae of the disease.
targetString: धूम्रपान न करणाऱ्या लोकांच्या तुलनेत धूम्रपान करणाऱ्या लोकांना COVID-19 चे गंभीर लक्षणे 1.4 पट जास्ती दिसण्याची शक्यता आहे आणि अंदाजे 2.4 पट जास्ती लोकांना अतिदक्षता देखरेखीची गरज असते किंवा त्यांची मृत्यू व्हायची शक्यता असते. ह्या आजाराच्या दीर्घकाळ वारंवारिता बद्दल चिंता व्यक्त केली गेली आहे.
en-mt: People who smoke are 1.4 times more likely to develop severe symptoms of COVID-19 than nonsmokers, and approximately 2.4 times more likely to require intensive care or die. Concerns have been expressed about the long-term frequency of this disease.

sourceString: The Hong Kong Hospital Authority found a drop of 20% to 30% in lung capacity in some people who recovered from the disease, and lung scans suggested organ damage.
targetString: हॉंगकॉंगच्या दवाखान्यातील अधिकाऱ्यांना काही लोकांच्या फुफ्फुसांच्या क्षमतेमध्ये 20% - 30% घट झाल्याचे आढळले, जे ह्या आजारापासून बरे झाले होते, आणि फुफ्फुसाचा स्कॅनमध्ये अवयव क्षतिग्रस्त झाल्याचे दिसून आले.
en-mt: Officials at a Hong Kong hospital found a 20% - 30% reduction in lung capacity in some people who had recovered from the disease, and lung scans showed organ damage.

sourceString: This may also lead to post-intensive care syndrome following recovery.
targetString: ह्यामुळे बरे झाल्यावर पोस्ट-इंटेन्सिव्ह केयर सिंड्रोम होण्याची शक्यता आहे.
en-mt: This may lead to post-intensive care syndrome after recovery.

sourceString: As of March 2020, it was unknown if past infection provides effective and long-term immunity in people who recover from the disease.
targetString: मार्च 2020 पर्यंत, हे ज्ञात नव्हते की ह्या आजारापासून बरे झालेल्या लोकांमध्ये मागील संक्रमणाने प्रभावी आणि दीर्घकालिक प्रतिकारशक्ती प्रदान केली की नाही.
en-mt: As of March 2020, it was not known whether previous infection provided effective and long-term immunity in people who recovered from the disease.

sourceString: Immunity is seen as likely, based on the behaviour of other coronaviruses, but cases in which recovery from COVID-19 have been followed by positive tests for coronavirus at a later date have been reported.
targetString: इतर कोरोनाव्हायरसच्या व्यवहाराच्या आधारे म्हणता येईल की प्रतिकारशक्ती दिसण्याची शक्यता आहे, पण अश्या केसेस ज्यामध्ये COVID-19 पासून बरे झाल्यावर पुढच्या काही दिवसांत कोरोनाव्हायरसची चाचणी सकारात्मक आल्याची नोंद झाली आहे.
en-mt: Based on the cases of other coronaviruses, immunity is likely to appear, but cases in which the coronavirus has been tested positive in the days following recovery from COVID-19 have been reported.

sourceString: These cases are believed to be worsening of a lingering infection rather than re-infection.
targetString: असे मानले जाते की अश्या केसेस मध्ये पुन्हा संसर्ग होण्याऐवजी प्रदीर्घ संसर्ग असू शकतो.
en-mt: It is believed that such cases may have prolonged infection rather than re-infection.

sourceString: The virus is thought to be natural and have an animal origin, through spillover infection.
targetString: हा व्हायरस नैसर्गिक असल्याचे आणि त्याचे मूळ एखादा प्राणी असल्याचे मानले जाते आणि त्याचा प्रसार संसर्गामुळे होतो.
en-mt: The virus is believed to be natural and of animal origin and spread by infection.

sourceString: The actual origin is unknown, but by December 2019 the spread of infection was almost entirely driven by human-to-human transmission.
targetString: त्याचे वास्तविक मूळ अज्ञात आहे, पण डिसेंबर 2019 पर्यंत ह्या संसर्गाचा प्रसार संपूर्णपणे मानवापासून मानवाला झालेल्या संसर्गामुळे झाला होता.
en-mt: Its actual origin is unknown, but as of December 2019, the spread of the infection was entirely human-to-human transmission.

sourceString: A study of the first 41 cases of confirmed COVID-19, published in January 2020 in The Lancet, revealed the earliest date of onset of symptoms as 1 December 2019.
targetString: 'द लेन्सेट' मध्ये जानेवारीत प्रकाशित झालेल्या COVID-19 च्या पुष्टी झालेल्या 41 केसेसच्या अभ्यासाने दर्शविले की 1 डिसेंबर 2019 लक्षण प्रकट व्हायची सर्वांत प्रारंभी तारीख होती.
en-mt: A study of 41 confirmed cases of COVID-19 published in The Lancet in January showed that December 1, 2019 was the earliest date for symptoms to appear.

sourceString: Official publications from the WHO reported the earliest onset of symptoms as 8 December 2019.
targetString: WHO द्वारे अधिकृत प्रकाशनाने 8 डिसेंबर 2019 ही लक्षणे प्रकट होण्याची प्रारंभी तारीख म्हणून नोंद केली आहे.
en-mt: An official publication by the WHO has recorded December 8, 2019 as the date of onset of symptoms.

sourceString: Several measures are commonly used to quantify mortality.
targetString: मृत्युदाराची गणना करण्यासाठी सामान्यतः विविध उपायांचा अवलंब केला जातो.
en-mt: Various measures are generally adopted to calculate mortality.

sourceString: These numbers vary by region and over time and are influenced by the volume of testing, healthcare system quality, treatment options, time since initial outbreak and population characteristics such as age, sex and overall health.
targetString: ह्या संख्या विविध क्षेत्र आणि विविध काळानुसार वेगवेगळ्या आहेत आणि त्या चाचण्यांंची संख्या, आरोग्य देखभाल प्रणालीची गुणवत्ता, उपचाराचे पर्याय, प्रारंभी उद्रेकापासून गेलेला कालावधी आणि वय, लिंग आणि संपूर्ण आरोग्यासारखे लोकसंख्या वैशिष्ट्यमुळे प्रभावित होतात.
en-mt: These numbers vary from region to region and over time, and are influenced by the number of tests, the quality of the health care system, treatment options, time since the initial outbreak, and demographic characteristics such as age, gender, and overall health.

sourceString: In late 2019, WHO assigned the emergency ICD-10 disease codes U07.1 for deaths from lab-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection and U07.2 for deaths from clinically or epidemiologically diagnosed COVID-19 without lab-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection.The death-to-case ratio reflects the number of deaths divided by the number of diagnosed cases within a given time interval.
targetString: वर्ष 2019 च्या अंतिम काळात WHO ने SARS-CoV-२ संसर्गापासून प्रयोगशाळेद्वारे पुष्टी केलेल्या मृत्यूंना U07.1 असा आपत्कालीन ICD-10 कोड प्रदान केला आहे आणि SARS-CoV-2 संसर्गाची प्रयोगशाळेद्वारे पुष्टी न झालेल्या वैद्यकीयरित्या किंवा इपिडेमिओलॉजीरित्या निदान झालेल्या COVID-19 द्वारे झालेल्या मृत्यूंंना U07.1 असा आजार कोड प्रदान केला आहे. मृत्यू-ते- केस गुणोत्तर एका ठराविक कालावधीत निदान झालेल्या केसेसच्या संख्याद्वारे विभाजित मृत्यूची संख्या प्रदर्शित करतो.
en-mt: In late 2019, WHO assigned the emergency ICD-10 code U07.1 to laboratory-confirmed deaths from SARS-CoV-2 infection and to clinically or epidemiologically-diagnosed COVID-19 deaths without laboratory-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection. Deaths are assigned a disease code of U07.1. The death-to-case ratio displays the number of deaths divided by the number of cases diagnosed over a period of time.

sourceString: Based on Johns Hopkins University statistics, the global death-to-case ratio is 6.9% (153,822/2,240,191) as of 17 April 2020.
targetString: जॉन्स हॉपकिन्स युनिव्हर्सिटीच्या आकड्यांनुसार वैश्विक मृत्यू-ते-केस गुणोत्तर हे 6.9% आहे.
en-mt: The global case-to-death ratio is 6.9%, according to figures from Johns Hopkins University.

sourceString: The number varies by region.Other measures include the case fatality rate (CFR), which reflects the percent of diagnosed individuals who die from a disease, and the infection fatality rate (IFR), which reflects the percent of infected individuals (diagnosed and undiagnosed) who die from a disease.
targetString: क्षेत्रानुसार ही संख्या निरनिराळी आहे. इतर उपाययोजनांमध्ये केस मृत्यू दर (CFR) समाविष्ट आहे, जी निदान झालेल्या व्यक्तींची टक्केवारी प्रदर्शित करते, जे एखाद्या आजारामुळे मरण पावलेत, आणि 'संसर्ग मृत्यू दर (IFR) समाविष्ट आहे, जी संक्रमित व्यक्ती (निदान झालेले आणि निदान न झालेले)ची टक्केवारी प्रदर्शित करते, जे एखाद्या आजाराने मरण पावलेत.
en-mt: This number varies by region. Other measures include the case fatality rate (CFR), which shows the percentage of diagnosed individuals who die of a disease, and the infection fatality rate (IFR), which shows the percentage of infected individuals (diagnosed and undiagnosed). does, who die of a disease.

sourceString: These statistics are not time bound and follow a specific population from infection through case resolution.
targetString: ह्या आकडेवारींंना वेळेचे बंधन नाही आणि त्या केस आवृत्तीच्या माध्यमाने संक्रमित विशिष्ट लोकसंख्येचा अवलंब करतात.
en-mt: These statistics are not time-bound and refer to the specific population infected through the case version.

sourceString: While not all infected people develop antibodies, the presence of antibodies may provide information about how many people have been infected.
targetString: सर्वच संक्रमित लोक एन्टीबॉडीज विकसित करीत नाहीत, एन्टीबॉडीजची उपस्थिती कदाचित ही माहिती देऊ शकते की किती लोकांना संसर्ग झालेला आहे.
en-mt: Since not all infected people develop antibodies, the presence of antibodies may provide information on how many people have been infected.

sourceString: In the epicentre of the outbreak in Italy, Castiglione d'Adda, a small village of 4600, 80 (1.7%) are already dead.
targetString: इटलीमध्ये उद्रेकाच्या केंद्रात, कॅस्टीग्लिओन द'अद्दा नावाच्या एका छोट्या गावांत आतापर्यंत 4600,80 (1.7%) लोकं मरण पावले आहेत.
en-mt: In Italy, 4600,80 (1.7%) people have died so far in the small village of Castiglione d'Adda, at the center of the outbreak.

sourceString: In Gangelt, the disease was spread by Carnival festivals, and spread to younger people, causing a relatively lower mortality, and not all COVID-19 deaths may have been formally classified as such.
targetString: गेन्गेल्टमध्ये हा आजार कार्निव्हल फेस्टिव्हलमुळे प्रसरण पावला आणि ह्याचा प्रसार तरुण लोकांमध्ये झाला, ज्यामुळे तुलनात्मकदृष्ट्या मृत्युदर कमी होता आणि कदाचित सर्वच COVID-19 संक्रमित मृत्यूंना औपचारिकरित्या अशाप्रकारे वर्गीकृत करता येणार नाही.
en-mt: In Gengelt, the disease was spread by a carnival festival and spread among young people, resulting in a relatively low mortality rate, and perhaps not all COVID-19-infected deaths could be formally classified as such.

sourceString: Furthermore, the German health system has not been overwhelmed.
targetString: शिवाय, जर्मन आरोग्य प्रणालीवर तितकासा भार नाही.
en-mt: Moreover, the German health system is not as burdened.

sourceString: In the Netherlands, about 3% may have antibodies, as assessed from blood donors.
targetString: नेदरलँड्समध्ये कदाचित जवळपास 3% लोकांमध्ये एन्टीबॉडीज असू शकतात, जशी रक्तदात्यापासून माहिती मिळाली आहे.
en-mt: In the Netherlands, about 3% of people may have antibodies, as reported by a blood donor.

sourceString: 69 (0.004% of the population) have been confirmed to have died from COVID-19.
targetString: 69 (लोकसंख्येच्या 0.004%) लोक COVID-19 पासून मरण पावल्याची पुष्टी झाली आहे.
en-mt: 69 (0.004% of the population) people have been confirmed to have died from COVID-19.

sourceString: The impact of the pandemic and its mortality rate are different for men and women.
targetString: ह्या महामारीचा परिणाम आणि मृत्युदर हे महिला आणि पुरुषांसाठी वेगवेगळे आहेत.
en-mt: The impact and mortality of this epidemic is different for women and men.

sourceString: Mortality is higher in men in studies conducted in China and Italy.
targetString: चीन आणि इटलीमध्ये आयोजित केलेल्या अभ्यासांत असे आढळले की पुरुषांचा मृत्युदर जास्ती आहे.
en-mt: Studies conducted in China and Italy found that men had a higher mortality rate.

sourceString: The highest risk for men is in their 50s, with the gap between men and women closing only at 90.
targetString: वयाच्या पन्नासाच्या दशकांत असलेल्या पुरुषांना सर्वाधिक धोका आहे. महिला आणि पुरुष ह्यांचामधील मृत्युदाराचे सर्वांत कमी अंतर नव्वदीच्या दशकांत आहे.
en-mt: Men in their fifties are most at risk. The narrowest gap in mortality between women and men is in the 1990s.

sourceString: In China, the death rate was 2.8 percent for men and 1.7 percent for women.
targetString: चीनमध्ये पुरुषांचे मृत्युदर 2.8% आणि स्त्रियांचे मृत्युदर 1.7% होते.
en-mt: In China, the male mortality rate was 2.8% and the female mortality rate was 1.7%.

sourceString: The exact reasons for this sex-difference is not known, but genetic and behavioural factors could be a reason.
targetString: ह्या लिंग-अंतरांचे निश्चित कारण माहित नाही, पण ह्याचे कारण अनुवांशिक आणि व्यवहारसंबंधी असू शकते.
en-mt: The exact cause of these gender differences is unknown, but may be genetic or behavioral.

sourceString: Sex-based immunological differences, lesser prevalence of smoking in women and men developing co-morbid conditions such as hypertension at a younger age than women could have contributed to the higher mortality in men.
targetString: लिंग-आधारित प्रतिकारशक्तीचे अंतर, स्त्रियांमध्ये धूम्रपानाची कमी व्याप्ती आणि पुरुषांमध्ये स्त्रियांच्या तुलनेत कमी वयांत उच्चरक्तदाबासारखी सह-रुग्ण अवस्था विकसित होणे, हे सर्व पुरुषांमध्ये मृत्युदर जास्ती असायचे कारण असू शकतात.
en-mt: Gender-based immunity gaps, lower prevalence of smoking in women, and the development of co-morbid conditions such as hypertension at a younger age in men than in women, may all account for the higher mortality in men.

sourceString: In Europe, 57% of the infected individuals were men and 72% of those died with COVID-19 were men.
targetString: योरोपमध्ये संक्रमित लोकांमध्ये 57% पुरुष होते आणि COVID-19 ने मरण पावलेल्या लोकांमध्ये 72% हे पुरुष होते.
en-mt: In Europe, 57% of people infected and 72% of those who died of COVID-19 were men.

sourceString: As of April 2020, the US government is not tracking sex-related data of COVID-19 infections.
targetString: एप्रिल 2020 पर्यंत अमेरिकन शासन COVID-19 संक्रमित लोकांमध्ये लिंग-अंतराची माहिती मिळवत नव्हते.
en-mt: As of April 2020, the U.S. government was not collecting data on the gender gap in people infected with COVID-19.

sourceString: Research has shown that viral illnesses like Ebola, HIV, influenza and SARS affect men and women differently.
targetString: शोधाने असे आढळले की एबोला, HIV, इंफ्लूएन्जा आणि SARS सारखे व्हायरल आजार पुरुष आणि स्त्रियांना वेगवेगळ्याप्रकारे प्रभावित करतात.
en-mt: Research has found that viral diseases such as Ebola, HIV, influenza and SARS affect men and women differently.

sourceString: A higher percentage of health workers, particularly nurses, are women, and they have a higher chance of being exposed to the virus.
targetString: आरोग्य कर्मचाऱ्यांची मोठी संख्या, विशेषतः नर्स ह्या स्त्रिया आहेत, आणि त्यांना ह्या व्हायरसचा संसर्ग होण्याचा जास्ती धोका आहे.
en-mt: A large number of health workers, especially nurses, are women, and they are at high risk of contracting the virus.

sourceString: The World Health Organization announced on 11 February 2020 that the official name of the disease would be "COVID-19".
targetString: WHO ने 11 फेब्रुवारी 2020 रोजी असे जाहीर केले की ह्या आजाराचे अधिकृत नांव "COVID-19" असेल.
en-mt: The WHO announced on 11 February 2020 that the official name of the disease will be "COVID-19".

sourceString: WHO chief Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus explained that CO stands for corona, VI for virus, D for disease, and 19 for when the outbreak was first identified: 31 December 2019.
targetString: WHO चे प्रमुख तेंद्रोस एधानॉम घेब्रेयेसस ह्यांनी सांगितले की CO चा अर्थ कोरोना, VI चा अर्थ व्हायरस, D चा अर्थ आजार आणि १९ तो वर्ष आहे जेव्हा ह्या आजाराचा प्रथम उद्रेक झाल्यचे लक्षांत आले होते: ३१ डिसेंबर २०१९.
en-mt: WHO chief Tendras Adhanom Ghebreyesus said CO stands for Corona, VI stands for Virus, D stands for Disease and 19 is the year when the outbreak was first noticed: 31 December 2019.

sourceString: The name had been chosen to avoid references to a specific geographical location (e.g. China), animal species or group of people, in line with international recommendations for naming aimed at preventing stigmatisation.The virus that causes COVID-19 is named severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: हे नाव एखाद्या विशिष्ट भौगोलिक स्थळ (जसे, चीन), प्राणी प्रजाती, किंवा लोकांच्या गटाला संदर्भित करणे टाळण्यासाठी म्हणून दिले होते, जे नामकरणाच्या अंतरराष्ट्रीय शिफारसीला अनुसरून होते, आणि ह्याचा उद्देश्य कोणालाही कलंकित करणे टाळणे होते. COVID-19 होण्यास कारणीभूत ह्या व्हायरसला सिव्हीयर एक्युट रेस्पिरेटरी सिंड्रोम कोरोनाव्हायरस -2 (SARS-CoV-2) असे नाव दिले आहे.
en-mt: The name was given to avoid referring to a specific geographic location (such as China), animal species, or group of people, which followed an international nomenclature recommendation, and was intended to avoid stigmatizing anyone. The virus that causes COVID-19 is named Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus-2 (SARS-CoV-2).

sourceString: The WHO additionally uses "the COVID-19 virus" and "the virus responsible for COVID-19" in public communications.
targetString: सार्वजनिक संप्रेषणमध्ये WHO ह्या व्यतिरिक्त "COVID-19 व्हायरस" आणि "COVID-19 साठी जबाबदार व्हायरस" चा वापर करते.
en-mt: In public communications, WHO additionally uses the terms "COVID-19 virus" and "virus responsible for COVID-19".

sourceString: Both the disease and virus are commonly referred to as "coronavirus".
targetString: हा आजार आणि व्हायरस दोघांनाही सामान्यपणे "कोरोनाव्हायरस" म्हणून संबोधले जाते.
en-mt: Both the disease and the virus are commonly referred to as "coronaviruses".

sourceString: During the initial outbreak in Wuhan, China, the virus and disease were commonly referred to as "coronavirus" and "Wuhan coronavirus".
targetString: वूहान, चीनमध्ये प्रारंभिक उद्रेकाच्या वेळेस ह्या व्हायरसला आणि आजाराला दोघांनाही सामान्यपणे "कोरोनाव्हायरस" आणि "वूहान कोरोनाव्हायरस" म्हणून संबोधले जात होते.
en-mt: Both the virus and the disease were commonly referred to as "coronavirus" and "Wuhan coronavirus" during the initial outbreak in Wuhan, China.

sourceString: In January 2020, WHO recommended 2019-nCov and 2019-nCoV acute respiratory disease as interim names for the virus and disease in accordance with 2015 guidance against using locations in disease and virus names.
targetString: जानेवारी 2020 मध्ये WHO ने ह्या आजार आणि व्हायरसच्या नावांत स्थळाचा वापर करायच्या विरुद्ध 2015 मार्गदर्शनाला अनुसरून, ह्या व्हायरस आणि आजारासाठी अंतरिम नावे म्हणून 2019-nCoV आणि 2019-nCoV एक्यूट रेस्पिरेटरी डिसीज ह्यांची शिफारस केली.
en-mt: In January 2020, the WHO recommended 2019-nCoV and 2019-nCoV acute respiratory disease as the interim names for these viruses and diseases, following 2015 guidance against the use of space in the names of these diseases and viruses.

sourceString: The official names COVID-19 and SARS-CoV-2 were issued on 11 February 2020.
targetString: COVID-19 आणि SARS-CoV-2 ही अधिकृत नावे 11 फेब्रुवारी 2020 रोजी जारी केली गेली.
en-mt: The official names COVID-19 and SARS-CoV-2 were released on February 11, 2020.

sourceString: Due to capacity limitations in the standard supply chains, some digital manufacturers are printing healthcare material such as nasal swabs and ventilator parts.
targetString: मानक अपूर्ती श्रुंखलेत क्षमता मर्यादेमुळे काही डिजिटल निर्माते आरोग्य देखरेख साहित्याला नेजल स्वॅॅब्स आणि व्हेन्टिलेटर पार्ट्स म्हणून मुद्रित करीत आहेत.
en-mt: Some digital manufacturers are printing health care materials such as nasal swabs and ventilator parts due to capacity limitations in the standard supply chain.

sourceString: In one example, when an Italian hospital urgently required a ventilator valve, and the supplier was unable to deliver in the timescale required, a local startup reverse-engineered and printed the required 100 valves overnight.
targetString: उदाहरणार्थ, इटलीच्या एका दवाखान्यात जेव्हा व्हेन्टिलेटर व्हाल्वची तातडीने गरज होती आणि आपूर्तिकर्ता त्याची वेळेवर अपूर्ती करण्यास अक्षम होता, तेव्हा एका स्थानिक स्टार्टअप कंपनीने रिव्हर्स-इंजिनीअरिंग केले आणि रात्रीच्या रात्री 100 व्हाल्व मुद्रित केले.
en-mt: For example, when a hospital in Italy urgently needed ventilator valves and the supplier was unable to supply them in time, a local startup company reverse-engineered and printed 100 valves overnight.

sourceString: After the initial outbreak of COVID-19, conspiracy theories, misinformation and disinformation emerged regarding the origin, scale, prevention, treatment and other aspects of the disease and rapidly spread online.
targetString: COVID-19 च्या प्रारंभिक उद्रेकानंतर ह्या आजाराच्या मूळ, परिमाण, उपचार आणि इतर बाबतीत कट-कारस्थान, चुकीची आणि विकृत माहिती उभारल्या आणि वेगाने ऑनलाईन पसरल्या.
en-mt: After the initial outbreak of COVID-19, conspiracies, misinformation and distortions regarding the origin, extent, treatment and other aspects of the disease were created and spread rapidly online.

sourceString: Humans appear to be capable of spreading the virus to some other animals.
targetString: मानवजाती काही इतर प्राण्यांमध्ये हा व्हायरस पसरविण्यास सक्षम असल्याचे लक्षात आले.
en-mt: Humans were found to be able to spread the virus to some other animals.

sourceString: The study failed to find evidence of viral replication in pigs, ducks, and chickens.
targetString: हा अभ्यास डुक्कर, बदके आणि कोंबड्यात ह्या व्हायरसची प्रतिकृती असल्याचे पुरावे शोधण्यास निकामी ठरला.
en-mt: This study failed to find evidence of replication of the virus in pigs, ducks and chickens.

sourceString: No medications or vaccine is approved to treat the disease.
targetString: ह्या आजाराच्या उपचारासाठी कोणत्याच औषध किंवा लसीला मंजुरी दिली गेली नाही.
en-mt: No drug or vaccine has been approved to treat this disease.

sourceString: International research on vaccines and medicines in COVID-19 are underway by government organisations, academic groups and industry researchers.
targetString: शासनाद्वारे COVID-19 च्या लसी आणि औषधावर अंतरराष्ट्रीय शोध काम चालू आहे.
en-mt: International research work on vaccine and medicine for COVID-19 is going on by the government.

sourceString: In March, the World Health Organization initiated the "SOLIDARITY Trial" to assess treatment effects of four existing antiviral compounds with the most promise of efficacy.
targetString: मार्चमध्ये WHO ने सर्वांत जास्ती कार्यक्षम असलेले चार विद्यमान एन्टीव्हायरल कंपाऊंड्सच्या उपचार प्रभावाचे मुल्यांकन करण्यासाठी "सॉलीडेरीटी ट्रायल" ची सुरुवात केली.
en-mt: In March, the WHO launched the "Solidarity Trial" to assess the treatment effect of the four most effective existing antiviral compounds.

sourceString: There is no available vaccine, but various agencies are actively developing vaccine candidates.
targetString: सध्या कोणतीच लस उपलब्ध नाही, तरीही विविध एजेंसी सक्रीयरित्या 'लस उमेदवार' तयार करत आहेत.
en-mt: No vaccine is currently available, although various agencies are actively developing 'vaccine candidates'.

sourceString: Previous work on SARS-CoV is being utilised because SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 both use the ACE2 receptor to enter human cells.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 वरील आधी केलेल्या अभ्यासाचा वापर केला जात आहे, कारण SARS-CoV आणि SARS-CoV-2 हे दोघेही मानवी पेशींमध्ये प्रवेश करण्यासाठी ACE2 तंत्रिकातंतुचा वापर करतात.
en-mt: Previous studies on SARS-CoV-2 are being used, as both SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 use the ACE2 receptor to enter human cells.

sourceString: There are three vaccination strategies being investigated.
targetString: आतापर्यंत तीन लसीकरण रणनीती शोधल्या गेल्या आहेत.
en-mt: Three vaccination strategies have been explored so far.

sourceString: First, researchers aim to build a whole virus vaccine.
targetString: प्रथम, शोधकर्त्यांचे लक्ष्य एक संपूर्ण व्हायरस लस तयार करणे आहे.
en-mt: First, researchers aim to create a complete virus vaccine.

sourceString: The use of such a virus, be it inactive or dead, aims to elicit a prompt immune response of the human body to a new infection with COVID-19.
targetString: अश्या व्हायरसच्या वापराचा उद्देश, मग तो निष्क्रिय असो किंवा मृत व्हायरस असो, मानव शरीराच्या त्वरित प्रतिकार प्रतिक्रियेमध्ये COVID-19 सह एक नवीन संसर्ग उत्पन्न करणे आहे.
en-mt: The purpose of using such virus, whether it is inactivated or dead virus, is to induce a new infection with COVID-19 in the immediate immune response of the human body.

sourceString: A second strategy, subunit vaccines, aims to create a vaccine that sensitises the immune system to certain subunits of the virus.
targetString: एक दुसरी रणनीती उप-युनिट लसी आहेत, ज्यांचा उद्देश्य अशी लस तयार करणे आहे, जी प्रतिकार प्रणालीला व्हायरसच्या एका ठराविक उप-युनिट पर्यंत संवेदनशील करते.
en-mt: Another strategy is subunit vaccines, which aim to create a vaccine that sensitizes the immune system to a specific subunit of the virus.

sourceString: In the case of SARS-CoV-2, such research focuses on the S-spike protein that helps the virus intrude the ACE2 enzyme receptor.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 च्या बाबतीत, असे शोधकार्य S-स्पाईक प्रोटीनवर लक्ष केंद्रित करते जे व्हायरसला ACE2 एन्जाइम तंत्रिकातंतुला भेदण्यात मदत करते.
en-mt: In the case of SARS-CoV-2, such research focused on the S-spike protein that helps the virus penetrate the ACE2 enzyme in neurons.

sourceString: A third strategy is that of the nucleic acid vaccines (DNA or RNA vaccines, a novel technique for creating a vaccination).
targetString: एक तिसरी रणनीती न्यूक्लिक एसिड लस (DNA किंवा RNA लसी, लसीकरण तयार करण्यासाठी एक अभिनव तंत्रज्ञान) बद्दल आहे.
en-mt: A third strategy is about nucleic acid vaccines (DNA or RNA vaccines, an innovative technology for creating vaccines).

sourceString: Experimental vaccines from any of these strategies would have to be tested for safety and efficacy.On 16 March 2020, the first clinical trial of a vaccine started with four volunteers in Seattle.
targetString: ह्या तिन्ही रणनीतीपैकी कोणत्याही प्रयोगात्मक लसीचे सुरक्षा आणि प्रभावितेसाठी चाचण्या करणे गरजेचे आहे. सीएटलमध्ये 16 मार्च, 2020 रोजी, चार स्वयंसेवकांसोबत एका लसीचे वैद्यकीय परीक्षण प्रारंभ केले गेले.
en-mt: Any experimental vaccine from these three strategies needs to be tested for safety and efficacy. On March 16, 2020, a vaccine clinical trial began in Seattle with four volunteers.

sourceString: The vaccine contains a harmless genetic code copied from the virus that causes the disease.Antibody dependent enhancement has been suggested as a potential challenge for vaccine development for SARS-COV-2, but this is controversial.
targetString: ह्या लसीमध्ये एक धोकाविरहित अनुवांशिक कोड आहे, जिची प्रतिकृती त्या व्हायरस पासून तयार केलेली आहे ज्याचामुळे हा आजार होतो. SARS-CoV-2 साठी लस विकसित करण्यास एक संभावित आव्हान म्हणून एन्टीबॉडी निर्भर संवर्धन सुचवले गेले आहे, पण हे विवादास्पद आहे.
en-mt: The vaccine contains a harmless genetic code, replicated from the virus that causes the disease. Antibody-dependent enrichment has been suggested as a potential challenge to vaccine development for SARS-CoV-2, but this is controversial.

sourceString: There are more than 300 active clinical trials underway as of April 2020.
targetString: एप्रिल 2020 पर्यंतच्या अहवालानुसार 300 पेक्षा जास्ती सक्रीय वैद्यकीय चाचण्या केल्या जात आहेत.
en-mt: As of April 2020, more than 300 active clinical trials are being reported.

sourceString: Seven trials were evaluating already approved treatments for malaria, including four studies on hydroxychloroquine or chloroquine.
targetString: मलेरियासाठी आधीच मंजूर केलेल्या उपचारामधून सात चाचण्यांचे मुल्यांकन केले जात होते, ज्यांत हाईड्रोक्सीक्लोरोक्वीन किंवा क्लोरोक्वीनवरील चार शोधकार्य देखील समाविष्ट आहेत.
en-mt: Seven trials were evaluating already approved treatments for malaria, including four investigating hydroxychloroquine or chloroquine.

sourceString: Repurposed antiviral drugs make up most of the Chinese research, with nine phase III trials on remdesivir across several countries due to report by the end of April.
targetString: अधिकांश चायनीज शोधकार्यात बहु-प्रयोजन एंटीव्हायरल औषधे समाविष्ट आहेत, एप्रिलच्या शेवटी सादर केलेल्या अहवालानुसार अनेक देशांत रेमेडीसीव्हिर वर होणाऱ्या चरण-III वर नऊ चाचण्या समाविष्ट आहेत.
en-mt: Most of the Chinese research involves multi-purpose antiviral drugs, including nine Phase-III trials on remdesivir taking place in several countries, according to a report presented at the end of April.

sourceString: A dynamic review of clinical development for COVID-19 vaccine and drug candidates was in place, as of April 2020.Several existing antiviral medications are being evaluated for treatment of COVID-19, including remdesivir, chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine, lopinavir/ritonavir and lopinavir/ritonavir combined with interferon beta.
targetString: एप्रिल 2020 च्या अहवालानुसार, COVID-19 लस आणि औषध उमेदवारांसाठी वैद्यकीय विकासाची डायनॅमिक समीक्षा हजर आहे. COVID-19 च्या उपचारासाठी अनेक विद्यमान एंटीव्हायरल औषधांचे मुल्यांकन करण्यात आले आहे, ज्यांत रेमेडीसिविर, क्लोरोक्वीन आणि हाईड्रॉक्सीक्लोरोक्वीन, लोपिनाव्हीर/ रायटोनाव्हीर आणि इंटरफेरोन बीटासह लोपिनाव्हीर / रायटोनाव्हीर समाविष्ट आहेत.
en-mt: According to an April 2020 report, a dynamic review of clinical development for COVID-19 vaccine and drug candidates is underway. Several existing antiviral drugs have been evaluated for the treatment of COVID-19, including remdesivir, chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine, lopinavir/ritonavir, and lopinavir/ritonavir with interferon beta.

sourceString: There is tentative evidence for efficacy by remdesivir, as of March 2020.
targetString: मार्च 2020 च्या अहवालानुसार, रेमेडीसिव्हीर द्वारे प्रभावितेसाठी तात्पुरते पुरावे हजर आहेत.
en-mt: According to a March 2020 report, there is tentative evidence for an effect of remdesivir.

sourceString: Clinical improvement was observed in patients treated with compassionate-use remdesivir.
targetString: रेमेडीसिव्हीरद्वारे उपचार केलेल्या रुग्णांत वैद्यकीय सुधार दिसून आला होता.
en-mt: Clinical improvement was observed in patients treated with remdesivir.

sourceString: Phase III clinical trials are being conducted in the US, China and Italy.Chloroquine, previously used to treat malaria, was studied in China in February 2020, with preliminary results.
targetString: अमेरिका, चीन आणि इटलीमध्ये चरण-III वैद्यकीय चाचण्या आयोजित करण्यात येत आहेत. क्लोरोक्वीन, जिचा वापर पूर्वी मलेरियासाठी केला जात होता, त्यावर फेब्रुवारी 2020 मध्ये चीनमध्ये अभ्यास केला गेला, ज्याचे प्रारंभिक परिणाम मिळाले आहेत.
en-mt: Phase-III clinical trials are being conducted in the US, China and Italy. Chloroquine, previously used for malaria, was studied in China in February 2020, with initial results.

sourceString: However, there are calls for peer review of the research.
targetString: तथापि, ह्या शोधकार्यासाठी सामुहिक समीक्षेची गरज आहे.
en-mt: However, this research needs a collective review.

sourceString: Korean and Chinese Health Authorities recommend the use of chloroquine.
targetString: कोरियन आणि चीनी आरोग्य अधिकाऱ्यांनी क्लोरोक्वीनच्या वापरासाठी शिफारस केली आहे.
en-mt: Korean and Chinese health authorities have recommended the use of chloroquine.

sourceString: However, the Wuhan Institute of Virology, while recommending a daily dose of one gram, notes that twice that dose is highly dangerous and could be lethal.
targetString: तथापि, वुहान इंस्टीट्यूट ऑफ वायरोलॉजीने ह्याच्या रोज एक ग्राम डोसची शिफारस करताना नोंद घेतली की त्याचा दुप्पट डोस अतिशय धोकादायक आहे आणि त्याने मृत्यू देखील होऊ शकते.
en-mt: However, the Wuhan Institute of Virology, while recommending a dose of one gram per day, notes that double that dose is very dangerous and can even cause death.

sourceString: On 28 March 2020, the FDA issued an emergency use authorisation for hydroxychloroquine and chloroquine at the discretion of physicians treating people with COVID-19.The Chinese 7th edition guidelines also include interferon, ribavirin or umifenovir for use against COVID-19.
targetString: FDA ने 28 मार्च, 2020 रोजी, COVID-19 असलेल्या रुग्णांचा उपचार करणाऱ्या डॉक्टरांच्या विवेकबुद्धीच्या आधारे हाईड्रॉक्सीक्लोरोक्वीन आणि क्लोरोक्वीनच्या आपातकालीन वापराची परवानगी जारी केली. चायनीज सातव्या आवृत्ती मार्गदर्शिकामध्ये देखील CORONA-19 च्या विरुद्ध वापरासाठी इंटरफेरॉन, रायबाव्हीरीन किंवा युमीफेनोवहीरचा समावेश केला आहे.
en-mt: On March 28, 2020, the FDA issued authorization for emergency use of hydroxychloroquine and chloroquine based on the discretion of physicians treating patients with COVID-19. The Chinese seventh edition guidelines also include interferon, ribavirin or umifenavir for use against CORONA-19.

sourceString: Preliminary data indicate that high doses of ribavirin are necessary to inhibit SARS-CoV-2 in vitro.
targetString: प्राथमिक डेटा सांगतो की चाचणी मध्ये SARS-CoV-2 ला प्रतिबंधित करण्यासाठी रायबाव्हीरीनचे उच्च डोस देणे गरजेचे आहे.
en-mt: Preliminary data suggest that higher doses of ribavirin are needed to inhibit SARS-CoV-2 in the trial.

sourceString: Nitazoxanide has been recommended for further in vivo study after demonstrating low concentration inhibition of SARS-CoV-2.Studies have demonstrated that initial spike protein priming by transmembrane protease serine 2 (TMPRSS2) is essential for entry of SARS-CoV-2 via interaction with the ACE2 receptor.
targetString: SARS-CoV-२ च्या कमी सांद्रता प्रतिबंधाच्या प्रदर्शनानंतर पुढील चाचण्यासाठी निटाझोक्सानाईडची शिफारस करण्यात आली आहे. अभ्यासांत हे लक्षांत आले आहे की ACE-२ तंत्रीकातंतुसोबत परस्परक्रियाच्या माध्यमाने SARS-CoV-२ च्या प्रवेशासाठी ट्रान्समेम्ब्रेन प्रोटीएज सेराईन २ (TMPRSS२) च्या माध्यमाने प्रारंभी स्पाईक प्रोटीन प्रायमिंग फारच गरजेचे आहे.
en-mt: Nitazoxanide has been recommended for further testing following the demonstration of low-concentration inhibition of SARS-CoV-2. Studies have shown that initial spike protein priming by transmembrane protease serine 2 (TMPRSS2) is essential for entry of SARS-CoV-2 through interaction with ACE-2 receptors.

sourceString: The studies of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine with or without azithromycin have major limitations that have prevented the medical community from embracing these therapies without further study.Oseltamivir does not inhibit SARS-CoV-2 in vitro and has no known role in COVID-19 treatment.
targetString: एझीथ्रोमायसिन सोबत किंवा त्याच्याशिवाय क्लोरोक्वीन आणि हायड्रॉक्सीक्लोरोक्वीनच्या अध्ययनांत मोठ्या अडचणी आहेत ज्याने वैद्यकीय समुदायाला पुढील अभ्यासाशिवाय ह्या उपचारांचा अवलंब करण्यास प्रतिबंधित केले. ऑसेल्टा्मिवहीरने प्रयोगांत SARS-CoV-२ ला प्रतिबंधित नाही केले आणि त्याची COVID-१९ च्या उपचारांत कुठलीही ज्ञात भूमिका आढळली नाही.
en-mt: Studies of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine with or without azithromycin have had major problems that have prevented the medical community from adopting these treatments without further study. Oseltamivir did not inhibit SARS-CoV-2 in experiments and has no known role in the treatment of COVID-19.

sourceString: Cytokine storm can be a complication in the later stages of severe COVID-19.
targetString: सायटोकाईन स्टॉर्म हे गंभीर COVID-१९ च्या पुढील चरणांत गुंतागुंतीचे होऊ शकते.
en-mt: Cytokine storm may complicate the later stages of severe COVID-19.

sourceString: There is evidence that hydroxychloroquine may have anti-cytokine storm properties.Tocilizumab has been included in treatment guidelines by China's National Health Commission after a small study was completed.
targetString: ह्या गोष्टीचा पुरावा आहे की हायड्रॉक्सीक्लोरोक्वीनमध्ये एंटी-सायटोकाईन स्टॉर्मचे गुणधर्म असू शकतात. एका छोट्या अभ्यासानंतर चीनच्या राष्ट्रीय आरोग्य आयोगाद्वारे उपचार मार्गदर्शिकामध्ये टोसीलिजुमॅॅबला शामिल करण्यात आले आहे.
en-mt: There is evidence that hydroxychloroquine may have anti-cytokine storm properties. Tocilizumab has been included in treatment guidelines by China's National Health Commission after a small study.

sourceString: It is undergoing a phase 2 non randomised test at the national level in Italy after showing positive results in people with severe disease.
targetString: गंभीर आजार असणाऱ्या लोकांमध्ये सकारात्मक परिणाम बघितल्यावर इटलीमध्ये राष्ट्रीय पातळीवर चरण-२ च्या गैर-यादृच्छिक चाचण्या चालू आहेत.
en-mt: A national phase-2 non-randomized trial is underway in Italy after seeing positive results in people with severe disease.

sourceString: Combined with a serum ferritin blood test to identify cytokine storms, it is meant to counter such developments, which are thought to be the cause of death in some affected people.
targetString: सायटोकाईन स्टॉर्मची ओळख करण्यासाठी सीरम फेरीटीन रक्त चाचणीसह एकत्र केल्यास, असा अर्थ होतो की अश्या विकासाला विरोध करणे, ज्यांना काही संक्रमित लोकांमध्ये मृत्यूचे कारण मानले गेले आहे.
en-mt: Combined with a serum ferritin blood test to identify a cytokine storm, it makes sense to counteract the development, which has been thought to be the cause of death in some infected people.

sourceString: The interleukin-6 receptor antagonist was approved by the FDA based on retrospective case studies for treatment of steroid refractory cytokine release syndrome induced by a different cause, CAR T cell therapy, in 2017.
targetString: २०१७ मध्ये CAR T पेशी उपचार, नावाच्या एका वेगळ्या कारणाने लक्षांत आलेल्या स्टीरॉयड रिफ्रेक्टरी सायटोकाईन रिलीज सिंड्रोमच्या उपचारासाठी केलेल्या पूर्वप्रभावी अध्ययनाच्या आधारे FDA द्वारे इंटरल्युकिन-६ तंत्रिकातंतु प्रतिपक्षी ह्याला मंजूरी दिली गेली.
en-mt: In 2017, an interleukin-6 neuroprotective antagonist was approved by the FDA based on a preliminary efficacy study for the treatment of steroid refractory cytokine release syndrome, a different cause called CAR T cell therapy.

sourceString: To date, there is no randomised, controlled evidence that tocilizumab is an efficacious treatment for CRS.
targetString: आजगायत ह्याचा यादृच्छिक, नियंत्रित पुरावा नाही की टोसिलीझुमॅॅब CRS साठी एक प्रभावी उपचार आहे.
en-mt: To date, there is no randomized, controlled evidence that tocilizumab is an effective treatment for CRS.

sourceString: Transferring purified and concentrated antibodies produced by the immune systems of those who have recovered from COVID-19 to people who need them is being investigated as a non-vaccine method of passive immunisation.
targetString: COVID-१९ पासून बरे झालेल्या लोकांच्या प्रतिकार प्रणालीद्वारे निर्मित शुद्धीकृत आणि सांद्र एन्टीबॉडीजचे त्याची आवश्यकता असणाऱ्या लोकांमध्ये हस्तांतरणाचा निष्क्रिय लसीकरणाच्या एक गैर-लस पद्धती म्हणून शोधकार्य चालू आहे.
en-mt: The transfer of purified and concentrated antibodies produced by the immune systems of people who have recovered from COVID-19 into people in need is being explored as a non-vaccine method of passive immunization.

sourceString: This strategy was tried for SARS with inconclusive results.
targetString: ही रणनीती SARS साठी वापरली गेली होती, पण त्याचे काही विशेष परिणाम नाही मिळाले.
en-mt: This strategy was used for SARS, but it did not have much effect.

sourceString: Viral neutralisation is the anticipated mechanism of action by which passive antibody therapy can mediate defence against SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: व्हायरल न्युट्रलाईझेशन कार्यवाहीचे अपेक्षित तंत्र आहे, ज्याद्वारे SARS-CoV-२ च्या विरुद्ध निष्क्रिय एन्टीबॉडी उपचार केला जाऊ शकतो.
en-mt: Viral neutralization is the expected mechanism of action, by which neutralizing antibodies against SARS-CoV-2 can be treated.

sourceString: Other mechanisms however, such as antibody-dependent cellular cytotoxicity and/or phagocytosis, may be possible.
targetString: तथापि, इतर तंत्र, जसे एन्टीबॉडी-डिपेंडंट सेल्युलर सायटोटॉक्सीसिटी आणि/ किंवा फेगोसाईट्स, शक्य होऊ शकतात.
en-mt: However, other mechanisms, such as antibody-dependent cellular cytotoxicity and/or phagocytes, may be possible.

sourceString: Other forms of passive antibody therapy, for example, using manufactured monoclonal antibodies, are in development.
targetString: निष्क्रिय एन्टीबॉडी उपचाराच्या इतर स्वरूपाचा विकास चालू आहे, उदाहरणार्थ, निर्मित मोनोक्लोनल एन्टीबॉडीजचा वापर करणे.
en-mt: Other forms of passive antibody therapy are under development, for example, using manufactured monoclonal antibodies.

sourceString: Production of convalescent serum, which consists of the liquid portion of the blood from recovered patients and contains antibodies specific to this virus, could be increased for quicker deployment.
targetString: क्न्व्हलसेंट सीरमचे उत्पादन, ज्यांत बरा झालेल्या रुग्णांच्या रक्ताचे द्रव प्रोटीन शामिल आहे आणि ज्यांत ह्या व्हायरससाठी विशिष्ट असलेल्या एन्टीबॉडीज समाविष्ट आहेत, त्यांना जलद विकासासाठी वाढविले जाऊ शकते.
en-mt: The production of convalescent serum, which contains liquid protein from the blood of recovered patients and which contains antibodies specific for this virus, can be increased for rapid development.

sourceString: Coronavirus diseases, a group of closely related syndromes
targetString: कोरोनाव्हायरस आजार, निकट संबंधित सिंड्रोमचा एक गट
en-mt: Coronavirus disease, a group of closely related syndromes

sourceString: Li Wenliang, a doctor at Central Hospital of Wuhan, who later contracted and died of COVID-19 after raising awareness of the spread of the virus.
targetString: सेन्ट्रल हॉस्पिटल ऑफ वूहानचे एक डॉक्टर ली व्हेनलियांग, ह्यांना ह्या व्हायरसच्या प्रसाराची जागरूकता वाढवल्यानंतर COVID-१९ चा संसर्ग झाला आणि ते मरण पावले.
en-mt: Li Wenliang, a doctor at the Central Hospital of Wuhan, contracted and died of COVID-19 after raising awareness of the spread of the virus.
